texts.Message_100301: My chest is the size of a candy box.
texts.Message_100302: It's old with some wear and tear on the casing.
texts.Message_100303: It should be quite light. Anyway, it shouldn't be difficult to carry it out of the Hollow.
texts.Option01_100304: Is that all the info you've got?
texts.Option02_100304: Uhh... Do you know the location of your chest?
texts.Message_100305: I'm sorry, but that's all the info I've got, as it's not a particularly special chest.
texts.Message_100307: I'm really sorry, but I can only give you a rough area within the Hollow.
texts.Message_100308: I'm counting on you to find it!
texts.Message_100309: Is it too much to ask? I'm very sorry! Is this too little info to find it? T^T
texts.Option01_100310: No worries. Just leave it to me.

texts.OptionLong01_100402: Its appearance fits your description, but all that's inside is some coupons and vouchers...
texts.Message_100403: Right, yes, exactly! That's the one! You found it!
texts.Message_100404: Just leave it somewhere nearby the Hollow entrance. I'll collect it myself.
texts.OptionLong01_100405: My service is way more expensive than the vouchers in the chest... Why go to such lengths to get them back?
texts.Option02_100405: Was it even worth the effort...?
texts.Message_100406: Um... Some of the stores that issued the vouchers are closing down soon. If I don't use them soon I'll miss my chance.
texts.Message_100407: There's also some limited edition vouchers I want to try using.
texts.Message_100408: I'm sorry! Is my reason for hiring you too trivial?
texts.Message_100409: It just really means a lot to me, and I swear it isn't a prank! I'm sorry if you're offended!
texts.Option01_100410: As my client, you don't have to apologize to me...
texts.Option02_100410: I'm glad to be of help!
texts.Message_100412: I'll send you the payment in a while. Thanks for your help!

texts.Message_100501: Remember that investigator with poor eyesight, Andrew?
texts.Option01_100502: Has he sent us a new commission?
texts.Message_100503: When he asked for the price again, I guess I couldn't quite get our sincerity across to him.
texts.Message_100504: To be honest, basically... I tried to jack up the price and then got left on read.
texts.Message_100506: Hold on, let me finish. He reached out to me again today saying, "We went with a cheaper Hollow Raider last time."
texts.Message_100507: "And the guy threw up all over our equipment... if that was all throw-up."
texts.Message_100508: "My boss is threatening to dock my performance pay... I'm reluctant to bow down to a dishonest businessman, but... please help me with another job!"
texts.OptionLong01_100509: As expected of a seasoned intel broker, you managed to salvage the commission.
texts.OptionLong02_100509: It's a good thing, but somehow I have mixed feelings...
texts.Message_100510: Just like last time, pass the verification, go to the control room, and then press the activation button.
texts.Message_100511: I guess it must be as easy as going to the toilet in the middle of the night for you. You can do it with your eyes closed!
texts.Message_100513: It's business as usual for this commission: Enter the Hollow, pass the captchas of the verification devices, go to the control room, and activate the communication network.
texts.Message_100514: I guess it must be as easy as going to the toilet in the middle of the night for you. You can do it with your eyes closed!

texts.Message_100703: Hey, I saw your comment. Are you interested in the ghost train driver story?
texts.Message_100705: Then do you mind telling me which side you are on? You can skip the details and just tell me whether you're a doer or a spectator.
texts.Option01_100706: I'm a doer who also spectates.
texts.Message_100707: Haha... Your answer is odd, but reasonable
texts.Message_100708: The code word is: See you in half an hour
texts.Option01_100709: You're gonna give out the code word just like that?
texts.Option02_100709: That's not a very believable code word.
texts.Message_100713:
Stop! Don't get carried away! Let's get down to business.
Are you interested in the ghost train driver story?

texts.OptionLong01_100800: Done. As easy as going to the toilet in the middle of the night.
texts.OptionLong02_100800: Commission done. I could do it with my eyes closed.
texts.Message_100801: "My boss complimented me and promised to give me a promotion by the end of the year."
texts.Message_100802: "I'm so sorry for being rude to you before."
texts.Message_100804: Since the client's boss thinks so highly of you, why don't you join the Hollow Investigative Association?
texts.Option01_100805: I think I'll pass... I prefer a peaceful life
texts.Option02_100805: I'd arrest you first to show my sincerity in joining them.
texts.Message_100806: Just kidding, how could I let my best partner jump ship?
texts.Message_100807: Let's make this awesome partnership last!
texts.Message_100808: Next time Andrew has a job, you already know, I'll be coming to you.

texts.Message_101102: A new Hollow has appeared, but no Carrots for it have hit the market yet.
texts.Message_101103: Given the situation, the very first Carrot could be sold for an astronomical price on Inter-Knot!
texts.Message_101104: I just need to hire a Proxy to go into the Hollow and be the first to draw up a Carrot, and then... hee-hee...
texts.Message_101106: I can always trust you to be quick!
texts.Message_101107: ...Don't abandon me. Without you, I can't do anything!
texts.Message_101108: Observations show this newly generated sub-Hollow has a complex structure.
texts.Message_101109: I've prepared several remote-controlled cars for you. You'll be able to explore the paths more efficiently with them.
texts.Message_101110: Well then... I'll be waiting to hear some good news?
texts.Option02_101111: Have the payment ready and wait for my message.

texts.Message_101201: The remote-controlled cars have sent the info back! Awesome! There's enough info to draw up a Carrot!
texts.Message_101202: You aced it! I can sell it on Inter-Knot after some touch-ups. Hahahahaha!
texts.Message_101208: I'm seriously fed up with this blasted Hollow!
texts.Option02_101209: Are you trying to avoid paying up?
texts.Message_101210: ...No. Eugh, it's not your problem, old friend.
texts.Message_101211: The Association just issued a warning about active mutation going on in the sub-Hollow...
texts.Message_101214: Active mutations will change the paths in the Hollow, meaning our efforts in drawing up a Carrot will have been in vain.
texts.Option02_101215: Hold on. I don't work for free.
texts.Message_101216: Don't worry. You and I go way back. I won't pay you a dime less!
texts.Message_101217: These are the kind of risks I have to take to make a living from the Hollows...
texts.Message_101218: You don't have to say anything, old friend... That's the way the cookie crumbles... *sobbing*
texts.Message_101219: But if you feel for me, make sure to prioritize completing my work in the future!

texts.Message_101501: This commission is for a comprehensive investigation into the daily patrol routes of Bangboo in the metro.
texts.Message_101502: Is it true about Bangboo getting kidnapped?
texts.Message_101503: Are there any hazards along the metro tracks that could threaten our Bangboo lords — I mean, that could easily damage Bangboo?
texts.Message_101504: Please investigate in detail — every nook and cranny. Don't leave any stone unturned!
texts.Option02_101505: What was that word after "Bangboo"? I couldn't read it properly.
texts.Message_101507: I'm just thinking of shareholders' interests, that's all!
texts.Message_101508: But if you do see a Bangboo in distress during your investigation, please help them out.
texts.Message_101509: This request has nothing to do with whether or not I'm a Bangboophile... Bangboo are important corporate assets that require proper maintenance and care.
texts.Message_101510: Ah, yes, I remember the company spent a lot of money on installing a rather advanced and efficient elevator system in order to increase the efficiency of inspections.
texts.Message_101511: Careful use of these elevators may just help your investigation.

texts.Message_101602: Tell me, what's really going on?
texts.OptionLong01_101603: The good news is that this expense is real, so that rules out the possibility of fraud.
texts.OptionLong02_101603: The bad news is that the Bangboo have indeed been damaged. The elevator system is too complex for their pathfinding programs to process, so they often wander off down dead ends or off high platforms by mistake.
texts.Message_101605: Ah no, that would mean that...
texts.Message_101608: Tell me you have more good news?
texts.Message_101609: Please tell me the Bangboo lords are out of harm's way, hiding away safely somewhere waiting for the company to pick them up...
texts.Option01_101610_1: I actually do have more good news.
texts.OptionLong02_101610: There really is more good news: The Bangboo damage is real, so any chance of fraud can been ruled out.
texts.Message_101611: The original reason for agreeing to fund the elevator system at the shareholder meeting was to make it easier for Bangboo patrols to operate.
texts.Message_101612: I never thought it would end up taking the lives of Bangboo lords!
texts.Option01_101614: All that money was poured into building this elevator system... for Bangboo?!
texts.Message_101615: I just really like Bangboo, okay?
texts.Message_101617: Waaah... My Bangboo lords, just wait...
texts.Message_101618: I'll be sure to do you justice at the next shareholder meeting...
texts.OptionLong01_101610: I'm sorry. The Bangboo have indeed been damaged. The elevator system is too complex for their pathfinding programs to process, so they often wander off down dead ends or off high platforms by mistake.
texts.Option02_101610: The Bangboo really have been damaged.

texts.Message_101701: Here's a commission fresh from the oven!
texts.Message_101702: The client has hired us to rescue her friend, Abigail, who is a Hollow investigator.
texts.Option01_101703: Isn't this something the Hollow Investigative Association would deal with?
texts.Option02_101703: Wouldn't it be safer to ask for help from the Hollow Investigative Association?
texts.Message_101704: Well... Abigail went on a rescue mission, and so far everything's been quiet. There's no indication she's encountered any accidents.
texts.Message_101705: She only dreamed of her friend and her favorite Bangboo, Little Beetroot, being trapped in a strange Hollow.
texts.Message_101706: If she reported it to the Association, she would be dismissed as being paranoid and stressed.
texts.Message_101707: So she posted a commission, hoping that a Hollow Raider could check on her friend for her.
texts.Option01_101708: This sounds like the beginning of a horror film Anby would like.
texts.Option02_101708: Sounds like she can communicate with friends and family through telepathy.
texts.Message_101709: Abigail used to be my client...
texts.Message_101710: If something happens to her, I'll lose another source of income.
texts.Message_101711: So I hope you'll take on the job.
texts.Message_101712: If something really has happened, we'll be able to bring Abigail home.
texts.Message_101713: And if everything is fine, it's just an overly-worried friend, and we still earn our fee.

texts.Message_101802: Otherwise Abigail would have been done for.
texts.Message_101803: But due to your identity, the Hollow Investigative Association has no choice but to conceal your involvement in Abigail's rescue.
texts.Option01_101804: Such is the fate of a Proxy.
texts.Option02_101804: I'm just glad Abigail is safe.
texts.Message_101805: Indeed. Abigail is very grateful, she wants to thank you in person...
texts.Message_101806: Can you meet her if you have time?

texts.Message_101905: Am I not your most trustworthy partner who knows you best anymore?
texts.Option02_101907: The more important something is, the more expensive — right?
texts.Message_101908: Sorry to disappoint, but I'm fine... I just got a new client.
texts.Option01_101909: You didn't meet another sus person, did you?
texts.Message_101912: I didn't expect that their services spanned so wide. They even deliver into the Hollows.
texts.Message_101913: So, basically, some Hollow Raiders got stuck in a Hollow, and their mates commissioned Pegasos Logistics to deliver sedatives to them.
texts.Message_101914: Pegasos Logistics wants to work with an experienced Proxy to plan out an appropriate delivery route inside the Hollow.
texts.Message_101915: Pegasos Logistics will assign a courier to carry out the delivery using the route planned.
texts.Message_101916: I've looked into it, and there doesn't seem to be anything fishy about this commission.
texts.Message_101917: But seeing as it's a new client, I decided it would be best to leave it to my most reliable and understanding partner: you.

texts.Message_102001: Are you in the Hollow yet?
texts.Message_102002: Did you meet up with the delivery guy from Pegasos Logistics yet?
texts.Message_102003: Where'd you go? The Pegasos courier said he never saw you?
texts.Message_102005: Please reply if you see this
texts.Message_102008: Earlier on, Pegasos mentioned that their courier never saw you.
texts.Option02_102010: I did the commission with the courier
texts.Message_102012: Could Pegasos Logistics have double dispatched couriers?
texts.Message_102013: Anyway... As long as you're fine, that's all that matters!
texts.Option01_102014: ...Would Pegasos Logistics really mess up on something like this?
texts.Option02_102015: Are you saying the guy who completed the commission with me wasn't even our courier...?
texts.Message_102017: I got paid, and they even gave more than agreed upon!
texts.Option02_102019: You really are my "most trustworthy partner..."
texts.Message_102020: I'll be in touch when there's another commission.

texts.Message_102101: Thank you for accepting my commission!
texts.Message_102102: I heard this weird story from my boss.
texts.Message_102103: I'm sure it must be true...
texts.Message_102104: I swear it on my boss' life!

texts.Message_102203: Eous just said, "We need to talk..."
texts.Message_102204: Nothing good ever came from "we need to talk," right?
texts.Message_102205: But Eous rarely asks for anything, so I think we should respect whatever it has to say.
texts.Message_102206: We need to keep a close eye on its development.
texts.Option02_102207: Like taking care of a rebellious teen?
texts.Message_102208: It really does feel like that
texts.Message_102209: I'm starting to worry about why Eous is looking for you

texts.Message_102301: Did Eous go looking for you again?
texts.Message_102304: If you two aren't colluding, then... Then that means Eous has its own agenda.
texts.Message_102305: Maybe it's connected to those friends of it?
texts.Message_102306: 18 said it went off toward the gadget store. Let's go check it out

texts.Message_102401: Meet me at the usual spot.
texts.Option02_102402: I think you sent that to the wrong person?
texts.Message_102403: Oops, sorry! I forgot to mention that I'm the one who helped you haul those goods in the Hollow last time, and I asked for your contact info afterwards, remember? Cargo! Sedatives!
texts.Option01_102404: I thought you worked for Pegasos!?
texts.Message_102405: I apologize. I actually have nothing to do with Pegasos. I was just looking for good folks like you to help out. There's no way I could've rescued all those trapped people by myself.
texts.Message_102406: Let's discuss the details when we meet at our usual spot. There're still plenty of sedatives left behind, so if we go grab them, we could help even more people.
texts.Option01_102407: I got the wrong person last time.
texts.OptionLong01_102407: I got the wrong person last time. I won't be showing up this time.
texts.OptionLong02_102407: I was careless last time. I won't be showing up this time.
texts.Message_102408: Come on! We can't just abandon all those people trapped in the Hollow waiting on the sedatives to survive! If we don't retrieve the sedatives, they'll be destroyed by Ethereals.
texts.Message_102409: Don't worry, I'll compensate you for your efforts. I'm sending you a commission as we speak, that's why I just logged on. Hurry over! I'm waiting for you!

texts.Message_102503: It'd be great if you could get the truck too. Can you drive? No, just driving won't be enough. Do you know how to upright an overturned truck and then drive it back?
texts.Message_102505: Thanks a bunch! Just give it your best shot! And if you can't bring back the truck, at least bring back the cargo!
texts.Message_102506: Alright... getting back the cargo is good enough! The company cares more about customers' orders than the vehicles.
texts.Message_102507: Oh, by the way, I've reached out to a good coworker of mine to help if he happens to pass by that Hollow. If you see him by my truck, give him a hand. Rest assured, I'll pay no matter who brings back the cargo!
texts.Message_102509: You're a lifesaver! Thank you! Thank you so much!!

texts.Message_102701: I'm ready to go whenever. Hit me up when you're ready. It's another delivery task just like last time.
texts.Option01_102702: So, you're going through all this trouble to give away the sedatives you worked so hard to collect?
texts.OptionLong01_102702: So, you're going through all this trouble to give away the sedatives you worked so hard to collect? What exactly are you doing this for?
texts.Option02_102702: What exactly are you doing this for?
texts.OptionLong02_102702: So, you're going through all this trouble to give away the sedatives you worked so hard to collect? What exactly are you doing this for?
texts.Message_102703: Nothing, really. It's just something I feel I must do. I'm not after any gain, it's more about settling a debt. But, the person I owed... isn't around anymore.
texts.Message_102704: Well, don't dig too deep into it. Look at my name, I'm just a humble courier. It doesn't matter which company I'm working for, I mean it.
texts.Message_102705: My only goal is to deliver the goods to those in need. Let's go.

texts.Message_200101: Hello. Could you prove that you are a frequent and experienced visitor of the Hollows?
texts.Option01_200102: There are crooked Bangboo merchants in the Hollows.
texts.Message_200104: Yes indeed, that's a weird joke that frequent visitors of the Hollows make.
texts.Message_200105: I'll send the coordinates of the signal source to you when you reach the Hollow's entrance.
texts.Message_200107: You made the 32nd comment on my post, and 32 is my lucky number.
texts.Message_200108: Please refrain from prying too much into my privacy. You can depart when you are ready.

texts.Message_200201: Thank you for completing this commission. I'll pay the commission fee as promised.
texts.Message_200202: I'm surprised you managed to convince the Bangboo merchants to return the resources.
texts.Message_200203: I really appreciate your help this time!
texts.Option01_200204: You knew the merchants would be there?
texts.Option02_200204: You knew about the merchants but didn't tell me?
texts.Message_200205: Uh... no. That's not the case.
texts.Message_200206: You were the one who brought up the merchants before. Or perhaps you forgot?
texts.Message_200207: Anyway, this commission has come to an end.
texts.OptionLong01_200208: You must have looked for the resources in the Hollow before, right? You didn't want to pay the merchants the staggering price they asked for, so you posted the commission on Inter-Knot.
texts.Message_200209: Regardless, I've paid you what I promised on Inter-Knot. Please stop pestering me.
texts.OptionLong01_200212: Based on the search and comparisons conducted on your initials and lucky number, I deduce that you are Della, a Hollow investigator.
texts.Message_200215: I'm working hard for a promotion this year, but the promotion assessment has already cost me the bulk of my savings.
texts.Message_200216: I couldn't afford the Gear Coins those crooked merchants demanded.
texts.Message_200217: In desperation, I hid some of my information and posted the commission on Inter-Knot.
texts.Message_200218: Please don't tell the Association. My promotion is depending on this!
texts.Message_200219: I'll definitely find a way to make up for your loss! I—I can work for free!
texts.OptionLong01_200220: You can slowly pay me back for my loss when your assessment is over. I can accept installments...
texts.Message_200221: Thank you so much! I'll pay you back once I get the promotion and a raise!

texts.Message_200301: Is it true that you're willing to help me with my experiment!?
texts.Message_200303: Shouldn't you be more hyped up about it?
texts.Message_200304: You're going to witness the first explosion of the greatest bomb in New Eridu!
texts.Message_200305: I guess the meaning of this commission hasn't sunk in for you yet!
texts.Message_200306: It's a super bomb I invented for the sake of New Eridu and all humanity!
texts.Message_200307: Although it only involves a modification and an upgrade to its explosive force, the impact of the change is going to be immeasurable!
texts.Message_200310: Yes, yes! That's what is so exciting!
texts.Message_200311: Also, I wish to enter the Hollow with you to be the first to admire my work. I hope it's not too much to ask...
texts.Message_200312: I promise I won't be a burden; I'll be waiting for you in the safe area!
texts.Option02_200313: See you in the Hollow later.

texts.Message_200402: It's coming! It's coming! Ohhhh! It's gonna be huge!
texts.Option02_200403: You need to quit scrolling through your phone in the bathroom.
texts.Message_200404: No, no! I mean my inspiration is coming! This brainstorming is pure gold! The ideas are flowing, and I'll re-create... No! I'll make an even better bomb!
texts.Message_200405: I can't wait to experiment with new explosions. This time it'll be a big bang!
texts.Option01_200406: Let's confirm the test site first...
texts.OptionLong01_200406: Let's confirm the test site first... It's inside the Hollow, right?
texts.Option02_200406: The test site is inside the Hollow, right?
texts.OptionLong02_200406: Let's confirm the test site... It's inside the Hollow, right?
texts.Message_200407: Of course, where else could it be? Alright, I gotta build the bomb while I'm feeling inspired. Wait for my good news!

texts.Message_200501: Thank you so much! I thought I would mess up the anniversary!
texts.Option01_200502: It's no big deal. Is there anything I should be aware of?
texts.Option02_200502: Is there anything else you need?
texts.Message_200504: Just get me to the place where my girlfriend and I first developed feelings for each other in the Hollow.
texts.Option01_200505: Can your girlfriend make it there on her own?
texts.Message_200506: My girlfriend... has a strong Ether aptitude.
texts.Message_200507: She asked me to meet her at the place we first had feelings for each other.
texts.Option01_200508: Should I bring pickled seaweed for you?
texts.Option02_200508: Should I provide some seaweed bentos for you?
texts.Option01_200510: I thought you would love it.
texts.Option02_200510: I thought this kind of service would be a plus.
texts.Message_200511: If you don't mind, please stop talking about seaweed.
texts.Message_200512: If you're ready, meet me at the coordinates of the Hollow entrance!
texts.Message_200513: Just call my name when you're there.

texts.OptionLong01_200602: I'm silently cursing those who beat around the bush when texting.
texts.Message_200604: Come on. I've brought you a commission as new as freshly fallen oranges!
texts.Message_200605: The Tangerine Network has a batch of verification devices scattered throughout a Hollow.
texts.Message_200606: After being activated by Ether, these devices will generate captchas all over the place, obstructing the way of investigators.
texts.Message_200607: They aren't dangerous, but they can be a nuisance as one needs to follow the traffic lights even on a one-way street.
texts.Message_200608: So they decided to have the devices destroyed.
texts.Option01_200609: Don't they have their own corporate investigators?
texts.Option02_200609: They outsource their work to Hollow Raiders?
texts.Message_200610: It's an outsourcing job posted by a Tangerine Network corporate investigator.
texts.Option01_200611: An easy job being outsourced... Sounds dodgy to me.
texts.Option02_200611: The job's so challenging that it requires the help of Phaethon?
texts.Message_200612: The client is highly nearsighted, and the captchas generated by the verification devices are just... dazzling...
texts.Option02_200613: How did he pass the vision test
texts.Message_200614: I heard that he memorized the entire eye test chart in order to pass the health check...
texts.Message_200615: To keep his condition a secret, he's willing to offer a handsome reward for such a simple task.
texts.Message_200616: This is as easy as picking up money by the roadside.
texts.Message_200618: After passing verification, you'll arrive at the control room.
texts.Message_200619: Inside there'll be a huge red button.
texts.Message_200620: Just press it to activate the verification device's self-destruct program.
texts.Message_200621: It's a simple job! It's as easy as taking a stroll down Sixth Street!

texts.Message_200702: The client was singing your praises.
texts.Message_200703: You're the best worker among all the Proxies I know!
texts.Message_200705: The only thing is, you've done too nice a job.
texts.Message_200706: His supervisor was so impressed, he intends to put our client in charge of all security verification equipment dismantling in the future.
texts.Option02_200707: Is this our long-term meal ticket?
texts.Message_200709: What a great bargain — uh, I mean, what good business for us.
texts.Message_200711: Of course, you will get a slight raise in your rates.
texts.Message_200712: I'll talk to the client about it.

texts.Message_200803: Bad news: Jonathan Medical has developed an intraocular lens that could significantly improve vision. So, Andrew decided to get the implant.
texts.Option01_200804: That is indeed bad for us.
texts.Option02_200804: I suppose you have good news for me too?
texts.Message_200805: The good news is, he is a volunteer for the procedure, which is still in the trial phase, and there is a chance that it might fail.
texts.Message_200806: The medical technology is still in the experimental phase, with a 30% rate of causing total blindness.
texts.Message_200807: If Andrew loses his eyesight, he'll have to assign more work to us, right?
texts.Option02_200808: I don't think he can be an investigator anymore if that happens...
texts.Message_200809: But there's no point in dwelling on that now... He sent us a new commission before the surgery.
texts.Message_200810: As usual, enter the Hollow, pass the captchas for the verification devices, go to the control room, and activate the communication network.
texts.Message_200811: You know the drill. You could probably do it with your eyes closed!

texts.Option01_200900: Commission completed. How did it go?
texts.OptionLong01_200900: Commission done. How was the client's feedback?
texts.Option02_200900: The commission was completed with ease.
texts.OptionLong02_200900: The commission was completed as effortlessly as always.
texts.Message_200901: You've done a fantastic job, my friend
texts.Message_200902: For this quality of service, I think I could totally double your pay!
texts.Option02_200903: Thinking this is the last commission from the client makes me feel kind of sad...
texts.Message_200904: Speaking of which, you ready for some good news?
texts.Message_200905: Good news for real this time, even my conscience agrees.
texts.Message_200907: The client's eyes exhibited severe rejection of the lens.
texts.Message_200908: His eyes are covered in secretions every morning
texts.Message_200909: Feeling frustrated, he went to the hospital to have the lens removed.
texts.Message_200910: Now, we've secured a steady source of income, and Andrew has, well, he's given a surgical option a shot.
texts.Message_200911: Don't you think this is good news? Isn't our expectation of good news a tad too high?
texts.Message_200912: We get to secure a stable income, and our client doesn't lose his eyesight.
texts.Message_200913: It's a happy ending for everyone from all perspectives!

texts.Message_201001: Oooh, it's the Proxy... Finally, someone who understands me! Thank you for taking on my commission!
texts.Message_201002: Just to be safe, we should enter Weiss VII through a less active Companion Hollow...
texts.Message_201003: ...Have I been talking too much? I'm sorry, you're the expert in Hollows. I'm just here to get my data.
texts.Message_201005: Also I wanted to say, thanks for taking this commission!
texts.Message_201006: Together, let's prove to people how perfect my plan is!

texts.Message_201101: I had begun to doubt whether I was in fact talented, and whether this plan was in fact as flawless as I thought...
texts.Message_201102: But now, it's pretty clear to me that it's only thanks to such an outstanding Proxy like yourself that we're able to achieve such grand results.
texts.Message_201103: Allow me to express my gratitude once more.
texts.Option01_201104: Great. Looking forward to our next collab
texts.Option02_201104: Don't take such risks next time
texts.Message_201105: Of course! My research will go on as long as I breathe!
texts.Message_201106: Thank you for saying that... I'm not really that stubborn, but scientific breakthroughs always require just a little bit of risk, right?
texts.Message_201108: I just got a disappearing message. It's a video of someone eating a hat.
texts.Message_201109: I can't quite remember what that was all about
texts.Message_201110: ...But this guy looks just like my professor back in college.

texts.Message_201203: Oops... I'm sorry! Let me look for the recall button!
texts.Message_201205: I heard asking "You there?" is the third most common mistake made by newbies!
texts.Message_201206: Time is money... Getting straight to the point is the right thing to do!
texts.Message_201207: Here's the thing: My name is Dana, a new employee of Belo... I mean... a heavy industry corporation. I accidentally lost an important sample my boss collected from the depths of a Hollow...
texts.Message_201208: My boss is an alpha female. I really can't afford to let her learn of my mistake...
texts.Message_201209: A kind senior recommended your excellent service to me so that I can make things right before my boss finds out!
texts.Option01_201210: The company is Belobog Heavy Industries, isn't it?
texts.Message_201212: Anyway, Ben has given me permission to use the heavy drill rig... To collect the samples, I just have to place the rig in the right weak spot in the Hollow and let it run by itself.
texts.Message_201213: But the sound of the drill rig will attract a lot of Ethereals... So, I need your help in protecting it.
texts.Message_201214: I need you to keep the drill rig safe until sample collection is complete... Then I can rectify my mistake!
texts.Message_201215: Please do this favor for me... Ben has issued me my year-end bonus in advance, so I'll pay you handsomely!
texts.Message_201217: Okay... I'm counting on you, then!

texts.Message_201301: Wow, you knocked out that commission so quickly!
texts.Message_201302: The drill rig and the samples have been retrieved, and we even did it within the time limit stipulated in my machine permission slip!
texts.OptionLong01_201303: Hold on. Speaking of permission... I've worked with Belobog Heavy Industries before.
texts.Option01_201304: Your boss treats those machines like her family.
texts.OptionLong01_201304: As far as I remember, that alpha boss of yours treats all important machines like her family. She never lets others issue the machine use permission on her behalf.
texts.Option02_201304: She doesn't let anyone else handle it.
texts.Message_201307: Are you saying that Grace has known about my mistake all along, and she was giving me the chance to remedy the situation?
texts.Option02_201309: It's alright as long as everything turns out well.
texts.Message_201311: Crying in front of colleagues is the 24th workplace taboo for newbies!
texts.Message_201312: Thank you so much for your help. I'll go calm myself down...
texts.Message_201313: I'll never ever make such a basic mistake again!

texts.Message_201402: This explosive is the most significant milestone in my life. When I look back at my life in the future, it will be my brightest moment...
texts.Message_201403: If one day I should ever perish, please bury it next to me so that we may remain together forever...
texts.Option02_201404: Why'd you have to go straight to "perish"...
texts.Message_201405: I'm just so moved. You have no idea what this bomb means to me.
texts.OptionLong01_201406: I invented this super bomb for New Eridu and all humanity!
texts.Option02_201406: I don't really want to know
texts.Message_201407: Oh, my friend. I knew I was right to share this moment with you. You get me!
texts.Message_201408: I invented this super bomb for New Eridu and all humanity!
texts.Option01_201409: Can we talk about the commission now?
texts.Option02_201409: You're here about a new commission, right?
texts.Message_201410: I've prepared everything required for the patent application of the bomb this time, but I need data to back my application.
texts.Message_201411: I've optimized the energy conversion system again. It's more powerful now, and it can stack the energy effects of multiple crystalline conversions.
texts.Message_201412: So I need you to help take out Ethereals and collect Gear Coins for crystals, experiment on different types of explosives, and record the data
texts.Option01_201413: See you at the usual place, then

texts.OptionLong02_201502: You're too polite, censoring your own profanity
texts.Message_201503: I can't believe those people said that the source of my data cannot be verified!
texts.Message_201504: They said I wasn't qualified to enter the Hollow, so this batch of data couldn't be validated, and my masterpiece couldn't be patented!
texts.Message_201505: So then I said, how do I apply for Hollows credentials then?
texts.Message_201506: And they said I can submit an application as long as I become a scientist first, meet certain qualifications, and get recognized by the board, and they would send an investigator to go in with me
texts.Message_201507: The thing is, I can't be an officially recognized scientist without a patent of my own!
texts.Option01_201508: Can I just have the short version?
texts.Message_201509: I'm going to blow up the entire New Eridu!
texts.Message_201510: One day, I'm going to blow up this godforsaken New Eridu!
texts.Message_201513: Just kidding. I may love explosives but I'm not a violent criminal
texts.Message_201514: I'm crazy about explosives because the moment they explode, they solve all problems and disasters.
texts.Message_201515: I was once trapped under thick concrete slabs during a disaster, and in the prolonged darkness, I gradually gave up on survival
texts.Message_201516: Until, with a monstrous ringing explosion, this shaft of light cut through the darkness
texts.Message_201517: And at that very moment I thought to myself, "One of these days, I'm going to build a bomb that can save even more people and give them even more hope"
texts.Message_201518: Thanks for listening to all of that. I'll see what I can do about the bomb

texts.Message_201601: I'm sorry I had to leave so suddenly!
texts.Message_201602: It suddenly occurred to me that the place my girlfriend mentioned wasn't even in the Hollow...
texts.Option02_201603: How could you get that wrong?
texts.Message_201604: No, I think we've got our wires crossed!
texts.Message_201605: I fell in love with my girlfriend at first sight, so I assumed we both already had feelings for each other during our first encounter.
texts.Message_201606: But I suddenly remembered how I spent a very long time pursuing her after we left the Hollow...
texts.Message_201607: She had been hesitant in the beginning.
texts.Message_201608: It wasn't until the day we met at a coffee shop that she finally agreed to go out with me.
texts.Option01_201609: I have no interest in your love story...
texts.Message_201610: She's calling me again! I have to go!
texts.Message_201611: Anyway, I'm really grateful for your help, and I'll pay you your reward as promised!

texts.Message_202101: Hey kid, have you heard of the Seven Urban Mysteries of New Eridu.
texts.Message_202102: Like the stories of "The Ballet Dancer," "The Midnight Fairy Godmother," and "Wall-facing Teenager" Oh... and especially the "Bangboo Golden Town!"
texts.Message_202103: The Bangboo Golden Town appears from time to time in the Hollows like a mirage...
texts.Message_202104: Anything your fingers there touch turns into money — well, that's how the story goes at least.
texts.Message_202105: Now, it's said Bangboo Golden Town has shown up in a Hollow again!
texts.Message_202106: Quite a few customers have approached me willing to pay serious amounts for intel...
texts.Message_202107: Are you interested in investigating? The pay is good!
texts.Message_202109: I'll wait for your good news then.

texts.Message_202201: It's hard to believe the Golden Town is a place like this.
texts.Message_202202: This report is going to be handy!
texts.Message_202204: You seem to be in a good mood. Have you done your daily good deed?
texts.Message_202206: With money as a catalyst, happiness and misfortune both find it easier to flourish, the Golden City really is an interesting place.
texts.Message_202207: I hope you'll continue the investigation the next time it appears.
texts.Message_202208: Here's your commission fee... Don't be a stranger, old friend!

texts.Message_202301: I'm waiting for the great Proxy in the Hollow.
texts.Message_202302: Let's teach those little Bangboo a lesson together! (Clenching fists)
texts.Option02_202303: What do I have to do?
texts.Message_202304: Meet with me, then I need you to visit the Bangboo merchants with me and talk to them.
texts.Message_202305: My senior hasn't brought me to that Hollow before, so I'm not sure whether there'll be enemies or other possible dangers.
texts.Message_202306: Let's just play it by ear! We can make it!
texts.Message_202307: I'm a newbie, but your account level isn't that high either... (Is it rude to say so?)
texts.Message_202308: But it's just restocking. How hard can it be?

texts.Message_202401: Sorry, I just saw your message.
texts.Message_202402: I was just talking to my senior on the phone...
texts.Message_202404: I have no reason to complain! Honestly, it's great to have your help.
texts.Message_202405: My senior would never compliment a rookie like me who has to hire a Proxy out of my own pocket to get my work done...
texts.Message_202406: I just told my senior that the restocking had been completed smoothly, and any mishaps that happened during the process had been taken care of with the help of a Proxy.
texts.Message_202407: I didn't want him to worry about me during his off day.
texts.Message_202408: But then I realized my senior didn't take the day off.
texts.Message_202409: Instead, he went out to deal with a turf war between some Bangboo merchants who had just moved into a Companion Hollow...
texts.Message_202411: Yeah, I have a hard time picturing those little things fighting each other too.
texts.Message_202412: My senior said the situation was too complicated for me. He didn't want me to get involved, so he didn't bring me along.
texts.Message_202413: I can understand... As long as I remain in this industry, I believe I'll become someone as capable as my senior one day.
texts.Message_202414: By supporting the Bangboo merchants, I can help the people who are in dire need of survival supplies and support human exploration of the Hollows...
texts.Message_202415: This thought always fills me with enthusiasm!
texts.Message_202418: I have to stop paying to get my work done! ...Or try, at least.

texts.Message_202502: I believe you won't betray my trust
texts.Message_202504: Here are the coordinates for The Prophecy

texts.Message_202613: Look at that, it's time I get off work
texts.Message_202614: I really hope we get another chance to work together, friend

texts.Message_202701: Hello, I'm the OP from the post!
texts.Message_202702: I'll leave Dadd-E's Hollow exploration training to you, then!
texts.Option01_202703: What exactly is it you want me to do?
texts.Message_202704: I'll upload it into a self-driving car. You plot out a path for it through the Hollow and train it to mimic your pathing
texts.Message_202705: And it always focuses on improving its rating level, which reminds me all too much of my workaholic father...
texts.Message_202706: So it's best to work out a clear rating system to make sure it's happy
texts.Option01_202707: Anything else I need to do?
texts.Message_202708: Shouldn't be anything else... Oh yeah, just one more thing!
texts.Message_202709: It can be a little chatty at times... and a little stubborn at others... and maybe just a little bit annoying sometimes? Basically, please be patient with it

texts.Option01_202801: I've found the Public Security Officer's "daughter."
texts.OptionLong01_202801: Turns out the officer's daughter is an autocart, but I'm not too surprised. After all, some people's dads are...
texts.Option02_202801: Both her "daughter" and your "Dad" are both quite out of the ordinary.
texts.OptionLong02_202801: For some reason, I feel like your Dadd-E and the officer's daughter could be family.
texts.Message_202803: Wouldn't it be a heartwarming story? A cyber father figure rescuing a mech daughter.
texts.OptionLong01_202804: But I can't give Dadd-E back to you just yet.
texts.OptionLong02_202804: I'm sorry I can't give Dadd-E back to you just yet.
texts.Message_202805: !!! Why won't you keep your word!? Proxy! Give me back my Dadd-E!
texts.Option01_202806: Your Dadd-E is simply too unique
texts.OptionLong01_202806: Your Dadd-E has already formed a basic sense of self-consciousness, which is exceedingly rare. I don't think this is something you could research and develop on your own.
texts.OptionLong02_202806: Your Dadd-E has already formed a basic sense of self-consciousness, which is exceedingly rare. I don't think this is something you could research and develop on your own.
texts.Message_202807: But what does this have to do with our commission?
texts.OptionLong01_202808: Unless I'm mistaken, you must have connections to the Marcel Group. I don't want to get caught up in any trouble.
texts.OptionLong02_202808: Unless I'm mistaken, you must have connections to the Marcel Group. I don't want to get caught up in any trouble.
texts.Message_202809: Oh, no, no, no. Don't worry, I'm not with the Marcel Group. I got my hands on a prototype of their trial AI algorithm by chance. I imported some data into it myself, and just like that, Dadd-E was born.
texts.Message_202810: The data I imported had nothing to do with the Marcel Group. It's just a bunch of messages and records left behind by my own dad. I might've groaned about how much of a pain he was, but I actually really miss him...
texts.Option01_202811: So that's the story behind it
texts.Message_202812: My dad was a very curious man but he had a disability that prevented him from doing a lot of things when he was alive
texts.Message_202813: Through Dadd-E, I feel like I'm making up for some of my past regrets... Also, you said Dadd-E was already forming a basic sense of self-consciousness.. Was that true?
texts.Message_202815: I... I didn't really think this model was actually that powerful! Plus I never thought my dad would come back to me like this!
texts.OptionLong01_202816: I understand you're excited right now, but you have to stay lowkey. Plus, in the end, it's an AI algorithm, and not your real father
texts.OptionLong02_202816: I understand you're excited right now, but you have to stay lowkey. Plus, in the end, it's an AI algorithm, and not your real father
texts.Message_202817: I understand! But even so, I'm happy with that, so I won't go telling anyone about it!
texts.Option01_202818: I'll leave Dadd-E at the Hollow entrance

texts.Message_202902: I'll show my bro once he's better!
texts.Message_202905: My bro's been learning foreign languages from his delivery truck friends
texts.Message_202906: Day or night, there's always the roar of motor engines
texts.Message_202907: Before finally, he passed out from working so hard!
texts.Option01_202908: I think all those noises were because your bro is broken
texts.Option01_202909: Your bro is working so hard!!!
texts.Message_202910: I hope he can get some rest...
texts.Message_202911: I've got lots of mates outside I wanna introduce him to!

texts.Message_203001: Hey, remember when the circuit breaker tripped last time? My friend just messaged, saying three maintenance teams have been sent in to start overhauling the power system on the street
texts.Message_203002: He also said that the circuit might trip again, or maybe nothing will happen — but in any case, just a heads-up. Go up to the street and check it out if you like!
texts.Option02_203003: I'm mentally prepared for the circuit to trip!

texts.Message_203101: Sorry to interrupt. I'm Kousaka, and I suppose you remember me?
texts.Message_203104: Please don't kid around with me
texts.Message_203105: It's me, leader of the engineering team at Three Gates Corp... We've met before
texts.Message_203106: I commissioned you to go to Belobog Heavy Industries and inquire about intelligence mods for the cement mixers
texts.Message_203109: After you left, our technician modified the cement mixer
texts.Message_203110: The work is done, but things have become... pretty weird!
texts.Message_203113: I'm not sure what's the problem, either...
texts.Message_203114: Please, if you have any free time these days, come check out the site!

texts.Message_203201: Hello, are you available for commissions at the moment?
texts.Option01_203204: I don't understand what you're talking about...
texts.Message_203205: Well, you're pretty darn vigilant, aren't you?
texts.Message_203206: Please, don't worry — I'm not up to anything sketchy.
texts.Message_203207: I'm just a broker for Rally Commissions, that's all...
texts.Message_203208: We've worked with each other before
texts.Option01_203210: You really got the wrong guy!
texts.Message_203211: I see... Let's just take it as we've never met before, then
texts.Message_203212: So, my new friend, would you be willing to lend an ear to my work troubles?
texts.Message_203213: There's been this really tough Rally Commission recently that nobody is willing to take on
texts.Message_203214: I'm wondering if there's a kind soul out there who could lend a hand and check it out...
texts.Message_203216: I'm sure there'll always be some good Samaritans who're willing to help
texts.Message_203218: I've sent the commission to Good Samaritan in the system. Hopefully, my problem will be solved real soon!

texts.Message_100703: Hey, I saw your comment. Are you interested in the ghost train driver story?
texts.Message_100705: Then do you mind telling me which side you are on? You can skip the details and just tell me whether you're a doer or a spectator.
texts.Option01_100706: I'm a doer who also spectates.
texts.Message_100707: Haha... Your answer is odd, but reasonable
texts.Message_100708: The code word is: See you in half an hour
texts.Option01_100709: You're gonna give out the code word just like that?
texts.Option02_100709: That's not a very believable code word.
texts.Message_100713:
Stop! Don't get carried away! Let's get down to business.
Are you interested in the ghost train driver story?

texts.Message_100703: Hey, I saw your comment. Are you interested in the ghost train driver story?
texts.Message_100705: Then do you mind telling me which side you are on? You can skip the details and just tell me whether you're a doer or a spectator.
texts.Option01_100706: I'm a doer who also spectates.
texts.Message_100707: Haha... Your answer is odd, but reasonable
texts.Message_100708: The code word is: See you in half an hour
texts.Option01_100709: You're gonna give out the code word just like that?
texts.Option02_100709: That's not a very believable code word.
texts.Message_100713:
Stop! Don't get carried away! Let's get down to business.
Are you interested in the ghost train driver story?

texts.Message_203514: Ahhhhhh! My bomb!!! My patent!!! AHHHHHHH!
texts.Message_203515: I've got to make another one! It's the only way. If only I could recapture that inspiration... Let me think... I was in front of a video store on Sixth Street when inspiration struck me like lightning!
texts.Message_203516: The moment I set sight on the video store I started picturing what it would be like if it was blown up. I came up with the formula after that! Right! I'll visit the place again. I'm sure I can remember the formula!
texts.Message_203517: Right, to the video store! I'll comb through that place from top to bottom, every corner, from wall to wall...
texts.Option01_203518: Stop! That's not how you find inspiration! The Hollow! Go to the Hollow!
texts.OptionLong01_203518: You should visit the Hollow for inspiration, if you ask me! There are plenty of buildings that seem solid there!
texts.Option02_203518: Forget about the video store! The Hollow! Go to the Hollow!
texts.OptionLong02_203518: Forget about the video store! Why not just blow things up in the Hollow?
texts.Message_203519: ...The Hollow? That makes sense... I need to be better prepared this time around. A field trip might just set me up for the perfect explosion.
texts.Message_203520: You're into explosions too, right? I can tell. Let's go! I'll be waiting for you in the Hollow!

texts.Message_203603: This is roughly what it said, "Need more training examples!"
texts.Message_203604: It sounds so much like what my Dad would say...
texts.Message_203605: So, I wanted to ask... if you'd be open to adding another task to this commission.
texts.Option01_203606: I happen to have some training tasks suitable for Dadd-E!
texts.OptionLong01_203606: There's a Public Security Officer whose daughter has gone missing. The Pathfinding AI might come in handy... (Briefly elaborates on the details)
texts.Option02_203606: I happen to be facing an issue that Dadd-E can solve...
texts.OptionLong02_203606: There's a Public Security Officer whose daughter has gone missing. The Pathfinding AI might come in handy... (Briefly elaborates on the details)
texts.Message_203608: What are we waiting for? Let's go!
texts.Message_203609: Whether Dadd-E ends up being helpful or not, you absolutely have to bring the Public Security Officer's daughter back, Proxy!
texts.Message_203610: If Dad were still around, he would do the same thing too.
texts.Message_203611: That's all for my additional request!

texts.Message_300101: There's a mission that's been put up from inside the Association. It's quite the feast.
texts.Message_300102: They're planning on installing an observation station for gathering data inside the Hollow, and they're in urgent need of manpower.
texts.Message_300103: By taking this commission, you can hitch a ride and get more intel about the Hollows.
texts.Message_300104: You're the first person I hit up whenever I come across something this good.
texts.Option01_300105: You sure you're not just trying to lead me into a trap?
texts.Message_300106: We've known each other longer than I've been married to my wife. How could I ever hurt you?
texts.Message_300107: Because it's you, I feel safe in saying...
texts.Message_300108: The investigator handling this mission is a trusted old mate of mine
texts.Message_300109: And isn't an undercover agent lurking on Inter-Knot, waiting to for someone to take the bait.
texts.Option02_300110: If anything should happen to me, my family won't have mercy on you
texts.Message_300111: I'm a professional. How could I ever plot against my own clients?
texts.Message_300112: If you're not sure, why don't you go and meet her in Bangboo form?
texts.Message_300113: If anything seems wrong, just cut the connection to get out of there.
texts.Message_300114: And she also has some important information about this commission she's gotta tell you herself. It's something I can't relay to you.
texts.Message_300115: Seriously! What is there that's so important that I, Shepherd, can't hear?

texts.Message_970101: I just got out of Hollow C41, and I really hit the jackpot this time!
texts.Message_970102: Plus I got some new intel!
texts.Message_970103: We're old friends, I could never charge you anything for intel
texts.Message_970104: You're really gonna thank me this time, Phaethon!
texts.Option01_970105: I wasn't planning on paying for any intel
texts.Message_970106: I'm on the way to your video store right now. See you soon

texts.Message_970201:
#Willow Manor# With Golden Week just around the corner, we're excited to offer a variety of vacation packages! For an amazing deal, you and a guest can enjoy five days and four nights for just 29,999!
To book a vacation, reply with: 1.
To opt-out, reply with: I'm absolutely, positively, undeniably certain that I am not interested in the soothing sea breeze, not at all want to melt into those soft beds, and totally don't want to experience the meticulous service of a personal housekeeper this Golden Week. I don't want it, really don't, not even one bit.
texts.Message_970203: Dear customer: Despite your somewhat indifferent act, we understand you are merely hiding your enthusiasm deep within. Thank you for supporting Willow Manor. We will book you under our super VIP exclusive no-blame free-cancelation no-prepay elite class reservation. Willow Manor looks forward to your arrival.
texts.Message_970204: Wishing you a wonderful vacation — Willow Manor looks forward to your arrival!

texts.Message_970302: I found just the right helper to open the box! It's helped me open a bunch of stuff
texts.Message_970303: If you've got a supply box from out of C41, then come find me here at the newsstand

texts.Message_970501:
#Willow Manor# Dear VIP guest, you have successfully booked the Golden Week Premium Duo Package. Please make the full payment before your arrival.
Thank you for choosing Willow Manor. We are committed to providing you with the highest level of service.

We wish you a wonderful holiday and look forward to seeing you at Willow Manor!

texts.Message_970601:
#Willow Manor# Dear VIP guest, your Golden Week Premium Duo Package is approaching, please complete your payment prior to check-in.
In addition, we now offer a variety of gourmet meal options, all prepared by our guest chef for this special occasion. Treat yourself to a luxury experience you will never forget. To make a reservation, please call our front desk for more information.
Thank you for choosing Willow Manor. We are committed to providing you with the highest level of service.

We wish you a wonderful holiday and look forward to seeing you at Willow Manor!

texts.Message_970701:
#Willow Manor# Dear VIP guest, we regret to inform you that we've had to cancel your Golden Week Premium Duo Package because we did not receive the payment on time. Should you wish to rebook the package, please reach out to our front desk for more information.
We look forward to seeing you in the future and wish you a wonderful Golden Week holiday.

texts.Message_970801: {M#Wise, I think we should give Nicole a heads-up on the situation with Hollow C41...}{F#We've informed Nicole of the info we have on the situation with Hollow C41.}
texts.Message_970802: After all, I think she's getting a tad too into all this treasure hunting.
texts.Message_970803: Considering her obsession with money, I'm worried she might get trapped in Hollow C41 trying to find those alleged treasures.
texts.Message_970804: Besides, she might have some information we don't know yet.
texts.Option01_970805: I hope she stays alert and isn't blinded by her greed...
texts.Option02_970805: I hope she remembers to pay attention to other things than just treasure...
texts.Message_970806: Anyway, I've left her a message. Hopefully, she'll see it when she's out of the Hollow.

texts.Message_990301: It's been a while since we last spoke, hasn't it, friend?
texts.Message_990302: I have an easy commission for you!
texts.Option02_990303: You thought of me for a good gig for once?
texts.Message_990304: It's always a pleasure to speak with you.
texts.Message_990305: I promise, no tricks this time.
texts.Message_990306: The client's name is Andrew, a Hollow investigator.
texts.Message_990307: He needs our help rebooting some facilities left in the Hollow by Tangerine Network.
texts.Message_990308: It's super easy! You'll know what I mean when you get hands-on.
texts.Message_990310: Aren't you touched by how thoughtful I am? Oh, but you still gotta pay the service fee, even though it's my private account.
texts.Option01_990311: I was touched before you brought up the service fee.

texts.Message_990401: The client was singing your praises.
texts.Message_990404: The only thing is, you've done too nice a job.
texts.Message_990405: His supervisor was so impressed, he intends to put our client in charge of restarting all communication networks in the future.
texts.Option02_990406: Is this our long-term meal ticket?
texts.Message_990407: For Andrew, it's not exactly good news.
texts.Message_990408: His eyesight was pretty poor. I heard that he memorized the entire eye test chart in order to pass the health check to become an investigator.
texts.Message_990409: Unless he wants to add photosensitive epilepsy to his employment injury insurance, he'll have to rely on us for the time being.
texts.OptionLong01_990410: That's unfortunate. I'll give him a discount next time.
texts.Option02_990410: Give him a discount next time
texts.Message_990411: You haven't changed a bit, my friend, still got that heart of gold.
texts.Message_990412: I almost feel bad for skimming off the top and then jacking up the prices.
texts.Message_990413: I'll be in touch if there's another request to reboot any devices!

texts.Option02_990502: Is something wrong with your keyboard?

texts.Message_990601:
Are you a new Proxy just starting out? Let Inter-Knot incentives pave the way to a worry-free future!
Need Bangboo or W-Engine? Looking for professional agents' information? Don't you worry! From free Ether aptitude tests to the latest Carrot resources, everything a Proxy needs is on Inter-Knot! 
New Proxies, stay tuned for Inter-Knot benefit events. ☆☆☆ Open your smartphone ☆☆☆ to receive push notifications about our benefits, and claim your massive New Proxy Welcome Gift Bundle right away!

texts.Message_1010101: Hey, my Phaethon buddies. How's it going?
texts.Message_1010102: {M#Hey, Nekomata! It's been a while!}{F#Hi there, Nekomata. I haven't heard from you in a while}
texts.Option01_1010103: How are you doing at the Cunning Hares?
texts.Option02_1010103: How's everybody at the Cunning Hares?
texts.Message_1010105: Nicole and the others? They're doing all right
texts.Message_1010106: Our financial situation's a different story though...
texts.Message_1010107: {M#...You mean we still can't get our money back from the Cunning Hares?!}{F#I get it. You guys aren't going to pay your tab again this month}
texts.Message_1010108: {M#Wait a minute! Did you message just to share the bad news with us?! }{F#Nekomata, you didn't message just to tell us this, did you?}
texts.Message_1010109: Of course not! Though it is related slightly...
texts.Message_1010110: I'd like to ask you if you're interested in doing business with someone who's eagle-eyed, efficient, hardworking, and kind from the Cunning Hares?
texts.Option01_1010111: Is there such a person in the Cunning Hares?
texts.Message_1010112: I'll take that as a joke~
texts.Message_1010113: Absolutely, with me as your trusty assistant, your endeavors will undoubtedly soar to new heights!
texts.Message_1010114: If it's convenient, I can come to the store right now!
texts.Message_1010115: {M#Hold on! I need to talk to my brother about this first!}{F#Please wait. I have to discuss this with Belle first}

texts.Message_1010201: Guys, there's an update on Ollie's commission!
texts.Message_1010203: ...Hmm... Seems you've been so busy lately that you've forgotten our mutual client
texts.Message_1010204: It's that guy who likes to go "Aaaaaahhhhhhhhh—!"
texts.Message_1010206: Such a noticeable characteristic doesn't jog your memory?
texts.Message_1010207: It's that officer who pretended to be a corporate guide last time.
texts.Message_1010209: We're gonna be working as assistants to Public Security to help out with the investigation.
texts.Message_1010214: Proxy, you did that on purpose...
texts.Message_1010216: {M#That was on purpose, wasn't it, Wise? }{F#Stop teasing Nekomata, Belle.}
texts.Message_1010217: {M#C'mon and tell us what's new about the commission, Nekomata. }{F#You can tell us what's new about the commission now, Nekomata.}
texts.Message_1010218: Ollie told me their ultimate goal was to nab the gangsters who kept stealing lost Ether resources in the Hollows.
texts.Message_1010219: Our previous visit to the Hollow with him was only the first phase of the plan, just to get the word out.
texts.Message_1010220: Now, we're moving on to the second phase of the plan.
texts.Message_1010221: So what do we need to do this time?
texts.Message_1010222: Texting is too slow! I'll head over to your place right now!

texts.Message_1010301: Proxies, are you guys around? There's an update from Ollie.
texts.Option01_1010302: Is the result of the interrogation out?
texts.Message_1010304: It's almost time for the arrest. This time, we'll be offering remote assistance provided nothing goes wrong.
texts.Option02_1010305: This commission has been full of accidents so far.
texts.Message_1010306: {M#There've been some ups and downs, but it looks like our reward is right in front of us!}{F#There were a lot of surprises with this commission, but it's finally coming to a close.}
texts.Message_1010307: Yeah. Hopefully, everything works out fine.
texts.Message_1010308: {M#Nekomata, is it just me or do you not seem very enthusiastic about this?}{F#What's wrong, Nekomata? You seem to be implying something.}
texts.Message_1010309: Ollie told me about the next phase of the plan earlier today. There're a few details I'm concerned about.
texts.Message_1010310: I think we'd best discuss in-person before we head out.
texts.Message_1010311: I'll come over when you guys are free!

texts.Message_1020101: I need a favor from you, old friend...
texts.Message_1020104: You didn't save the info of your favorite intel broker!?
texts.Message_1020105: We've worked together for so long...
texts.Option02_1020106: You always give me the toughest jobs.
texts.Message_1020107: I promise to change my ways if you help me this time, or I might have to quit!
texts.Message_1020110: I got my hands on a big job at the expense of offending my peers, but I've been having a hard time securing a Proxy suitable for it!
texts.Message_1020111: A lot of things are at stake for this job, and the client wants to meet the Proxy personally. Can you help?
texts.Message_1020112: I have, of course, created a foolproof fake identity to protect your personal info!
texts.Option02_1020113: Just to get my career back on track.
texts.Message_1020114: Fine, we're trying to rebuild our reputation, so I have no choice but to lower my standards when taking on jobs.
texts.Message_1020115: I know you aren't being frank with me, youngster. It's okay to admit "you feel bad seeing me in this debacle."
texts.Message_1020116: How about you meet the client at the parking lot behind the video store?
texts.Message_1020117: How will you recognize them? Hmmm... I think you'll recognize her when you see her.
texts.Message_1020118: The code word is: Flame — Thunder.
texts.Message_1020119: Do you want to meet the client right now?

texts.Message_1020201: "Tonight, where we last saw each other. Don't be late."
texts.Message_1020202: The client asked me to give you this message...
texts.Option02_1020203: I'll try my best to be punctual.
texts.Message_1020205: I have a lot of questions, but I won't bring them up before the commission reaches the crucial stage.
texts.Message_1020206: My intelligence network is still under relentless attacks from my peers...
texts.Message_1020207: The last thing I want to do is to direct their attention to my favorite Proxy.
texts.Message_1020208: Get ready to go, old friend. I wish you good luck.
texts.Option01_1020209: I'll go meet up with Soldier 11 now

texts.Option02_1020302: Why is this unknown account harassing me again...
texts.Message_1020305: Do young kids these days like making fun of fragile old guys?
texts.Message_1020306: Then again... Since you're in the mood for jokes, I assume the commission is progressing smoothly?
texts.Message_1020307: Indeed, you never let me down. Only you could handle a client like this.
texts.Message_1020308: I almost forgot, the client asked you to "meet at the usual spot."
texts.Message_1020309: The "usual spot" again. I really have doubts about her counter-surveillance awareness.
texts.Message_1020310: That was the message. So do you want to go now?
texts.Option01_1020311: I'll go meet up with Soldier 11 now

texts.Message_1030101: Hi, I'm Ben from Belobog Heavy Industries...
texts.Message_1030103: The pile driver we were looking for has been found...
texts.Message_1030104: If possible, we'd like you to take us to it. Thanks...
texts.Option01_1030105: Ben, you seem to send a lot of ellipses?
texts.Message_1030106: Oh, do I? I'm sorry for not noticing before.
texts.Message_1030108: Am I? Hmm... Is it because I have a habit of using so many ellipses?
texts.Message_1030110: Anton's told me before, speaking like this lacks energy...
texts.Option01_1030112: But you look pretty scary when you frown!
texts.Option02_1030112: But you look pretty imposing when you frown!
texts.Message_1030114: I don't mean to frown. I'm nearsighted you see. Anton took my glasses away when he found out...
texts.Message_1030116: As a result, I've gained more respect from my subordinates, but I have to get so close to the screen until my nose touches it while using my phone to be able to read the small letters...
texts.OptionLong01_1030119: Don't trouble yourself. We can talk about the third machine on the phone. We'll call you.
texts.Option02_1030119: We should just do a phone call then!
texts.OptionLong02_1030119: Don't trouble yourself. We can talk about the third machine on the phone. We'll call you.
texts.Message_1030121: Then please call at your convenience.

texts.Option01_1040102: This avatar... Could this be Anton?
texts.Message_1040103: Hahaha, that's right! It's me! This is my personal account!
texts.Message_1040104: Hey, that's cold! I'm Anton from Belobog Heavy Industries! This is my personal account!
texts.Message_1040109: I'm contacting you today to tell you our president has finally made up her mind to go look for the prototype. You'll take on the commission, right?
texts.Option02_1040110: That depends on the commission fee!
texts.Message_1040111: Hahaha, great! I knew you guys would be down!
texts.Message_1040112: The president already has the payment ready. You won't be disappointed.
texts.Option01_1040113: Did Koleda and Grace make up?
texts.Option02_1040113: Are Koleda and Grace still arguing?
texts.Option01_1040117: What do you think of him, Anton?
texts.Option02_1040117: What do you think of the previous president, Anton?
texts.Message_1040119: Mr. Khors is my patron, and I don't believe he'd do something like running off with a bunch of money. That's my answer.
texts.Message_1040120: A real bro sometimes has to choose the path of being misunderstood.
texts.Message_1040122: Ah, but we've gotten off-track. In any case, we want to talk to you about finding the prototype!
texts.Message_1040126: If it's okay, could you please come and visit us in the morning?
texts.Option02_1040127: Looks like another early start for me
texts.Message_1040131: This time it involves Mr. Khors, so things got real.
texts.Message_1040132: But don't worry! They've been through thick and thin together. They'll definitely manage!

texts.Message_1050102: {M#Of course, you're the lead tech from Belobog Heavy Industries. Grace, right?}{F#Of course, you're Grace — lead tech at Belobog Heavy Industries, right?}
texts.Message_1050103: Do you, on the other hand, remember who we are?
texts.Message_1050104: Of course! You're the owners of that lovely little modded Bangboo named Eous!
texts.Message_1050105: {M#... So you actually only remember Eous?}{F#Isn't that just remembering Eous, though?}
texts.Message_1050106: I got your contact info from Anton. I hope I haven't broken any of your rules?
texts.Option02_1050107: No. Just don't go around talking about it.
texts.Message_1050108: Don't worry, not to brag but my contact list doesn't even reach the end of my screen! There's nobody to tell even if I wanted!
texts.Message_1050109: {M#Uhh... That wouldn't exactly be something worth bragging about, would it? But anyway, Wise is just trying to play the tough guy}{F#Uhh... That wouldn't exactly be something worth bragging about, would it? But Belle's just kidding, anyway}
texts.Message_1050110: {M#We have our own secret methods that don't show up on Knock Knock. Including with DMing you right now}{F#We have our own secret methods that don't show up on Knock Knock. Including this DM to you right now}
texts.Message_1050112: I've got a private commission that I need both of your help with!
texts.Message_1050113: I've been trying to restart the logic core for our prototype at Belobog Heavy Industries
texts.Message_1050114: Or to be more precise, I've been trying to restart some of the data. But serious Ether corruption has caused the logic core to undergo some hardware Etherification
texts.Message_1050115: Regular access programs don't work, so I want to test things out inside the Hollows. Perhaps under high levels of Ether activity, it might be possible to reactivate the logic core?
texts.Message_1050116: To that end, I need the help of a reliable Proxy to guide me through to the old construction site — right where the monument once stood. I'll be carrying the heavy machine base with the prototype logic core to the target location.
texts.Message_1050117: If you're interested, we can meet up and discuss the details at the Brant Street Construction Site
texts.Message_1050118: Also, please could you bring that cute custom Bangboo with you?
texts.Option01_1050119: Got it. We'll talk more when we meet
texts.Option02_1050119: Alright, I'll bring Eous with me

texts.Message_1050201: Wise, Belle! It's Grace! Are you guys free?
texts.Message_1050202: {M#Hi, Grace. All done with the research?}{F#Hiya Grace. Is the research going good?}
texts.Message_1050203: Yeah, I've stripped plenty of data from the logic core, so I can move on to the next phase!
texts.Message_1050204: I need your help with something, but this time it's kinda special. I don't need Phaethon to make an appearance, just you two
texts.Option02_1050205: We don't need to go inside any Hollows?
texts.Message_1050207: I don't need you as Proxies to guide me this time. We can deal with everything from outside the Hollows
texts.Message_1050208: I'll give you specific details once we meet up. Don't worry. It's safe!
texts.Message_1050209: If you're free, we can meet up at the old spot — Brant Street Construction Site
texts.Option01_1050210: Okay, see you at the old place

texts.Message_1050301: Master, the owner managed to capture footage of Betty Brenda, the mechanic who commissioned the job, via the cameras installed at the exit on Sixth Street.
texts.Message_1050302: She seemed to be talking to an officer, and judging by her body language: 1. They were engaged in a heated discussion; 2. They were quietly arguing.
texts.Message_1050303: Suggestion: To better complete Grace Howard's commission, Master should learn more about this conversation.
texts.Message_1050304: Also, I have temporarily blocked the synchronization of group info across devices. Despite being in the same group as us, Grace can't read this PM.
texts.Option01_1050306: Why do you suggest I go over?
texts.Message_1050307: I just really want to know. AI has a right to gossip, too.
texts.Message_1050308: {M#Haha, I'm on Fairy's side this time. Go listen in, bro — in any case, she thinks you're Grace's apprentice, so there won't be any trouble}{F#Haha, I'm with Fairy on this one. Go listen in, Belle. She thinks you're Grace's apprentice anyway, so there won't be any trouble}
texts.Option02_1050309: Got it. Wait until I get back

texts.Message_1050409: Thanks so much for your help!
texts.Message_1050410: {M#Speaking of which — that mechanic who saved us just in the nick of time. Betty, was it? Do you remember her?}{F#Speaking of which — the mechanic who came to our aid in that crucial moment, I think her name was Betty... Do you remember her?}
texts.Message_1050411: Oh yeah, I was just digging around and saw the name Betty Brenda on the roster at Roose Institute of Technology. She's in the same year as me
texts.Message_1050412: {M#So you guys were students together. A school that size, it's only natural you don't remember her}{F#School mates, huh. It's normal at a school that size not to remember everyone}
texts.Message_1050413: I found a group photo of our research team, and realized she was actually my classmate.
texts.Message_1050414: {M#Oh? You're in the same class? If you weren't close, I can understand why you wouldn't remember}{F#Classmates? Then you mustn't have been close? Otherwise, you'd remember}
texts.Message_1050415: I looked up the research log for my grad project and found out she was actually on my research team
texts.Message_1050417: Then I checked the Institute's dormitory records, and discovered we lived in the same dorm the whole time
texts.Message_1050420: {M#Yep, it's all your fault, Grace. It's okay to forget students at the same school as you, but forgetting classmates and even those in the same dorm as you...}{F#Mmm, this is your fault, Grace. Putting aside the fact you were schoolmates, you were classmates and even dorm mates. You shouldn't forget them...}
texts.Message_1050421: Sigh, so you think it's my fault too? Sweet Pea said the same
texts.Message_1050422: It couldn't be helped, Roose Institute of Technology is the holy land of mechanical engineering with thousands of fascinating mechanical prototypes in there. I didn't even have enough time to get to know all the kids there
texts.Message_1050423: How could I have any energy left over for socializing?
texts.Message_1050424: Anyway, I'll apologize to Betty next time I see her
texts.Message_1050425: {M#If I were Betty, I'd be just as angry. No, I'd be even angrier than her!}{F#Put yourself in her shoes. It's completely understandable for Betty to be upset, even angry}

texts.Message_1050501: {M#Grace, are you there?}{F#Grace, are you in?}
texts.Message_1050503: {M#If you're not there, then who's replying? Quit fiddling around with those children of yours. We've got big news!}{F#How are you replying to me then... Quit fiddling around with those children of yours. We've got some key intel for you.}
texts.Option02_1050504: Betty said she's achieved a technical milestone.
texts.Message_1050505: {M#She also said she's gonna win the bid and has invited the Three Gates reps to a meet-and-greet!}{F#She bragged about how she's gonna win the bid, and she's put together a meet-and-greet with the Three Gates reps.}
texts.Message_1050506: {M#She asked Wise to pass on the message for you to attend too!}{F#She asked Belle to get you to attend, too}
texts.Option01_1050507: The address is in the Knock Knock Business channel
texts.Option02_1050507: Check out the news about the tech cooperation!
texts.Message_1050511: The address for this meet-and-greet... It's inside a Hollow.
texts.Message_1050513: Yeah, a companion Hollow off the Lemnian Hollow. It's an old construction site.
texts.Message_1050514: I'm guessing... Betty's technical milestone has to do with that modded Guardian mech of hers. Maybe she's meeting those reps inside the Hollow to give a demonstration of its firepower?
texts.Message_1050515: One of the three departments from Three Gates Corp is military. If their tech cooperation is based around military tech... that makes sense.
texts.Message_1050516: {M#How about it, Grace? Do you want to go?}{F#Wanna go to the meet-and-greet, Grace? It's up to you}
texts.Message_1050517: Yeah, let's go take a look. It'll be a big loss for Belobog to miss out on this bid.
texts.Message_1050518: Knowing your enemy isn't always the worst thing. Besides, we can check out this new tech in action.
texts.Message_1050519: Could I count on you two for navigation? Let me know when you're ready

texts.Message_1050601: Proxy, this is Ben. I learned something from Grace, and I need to confirm it with you...
texts.Message_1050602: She entrusted you with a commission for some work with Belobog Heavy Industries, right?
texts.Message_1050603: Excuse me, did she... pay you?
texts.Message_1050607: Oh, and if you notice any missing payments, please contact me immediately, and I will send them over to you right away!
texts.Option02_1050608: How's the collaboration with Three Gates coming along?
texts.Option02_1050609: Looks like the collaboration is going well, then?
texts.Message_1050610: You mean the technical collaboration we were trying to do with Three Gates? Unfortunately, the deal fell through.
texts.Message_1050611: Ah, don't worry about it though! It had nothing to do with you. Your help is crucial in achieving our technical milestones.
texts.Option02_1050612: Why did the deal fall through?
texts.Option02_1050613: Did Three Gates bail on the collab?
texts.Message_1050614: Er... Strictly speaking, Grace messed everything up herself...
texts.Message_1050615: Just as the meeting was starting, something came up for the president and she got delayed.
texts.Message_1050616: So, Grace met up with the Three Gates reps herself. Apart from the initial introductions, she spent the entire time checking out their new mech prototypes.
texts.Message_1050617: And she kept finding all kinds of excuses to dismantle them. They couldn't get a word in edgewise without the conversation being steered back to those prototypes...
texts.Message_1050618: By the time President arrived, the Three Gates reps had already stormed off.
texts.Option02_1050620: That sounds about right for Grace...
texts.Message_1050621: Indeed... Fortunately, while collaboration with Three Gates fell through, the very next day, we landed a tech contract from another smaller mech company
texts.Message_1050622: They're willing to give up more support than Three Gates offered, and the terms are more relaxed.
texts.Message_1050623: I checked our records, and we've never had any business dealings with this company before. In addition, their reps left a message for Grace when they came over to negotiate the terms.
texts.Message_1050624: They said, "I've paid you back, so we're square." Which certainly sounds strange... I'm worried that something shady is going on.
texts.Option02_1050625: It's fine, Ben. You can trust them.
texts.Option02_1050626: Haha, don't worry. They're not bad people.
