texts.Message_1050627: I feel much better hearing you say that, Proxy. From now on, let's keep in touch. Come visit Belobog Heavy Industries any time!

texts.Message_1060201: Travis texted to remind the siblings not to depart to avoid being affected by the Hollow disaster.

texts.Message_1060301: Travis promised to bring some free videotapes over as compensation the next time he visited Sixth Street to stock.

texts.Message_1070101: Manager, have you heard of a movie called "The Heartbeat"?
texts.Message_1070102: It's about a mother who ignores the warnings and enters a Hollow to look for her child with a heart condition that requires a pacemaker.
texts.Option02_1070103: I'll look for it when I have time.
texts.Message_1070105: I actually watched this movie a long time ago.
texts.Message_1070106: I watched it in a cinema at that time. When I thought of rewatching it recently, I had a hard time finding a videotape.
texts.Message_1070107: It would be great if your store has it.
texts.Message_1070110: The cinema offers an enjoyable sensory experience, but videotapes are indispensable if you want to rewatch a movie at any time.

texts.Message_1080101: Manager, your {M#sister}{F#brother} contacted me saying that you have found the videotape of "The Heartbeat."
texts.Option02_1080102: When are you free to come and get it?
texts.Message_1080103: I've been quite occupied with the affairs of the Cunning Hares lately. Can I come over in a couple of days?

texts.Message_1090101: Good morning, my dear client! It's Travis here.
texts.Message_1090102: I'm very sorry to say that the delivery of goods for certain blocks scheduled this week might suffer possible delays due to unforeseen circumstances.
texts.Message_1090103: The blocks affected are the Nesting District, Sixth Street, and Tenth Street.
texts.Message_1090104: If delayed delivery will have a severe impact on your business, please contact me immediately to see if there are any solutions.
texts.Option01_1090105: (Ask him about the delivery of goods to the video store.)
texts.OptionLong01_1090105: Travis, do you have a solution for the delivery of videotapes?
texts.Option02_1090105: (Ask him how long the delay will last.)
texts.OptionLong02_1090105: Travis, how long will the delay last?
texts.Message_1090107: You messaged us. How can you not know us?
texts.Message_1090108: Oh! I sent that message to everyone whom I have had business dealings with.
texts.Message_1090109: Your number is saved in my contact list under "Youngsters who seem bad at running a business."
texts.Message_1090110: So, may I know who you are?
texts.OptionLong02_1090111: We're the owners of the video store Random Play on Sixth Street...
texts.Option02_1090111: (Tell him the name of your store.)
texts.Message_1090112: Ahhh! The young siblings! I remember now. It's been a while! How's business?
texts.Message_1090113: We haven't been updating our videotapes as regularly as we should be lately.
texts.Message_1090114: No wonder you don't remember us.
texts.Message_1090115: Hahaha, don't lose heart! You should be proud that your business has survived in New Eridu, especially when yours is so niche!
texts.Message_1090116: That doesn't sound like a compliment to me.
texts.Message_1090117: Regarding the supply of videotapes, I'll send you some name cards later.
texts.Message_1090118: They're suppliers to other video stores I'm familiar with. They charge fair prices and have a complete collection of movies that include movies from the old civilization.
texts.Message_1090119: You can get your goods from them. Just tell them I referred you.
texts.Message_1090120: How does that sound? Is that an acceptable solution?
texts.OptionLong02_1090121: We'll take it. Please send us the name cards.
texts.Message_1090122: Give us a copy of their movie lists too! I want to see which supplier meets our needs.

texts.Message_1090201: Video store siblings! My Bangboo just alerted me to a new Hollow disaster warning in the blocks nearby Sixth Street.
texts.Message_1090202: Don't visit the suppliers in those neighborhoods as it could be dangerous!
texts.Option01_1090203: My sister already went out that way!
texts.Option02_1090203: Belle has already headed out on her own...
texts.Message_1090205: Don't worry. I'll get in touch with my supplier friends right away. Perhaps she already got there safely.
texts.Message_1090207: Communication in this group is temporarily blocked. My messages are currently only visible to you.
texts.Message_1090208: Note: Travis' intelligence network, which is built on his business dealings, is not reliable in terms of efficiency and results.
texts.Message_1090209: We should rely on ourselves to look for your sister, Belle.
texts.Message_1090210: Suggestion: Access the traffic surveillance devices of the blocks nearby. I can search for the car Belle is driving.
texts.Message_1090213: Understood. I'll update my search results on the HDD system.

texts.Message_1090301: Guys! I heard your sister had returned safely. Is it true?
texts.Message_1090304: Don't say that... I feel terrible about what happened. If it hadn't been for me, the two of you wouldn't have had to change your plans due to the delivery issues.
texts.Message_1090305: And you two wouldn't have been involved in that Companion Hollow crisis...
texts.Message_1090306: As an apology, the next time I come to Sixth Street to do deliveries I'll give you both some new movies for free!
texts.Message_1090307: Thanks! But it was an accident, it wasn't your fault, Travis.
texts.Message_1090308: No, accidents are part of a business. Remember I said you should be proud that your business survived in New Eridu?
texts.Message_1090309: Anything can cause a business to go under, even if it has nothing to do with the business itself.
texts.Message_1090310: You two were lucky enough to turn the tables. That's the best thing a businessman can ask for!
texts.Message_1090311: I've changed your name in my contact list to "Super Lucky Owners." Hopefully some of that good luck will rub off from our future collaboration!

texts.Message_1090101: Good morning, my dear client! It's Travis here.
texts.Message_1090102: I'm very sorry to say that the delivery of goods for certain blocks scheduled this week might suffer possible delays due to unforeseen circumstances.
texts.Message_1090103: The blocks affected are the Nesting District, Sixth Street, and Tenth Street.
texts.Message_1090104: If delayed delivery will have a severe impact on your business, please contact me immediately to see if there are any solutions.
texts.Option01_1090105: (Ask him about the delivery of goods to the video store.)
texts.OptionLong01_1090105: Travis, do you have a solution for the delivery of videotapes?
texts.Option02_1090105: (Ask him how long the delay will last.)
texts.OptionLong02_1090105: Travis, how long will the delay last?
texts.Message_1090107: You messaged us. How can you not know us?
texts.Message_1090108: Oh! I sent that message to everyone whom I have had business dealings with.
texts.Message_1090109: Your number is saved in my contact list under "Youngsters who seem bad at running a business."
texts.Message_1090110: So, may I know who you are?
texts.OptionLong02_1090111: We're the owners of the video store Random Play on Sixth Street...
texts.Option02_1090111: (Tell him the name of your store.)
texts.Message_1090112: Ahhh! The young siblings! I remember now. It's been a while! How's business?
texts.Message_1090113: We haven't been updating our videotapes as regularly as we should be lately.
texts.Message_1090114: No wonder you don't remember us.
texts.Message_1090115: Hahaha, don't lose heart! You should be proud that your business has survived in New Eridu, especially when yours is so niche!
texts.Message_1090116: That doesn't sound like a compliment to me.
texts.Message_1090117: Regarding the supply of videotapes, I'll send you some name cards later.
texts.Message_1090118: They're suppliers to other video stores I'm familiar with. They charge fair prices and have a complete collection of movies that include movies from the old civilization.
texts.Message_1090119: You can get your goods from them. Just tell them I referred you.
texts.Message_1090120: How does that sound? Is that an acceptable solution?
texts.OptionLong02_1090121: We'll take it. Please send us the name cards.
texts.Message_1090122: Give us a copy of their movie lists too! I want to see which supplier meets our needs.

texts.Message_6100101: Manager! I heard you're jumping in to help boost the video store's popularity?
texts.Message_6100102: I've prepared some videotapes that are perfect for promotion!
texts.Message_6100103: I'll be waiting for you on Sixth Street. Just hit me up when you're there!
texts.OptionLong01_6100104: {F#Thanks so much. I'll be there soon!}{M#Thank you... I'll be there soon.}
texts.OptionLong02_6100104: {F#I'll come as soon as I'm ready!}{M#Just a moment. I need some time to get ready.}
texts.Message_6100105: Hurry up, please... I really need someone to help share the load of these videotapes!

texts.Message_6100201: Manager! I found another perrrrfect spot on Sixth Street to promote your video store.
texts.Message_6100202: And I've found you a fantastic partner! She's already waiting for you there!
texts.Message_6100203: As for me, I'll be at the same spot as yesterday, scouting the neighborhood for potential customers.
texts.Message_6100204: Why don't you go and see if you can attract some new customers?
texts.OptionLong01_6100205: {F#Okie dokie! I'll be there soon!}{M#Okay, I'll be there soon.}
texts.OptionLong02_6100205: {F#I'll be there soon!}{M#Cool, I'll be there soon!}

texts.Message_6100301: Ta-da! Your new promotion helper is online! Let's meet at Lumina Square, okay?
texts.OptionLong01_6100302: {F#No problem! I'm coming now!}{M#No problem. I'll be there in a jiff.}
texts.OptionLong02_6100302: {F#Hmm... okay!}{M#Hmm... just a moment. I'll be there soon.}

texts.Message_6100401: Manager, I think... we need to make some changes.
texts.OptionLong02_6100402: {F#Huh? Does it need to be so formal?}{M#Why so formal all of a sudden?}
texts.Message_6100403: Staying at the same spot won't work for us.
texts.Message_6100404: Pretty much everyone on Sixth Street already knows about Random Play.
texts.Message_6100405: We need to go find new customers!
texts.OptionLong01_6100406: {F#Makes sense! Please arrange the new promotion spot then!}{M#Makes sense... Let's go with your plan.}
texts.OptionLong02_6100406: {F#So where are we heading next?}{M#Where are we going now?}
texts.Message_6100407: I've decided. Let's go to Lumina Square.
texts.Message_6100408: It's way busier than Sixth Street, so we'll definitely get more exposure there.
texts.OptionLong01_6100409: {F#Alright! I'll meet you at Lumina Square!}{M#Makes sense, I'm heading out to Lumina Square now.}
texts.OptionLong02_6100409: {F#That makes sense... I'll be there soon!}{M#That makes sense... I'll be there shortly.}
texts.Message_6100410: Then hurry up! I've found you another reliable partner! She's already waiting for you at Lumina Square!

texts.Message_6100501: Manager, the promotion campaign at Lumina Square was a huge success last time! I've noticed lots of new faces heading towards Random Play lately.
texts.Option01_6100503: It did go really well, it's been good!
texts.OptionLong01_6100503: {F#Indeed! We've had quite a few new customers!}{M#Indeed. We've seen a lot of new faces.}
texts.Option02_6100503: Should we ramp up our promotion?
texts.OptionLong02_6100503: {F#Hmm... I think we could use a bit more promotion.}{M#Yeah... looks like we should keep pushing our promotions.}
texts.Message_6100504: Should we capitalize on this momentum...?
texts.Message_6100505: Awesome! My friend and I were talking about old movies the other day, and she's one of the promotion helpers too! She's hanging out at Lumina Square today. Feel free to go see her directly.
texts.OptionLong01_6100506: {F#Alright! I'll be there soon!}{M#Okay, I'll be there soon.}
texts.OptionLong02_6100506: {F#Okay... just give me a moment!}{M#Alright... I'll be there soon.}

texts.Message_6200101: Check out this insider message from the Queen of Pamphlets! There's a new event happening at the 141 Convenience Store!
texts.Message_6200102: You should definitely check it out! Get here quickly!
texts.OptionLong01_6200103: {F#Hmm? Are you helping out at the 141 Convenience Store now, Sjal?}{M#Looks like you've expanded your business to 141 now?}
texts.OptionLong02_6200103: {F#What's the event about? "Definitely worth checking it out," sounds exciting~}{M#A new event that I "should definitely check out"... What is it about?}
texts.Message_6200104: Yeah! The convenience store has launched a new event called "141 Exclusive Bazaar."
texts.Message_6200106: The Bangboo have brought out lots of items that aren't normally for sale!
texts.Message_6200107: But they're a bit short-staffed... so they asked me to help with the event.
texts.OptionLong01_6200108: {F#141 has items not for sale? I'd love to see them!}{M#141 has items not for sale...? Sounds interesting.}
texts.Option02_6200108: You're as brilliant as ever, Sjal.
texts.OptionLong02_6200108: {F#As expected from the Queen of Pamphlets... Now I'm really interested!}{M#As expected from the Queen of Pamphlets... Sounds like it's worth a visit.}
texts.Message_6200110: The Bangboo are actively promoting their event as we speak, right outside the convenience store!
texts.OptionLong01_6200111: {F#I'll be there soon!}{M#Cool, I'll be there soon!}
texts.OptionLong02_6200111: {F#I'll go find them right now!}{M#I'm going to check it out from them right now.}

texts.Message_9010101: Hello. Independent intelligence broker: Shepherd, at your service.
texts.Message_9010102: We're currently serving invited members only. Respond with "1" or "Operator" to speak to customer support.
texts.Message_9010106: If I kept speaking like that, could I have just swindled you out of your private info or credit card number?
texts.Message_9010107: You need to wise up to fraudsters, Phaethon my old friend
texts.Option02_9010108: How did you know it was me?
texts.Message_9010109: Haha, it's worth it just to trick you at least once
texts.Message_9010110: I'm your intelligence broker. I wouldn't be very good at my job if I didn't know what happened to my oldest client — the legendary Phaethon, now would I?
texts.Message_9010113: I'm just glad you guys told me about this alt account
texts.Message_9010114: That proves I'm still your favorite intelligence broker, right?
texts.Option01_9010115: Don't forget to get us more commissions
texts.Option02_9010115: That's not true. Who are you?
texts.Message_9010116: Of course, why I have one right here
texts.Message_9010117: It could be crucial for your comeback as a Proxy
texts.Message_9010118: Let's talk in person. I'll wait for you in the usual spot
texts.Message_9010120: So merciless... I'm really fond of you guys
texts.Message_9010121: Getting back on topic. I have a commission
texts.Message_9010122: It could be crucial for your comeback as a Proxy
texts.Message_9010123: Let's talk in person. I'll wait for you in the usual spot

texts.Option01_9010202: Get someone else to type for you.
texts.Message_9010205: I'm sorry for making you guys worry about me... (You guys did, right?)
texts.Message_9010206: Anyhow, I'll speed over to the video store right now!
texts.Option02_9010209: We will. We have some questions for you.
texts.Message_9010210: Wait for me! I'll be quick and won't delay!
texts.Message_9010211: Eh, what's wrong? Anyway, I'll be there soon!

texts.Message_9020101: It's me again, my old friend. Feeling happy today?
texts.Option02_9020102: If you've got a job for me just say so.
texts.Message_9020103: ...You're in a good mood today? I'm not used to that...
texts.Message_9020104: Etiquette! You young folks might not realize it, but there are certain unwritten rules between people...
texts.Message_9020105: Anyway, got some good news for you: You may participate in your first Reputation Rank-Up Trial.
texts.Message_9020106: Though it's not really your first trial, is it, former legendary Proxy?
texts.Option01_9020107: What's this Reputation Rank-Up Trial all about?
texts.Message_9020108: ...Are you messing with me? Or did you really forget?
texts.Message_9020109: It's a test to raise your Reputation on Inter-Knot! You've met the requirements in terms of Inter-Knot Level and Hollow Observation Data, so now you can level up your reputation!
texts.Message_9020110: As expected from Phaethon. Always so reliable.
texts.Message_9020111: Your Inter-Knot Level and the amount of collected Hollow Observation Data have been increasing quite quickly lately. You must've been preparing for this Reputation Rank-up, right?
texts.Option02_9020114: Since you're here, tell me more about the trial.
texts.Message_9020115: What do you... Oh, the content of the trial? Just clearing out some Ethereals, the same as before.
texts.Message_9020116: More about the trial...? You really need me to explain? Just clearing out some Ethereals, the same as before.
texts.Message_9020117: It might be a bit trickier than the usual clean-up tasks though, of course.
texts.Message_9020118: Anyway, I'll keep an eye on your account info, {NICKNAME}. Swing by the coffee shop once you're done with your promotion, and we'll celebrate!

texts.Message_9020201: Here's the top hits for today: City Blues, Goldfish Romance, and Symphonic Selection.
texts.Option02_9020202: Why are you recommending music all of a sudden?
texts.Message_9020203: It's nothing, neighbor~ I'm just checking that the recipient of my message is indeed the right person. We both have rather "special" identities, after all, so there's nothing wrong with being cautious when communicating~
texts.Message_9020204: Well then, now we can get down to business
texts.Message_9020205: Everything's ready, and I can start with my tuning to build a weapon for you to explore the Hollows: a W-Engine Drive Disc. I'll be in the shop, so you can drop in any time. Also...
texts.Message_9020207: Today's top hits are really awesome~ If you get the chance, you should give them a listen~

texts.Message_9020301: My dear old friend... to be honest, I'm a little surprised.
texts.Message_9020302: I know you're very capable... but this is moving a bit fast, isn't it?
texts.Option02_9020303: I never go over the speed limit when I drive.
texts.Message_9020305: Are you genuinely clueless, or are you just trying to play cute with me...
texts.Message_9020306: ...That's right. We shouldn't talk about this over DMs.
texts.Message_9020307: How about let's meet up at the old place? I'm free now.
texts.Option02_9020307: I won't go unless there's actual business
texts.Message_9020308: Are you sure? I've got something pretty important to tell you. I know I like to mess around, but have I ever joked about serious biz with you before?
texts.Message_9020309: Haha, of course it's business. If you don't want to know, you don't have to come — I'll be enjoying my coffee anyway.
texts.Option01_9020311: You must be pretty serious, putting a period at the end and everything... Fine, I get it.
texts.Message_9020313:
I knew it, from the bottom of your heart you still trust me (<ゝω・) ☆
c u soon
texts.Option01_9020314: Alright, but that kind of emoji doesn't really suit your style

texts.Message_9030101: It's been a while since we last spoke, hasn't it, friend?
texts.Message_9030102: Looks like I can't rely on youngsters to take the initiative and get in touch with me first...
texts.Option01_9030103: To tell the truth, I've missed you!
texts.Message_9030105: Aww, just a few words and you've soothed this middle-aged man's weary heart. You're good, Phaethon
texts.Message_9030106: Still as cold as ever. But I really admire your focus on work efficiency, Phaethon
texts.Message_9030107: Alright, let's get to the point
texts.Message_9030108: You guys must've heard about the recent decline in Hollow Activity inside the Lemnian?
texts.Message_9030109: I'm getting more and more commissions about it these days
texts.Message_9030110: This commission might be a tad dangerous, but the pay is reasonable. How about it, wanna meet up and chat?
texts.Message_9030114: If you're trying to turn me down, at least come up with something more convincing than that
texts.Message_9030115: I'll see you at the usual place
texts.Message_9030116: Want me to order for you? I've got a two-for-one coupon for espresso
texts.Message_9030119: Alright, how about a Barley Latte? My treat.
texts.Message_9030120: But don't be late, or else it'll spoil your drink

texts.Message_9900101: {M#Reply when you receive this message!}{F#Please reply when you receive this message.}
texts.Message_9900104: {M#Looks like you've already met the neighbors.}{F#Looks like you've already met the neighbors.}
texts.Message_9900105: {M#I nearly went out to find you before it suddenly hit me that I could text you.}{F#You always take so long to read my texts. I was going to head out and look for you.}
texts.Option02_9900106: Want me to bring something back?
texts.Message_9900107: {M#Nope, I just got a DM from Nicole and they'll be coming over to the video store real soon.}{F#Nope, I just got a DM from Nicole and they'll be coming over real soon.}
texts.Message_9900108:
Come back once you're done.
By the way, there's some stuff that needs to be done on the new account. Remember to check it out when you're free

texts.Message_9900201: {M#Bro, I found a mysterious creature. Could it be a sprite, or a wild tiger?}{F#Belle, I ran into a cat at the street corner...}
texts.Message_9900202: {M#Bro, street corner, come quick!}{F#There's a little black cat, seems like the sort of thing you'd like}
texts.Option01_9900203: {M#Are you in danger? I'm on my way}{F#Bro, keep it occupied!}
texts.Option02_9900204: {M#Should we contact the Animal Protection Society first?}{F#I'll be there in no time!}
texts.Message_9900205: {M#Ah, no need to worry, Wise...}{F#It's quite relaxed at the moment, with no signs of wanting to run}
texts.Message_9900206: {M#I found a cat, so I got a bit too excited}{F#Are you coming over? I'm waiting at the alley entrance.}

texts.Message_9900302: So I'm still the first person in the Cunning Hares to have your new contact information since you changed your account.
texts.Message_9900305: Don't worry, with siblings like yourselves plus friends like us, everything's gonna be fine!
texts.Message_9900306: How about it, Manager? We're good friends and it's been a while, wanna hang out today?
texts.Message_9900307: There are two new games over at the arcade on Sixth Street. We haven't played each other in ages.
texts.Option02_9900308: You might be free, but I need to work.
texts.Message_9900309: My beloved Godfinger... These god-like fingers of mine have been itching for a workout! I'll see ya outside the arcade!
texts.Message_9900310: It can't be all work and no play. Hurry up, Manager! I'll meet you at the front of the arcade... Be there or be square!

texts.Message_9900503: Manager, I'm here to tell you that the coffee shop is back to its normal routine starting today and that I would like to invite you to come over and try out our new drink. However, something just happened, and it's giving me a headache...
texts.Message_9900504: Yes, I'm here to notify you as we discussed... I was planning on inviting you in to try out our new drink, but I didn't plan on something as annoying as this happening.
texts.Message_9900506: I want to ask you for a favor. I'm sure you've heard of the Hollow Investigative Association, right?
texts.Message_9900507: I'm afraid I do... In fact, the cause of this incident is related to the Hollow Investigative Association.
texts.Message_9900508: They reached out to me earlier, saying they wanted to rent out Coff Cafe for a VR game promotion campaign...
texts.Message_9900509: I agreed, and the timing for the reopening was just right, but little did I know it was a conspiracy from the start...
texts.Option01_9900510: Are there commercial spies messing with you?
texts.OptionLong01_9900510: Hold on! Is there an undercover coffee spy pretending to be the Investigative Association?
texts.Option02_9900510: Is there a most wanted criminal over there?
texts.OptionLong02_9900510: Hold on! Is there a wanted criminal among the participants?
texts.Message_9900511: No, our store is just an ordinary street corner store. Nothing as dramatic as that.
texts.Message_9900512: It's just that I found out today they chose this coffee shop as the venue because those VR players share some sort of... superstition? Or urban legend?
texts.Message_9900513: In short, they believe that drinking coffee before playing a VR game improves their skills...!
texts.Option01_9900514: Sounds like a good thing to me.
texts.OptionLong01_9900514: Sounds like a good thing. You can sell a whole load of coffee in one day!
texts.OptionLong02_9900514: That's great. I wonder if there're any urban legends that'd attract customers to my video store...
texts.Message_9900515: That's true... The problem is all these players want coffee before they start playing...
texts.Message_9900516: We just opened, and I can't keep up with the sudden surge in customers.
texts.Message_9900517: So, would you mind working here for a while?
texts.OptionLong01_9900518: No worries. I'm on my way.
texts.OptionLong02_9900518: Let me think, I'm waiting for a message from a client right now, but it doesn't affect helping out at the cafe...
texts.Message_9900520: No worries. If you have to leave, feel free to go anytime. I'd really appreciate any help you can offer right now...
texts.Message_9900521: I'll be waiting at the entrance of the coffee shop. Thank you so much!
texts.Message_9900522: I'll be waiting at the entrance of the coffee shop. Thank you so much!

texts.Message_9900601: {M#Hey Wise, finished helping yet?}{F#Belle, finished helping yet?}
texts.Message_9900603: {M#Relax. Still no word from Nekomata, so I think she'll be a while. Someone I don't know just sent a package to the store and I think it's for you. Wanna come back and see what it is?}{F#Chill, buddy. It wasn't from Nekomata, and I think she'll be a while. Actually, it's from someone I don't know, they sent a package to the store and I think it's for you. Wanna come back and check it out?}

texts.Message_9900701: How have you two been? Have you made a decision about Hollow Zero?
texts.OptionLong01_9900702: Actually I've got some concerns... Is your contact reliable? Hollow Zero investigators face strict testing. There's no risk of us blowing our cover, right?
texts.Option02_9900702: I'd like to go over security again
texts.OptionLong02_9900702: I want to double-check that our information is secure. Hollow Zero investigators face strict testing, so if our true identities are revealed...
texts.Message_9900703: I understand you have your reservations. But a good Shepherd like myself pledges to give "the best service to the best customers." I hope perhaps to show you a deeper understanding of what this motto means in the future
texts.Message_9900704: Besides, I've never introduced you to any commissions that screwed you over, have I?
texts.Message_9900706: Great, I knew you'd rise to the challenge. Don't worry about eligibility or keeping your identity safe. Just focus on how to pass the test commission.
texts.Message_9900707: I'll send you details on the test commission right away. Good luck out there.

texts.Message_9900801: The HIA extends its warm regards to you, esteemed Independent Hollow Zero Investigator.
texts.Message_9900802: Based on your recent investigation achievements, your Investigation License Level has been updated. Access to Construction Ruins has been granted.
texts.Message_9900803: Thank you for your support in exploring Hollow Zero. We look forward to your continued contributions!

texts.Message_9900901: The HIA extends its warm regards to you, esteemed Independent Hollow Zero Investigator.
texts.Message_9900902: Based on your recent investigation achievements, your Investigation License Level has been updated. Access to Abandoned Skyscraper has been granted.
texts.Message_9900903: Thank you for your support in exploring Hollow Zero. We look forward to your continued contributions!

texts.Message_9901003: Your Investigation License Level has been updated. Access to Withering Garden has been granted.
texts.Message_9901004: Given the special nature and potential risks associated with the commissions in this area, we recommend you familiarize yourself with Appendix 1: "Risk Statement and Disclaimer for Independent Hollow Zero Investigators."
texts.Message_9901005: Based on your exceptional performance in the Hollow Zero investigation, should you wish to join the Hollow Investigative Association, please consult Appendices 2 & 3: "Registration Form for HIA Investigator Recruitment Exam" and "Ridu Heroes: Becoming an HIA Investigator," respectively, before reaching out to the nearest association office.

texts.Message_20000101: I haven't found time to pay you back for when you treated me to a hamburger.
texts.Message_20000102: I waited for ages in front of the video store, but you never came by...
texts.Option01_20000103: Don't worry about paying me back, it's nothing.
texts.Message_20000104: It's not much, but I'd like us to be square still...
texts.Message_20000106: I'll give it back to you in person next time I see you.

texts.Message_20000201: Beep-boop! Beep-boop! That's how the aliens in "Don't Touch" greet each other. What do you think? Little too early for humans to greet each other that way?
texts.Message_20000203: You... Could it be you're actually...
texts.Message_20000204: An alien trying to masquerade as a human?
texts.Message_20000205: Are you planning to take over New Eridu? Please let me know in advance if you're planning an invasion.
texts.Message_20000206: I'll be first on scene with camera in hand, ready to shoot a documentary capturing the event.
texts.Message_20000207: What do you mean by brainwaves?
texts.Message_20000208: Oh, I get it. You're saying that aliens communicate using brainwaves. Is that it?
texts.Message_20000209: In pop culture, aliens usually communicate via telepathy.
texts.Message_20000210: That counts as brainwaves, I suppose.

texts.Message_20000305: Looks like you have a very healthy schedule
texts.Message_20000306: Nicole says people who become Proxies gradually grow disorganized, slipping into bad sleeping and eating habits...
texts.Message_20000308: It's late. I've already had breakfast, done my morning workout, and checked the morning news
texts.Message_20000309: Nicole says it's easy for Proxies to become disorganized
texts.Message_20000310: If you need to adjust your work routine, come find me
texts.Message_20000311: I can come and be your alarm clock every morning

texts.Message_20000606: Everyone in the Cunning Hares seems to have trouble rising early
texts.Message_20000607: I thought I was the only one up already
texts.Message_20000609: If you're tired, why don't you sleep a little longer?
texts.Message_20000610: Every time I stay up late to watch a movie, I feel sleepy the next morning
texts.Message_20000611: When that happens, it's better to close your eyes for a little while
texts.Message_20000612: But keep an eye on the time and don't let it impact the day's plans

texts.Message_20000702: I've got something important to tell you
texts.Message_20000703: You'd best not go out today
texts.Message_20000704: If you have to go outside, then whatever you do don't open your eyes
texts.Message_20000705: If you see "it," then it's all over
texts.Message_20000709: "It" is "it," and its existence cannot be perceived directly
texts.Message_20000710: The number of casualties created just by trying to look at "it" would break the current box office record...
texts.Option01_20000711: This is the plot from some new horror movie, right!
texts.Message_20000714: The plot and setting of this movie are both really quite good. I recommend you give it a watch
texts.Message_20000715: But be careful on the way to the movie theater. You don't want to look directly at "it"

texts.Option02_20000803: That emoji looks just like you
texts.Message_20000805: I just wanted try out this emoji, that's all
texts.Message_20000806: Good morning. Let's all do our best today!
texts.Message_20000808: I thought I looked more animated than that
texts.Message_20000809: Ah, I almost forgot why I messaged
texts.Message_20000810: Good morning, and here's to another new day!

texts.Message_20000902: I accidentally slept in this morning
texts.Message_20000903: And I didn't even stay up late yesterday...
texts.Message_20000906: It's normal to sleep in if you stay up late. But I went to bed at a normal time last night
texts.Message_20000907: I guess I've been feeling a little lethargic lately...
texts.Message_20000908: From today on, I'm going to take better care of myself
texts.Message_20000910: Then looks like we've all become rather lethargic lately
texts.Message_20000911: From tomorrow on, let's both of us get up early

texts.Message_20001001: I didn't realize the video store's daily revenue was so high... Impressive!
texts.Message_20001002: Have you seen all the movies you recommend to customers?
texts.Message_20001006: Sometimes I can watch a movie and while I might remember the plot, I'll forget the title of the movie...
texts.Message_20001007: That's why whenever I want to rewatch a movie, it always takes me a little longer to remember the name
texts.Message_20001010: You're more knowledgeable than me in this aspect
texts.Message_20001011: So... Can I ask you the names of some movies?
texts.Message_20001012: Maybe it'd be easier to talk in person
texts.Message_20001013: If you want, we can find a time to meet up
texts.Message_20001016: I'll be waiting for you out the front of the video store

texts.Message_20001102: I waited for ages outside the video store
texts.Message_20001105: If something comes up, I guess it was unavoidable
texts.Message_20001106: You forgot because you've been so busy, right?
texts.Message_20001107: If you like, we can choose another time to meet up?
texts.Message_20001110: I hope you can make it this time...

texts.Message_20001202: Because my communication skills aren't good enough
texts.Message_20001203: The manager said I was really bad when it came to interviews...
texts.Message_20001204: And after you went to the trouble of helping take those photos, now they're wasted... Sorry
texts.Option02_20001206: How about you come to the video store!
texts.Message_20001207: Hmm... I'll give it another go.
texts.Message_20001208: Thanks for the invite but... I'm going to give it another shot.
texts.Message_20001209: Speaking of which... You need good communication skills to be a Proxy, right?
texts.Message_20001210: If you have the time, could you help me practice with some mock interviews?
texts.Message_20001211: Any time today is fine, I'll be waiting for you at the coffee shop

texts.Message_20001301: Did you forget about the mock interview we had arranged yesterday?
texts.Message_20001304: That's okay, I did some preparation myself for the interview
texts.Message_20001305: If it's convenient, we could arrange another time?
texts.Message_20001308: I'll see you at the coffee shop

texts.Message_200014_04: I see... When would be a good time for you? I wanted to ask you out.
texts.Message_200014_05: Let me know when you're free. I wanted to ask you out.
texts.Message_200014_06: I'll be free as soon as I finish eating this.
texts.Message_200014_07: What do you have for me, Proxy? I'm on Sixth Street now.
texts.Message_200014_08: Yeah, I'll meet you after I finish eating this.
texts.Message_200014_09: I'll come to you. Where are you?
texts.Message_200014_10: Are you grabbing a bite at the noodle shop?
texts.Message_200014_12: What...? Hold on, I'm on my way.
texts.Message_200014_13: Wait, you can't eat that! I'm coming to you right now!

texts.Message_20001601: I'd like to ask you about a movie called "The Heartbeat."
texts.Message_20001602: It's about a mother who ignores the warnings and enters a Hollow to look for her child with a heart condition that requires a pacemaker.
texts.Option02_20001603: I'll look for it when I have time.
texts.Message_20001605: I actually watched this movie a long time ago.
texts.Message_20001606: I watched it in a cinema at that time. When I thought of rewatching it recently, I had a hard time finding a videotape.
texts.Message_20001607: It would be great if your store has it.
texts.Message_20001610: The cinema offers an enjoyable sensory experience, but videotapes are indispensable if you want to rewatch a movie at any time.

texts.Message_20001701: Have you found the videotape for "The Heartbeat"?
texts.Option02_20001701: When are you free to come and get it?
texts.Message_20001703: I've been quite occupied with the affairs of the Cunning Hares lately. Can I come over in a couple of days?

texts.Message_20001801: I waited for ages for you outside the video store yesterday
texts.Message_20001805: I'm worried about your short-term memory
texts.Message_20001806: Nicole says memory loss is one of the first signs of Cognitive Corruption Syndrome
texts.Message_20001807: Everything else is no big deal
texts.Message_20001808: But please remember to take good care of your health

texts.Message_200019_07: Why did you send it three times?
texts.Message_200019_08: Nicole said if someone sends you a short message, you should reply three times to show respect.
texts.Message_200019_09: But... I don't think it worked
texts.Message_200019_11: Appreciate the respect. Let's hang out!
texts.Message_200019_13: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_200019_15: But I'm a bit busy today.
texts.Message_200019_17: Nvm. I just talked to Nicole. Shifted my work to tomorrow.
texts.Message_200019_19: Sure your job's okay with this?
texts.Message_200019_20: Moving things around for me? I'm honored!
texts.Message_200019_21: It's nothing, just some small stuff
texts.Message_200019_22: Hanging with you is more important than those tasks
texts.Message_200019_24: Let's go for a stroll on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200019_28: Nicole asked me to help her with something on Sixth Street when I have time...
texts.Message_200019_30: It's something fun we could do together
texts.Message_200019_35: Then I'll see you near the payphone on Sixth Street
texts.Message_200019_39: Thanks for the reminder. I just remembered something.
texts.Message_200019_40: I might need your help with it...
texts.Message_200019_45: Just let me know when, I'll wait for you at the newsstand.

texts.Message_20002001: You didn't come by the payphone yesterday
texts.Message_20002006: Looks like business is booming for you guys
texts.Message_20002007: Let's meet up again when you have some time

texts.Message_20002102: Another peaceful day at the Cunning Hares.
texts.Message_20002103: So I've got some free time.
texts.Message_20002104: Ah, but I'm chatting with you.
texts.Message_20002105: So maybe I'm not that free after all...
texts.Option02_20002106: Let's go out on a date!
texts.Message_20002108: A date... does that mean picking a date, a time, a place, and then we meet? Sure.
texts.Message_20002109: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Option01_20002114: {M#I want to hang out with you}{F#Let's hang out~}
texts.Option02_20002114: {M#Was thinking, maybe we could hang out?}{F#Chatting with you! Wanna hang out?~}
texts.Message_20002117: Where do you want to go?
texts.Message_20002120: That's exactly what I was thinking.
texts.Message_20002121: I was also planning to go to Bardic Needle.
texts.Message_20002124: The weather today is perfect for listening to some music.
texts.Message_20002125: Let's pick out some discs together then.
texts.Message_20002126: I'm free, just let me know when~
texts.Message_20002128: I asked a friend to pick up some old civilization videotapes that have gone out of circulation for me.
texts.Message_20002129: Each one is linked to an urban legend.
texts.Message_20002130: There's "Dark Monday," so unsettling it saps your will to live.
texts.Message_20002131: Then there's "Fatal Ringtone," with the office worker crawling out of the TV when you watch it.
texts.Message_20002132: And "Recordings of a Former Life" where it's said your past life could take over your body.
texts.Option02_20002134: Meh, but I'll watch it with you
texts.Message_20002136: Thank you. If you're afraid of urban legends and paranormal events like Nicole, I'll protect you.
texts.Message_20002138: When are you free? I'll stop by the video store.

texts.Message_20002202: You didn't come to the newsstand yesterday
texts.Message_20002207: I wanted you to help me buy something yesterday...
texts.Message_20002208: I wanted you to help me buy something yesterday...
texts.Message_20002209: But it doesn't matter, there will always be the next sale
texts.Message_20002210: I'll give you a call when the time comes

texts.Message_20002301: You weren't at the Bardic Needle yesterday.
texts.Option01_20002303: I'm sorry, I'm just so busy...
texts.Message_20002305: Yesterday's weather was perfect for listening to some music, so I ended up buying some.
texts.Message_20002306: I'll come find you next time the weather is good.

texts.Message_20002402: Another peaceful day at the Cunning Hares.
texts.Message_20002403: So I've got some free time.
texts.Message_20002404: Ah, but I'm chatting with you.
texts.Message_20002405: So maybe I'm not that free after all...
texts.Option02_20002406: Let's go out on a date!
texts.Message_20002408: A date... does that mean picking a date, a time, a place, and then we meet? Sure.
texts.Message_20002409: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Option01_20002414: {M#I want to hang out with you}{F#Let's hang out~}
texts.Option02_20002414: {M#Was thinking, maybe we could hang out?}{F#Chatting with you! Wanna hang out?~}
texts.Message_20002417: Where do you want to go?
texts.Option01_20002418: Let's go for a stroll on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_20002421: I've got something I need to do...
texts.Message_20002422: I want to do it with you.
texts.Message_20002423: It happens to be on Sixth Street.
texts.Message_20002426: Then I'll see you near the payphone on Sixth Street
texts.Message_20002429: Thanks for the reminder. I just remembered something.
texts.Message_20002430: I might need your help with it...
texts.Message_20002434: Just let me know when, I'll wait for you at the newsstand.

texts.Message_20002501: I just finished my morning training
texts.Message_20002502: Billy said he'd train with me
texts.Message_20002503: But before we could finish our run, he came up with this excuse about "leaking oil"
texts.Option01_20002505: Teach me, I want to get into morning exercise too
texts.Message_20002506: ...It's just normal morning exercise. Nothing too serious
texts.Message_20002507: Once... There was someone who could do double what I do on morning exercises alone
texts.Message_20002508: She was incredible. I still think that to this day
texts.Message_20002509: It's easy. You just have to persevere
texts.Message_20002510: If you want, starting tomorrow I can take you with me for morning exercise
texts.Message_20002511: But no matter what happens, you have to stick with it until the end

texts.Message_20002602: It seems like cats hate me
texts.Message_20002605: The stray cats on Sixth Street
texts.Message_20002606: Every time I get close to them they just run away
texts.Message_20002608: Am I just the kind of person that cats hate? Am I beyond all hope?
texts.Message_20002609: Do you mean Howl over at the newsstand?
texts.Message_20002610: Howl's much easier to get along with than a cat... Every time I walk by, I can see his tail wagging happily
texts.Message_20002611: But the stray cats on Sixth Street are so alert. They run as soon as I get close.
texts.Message_20002612: I don't know what kind of person could become friendly with a stray cat...

texts.Message_20002702: I got up today an hour earlier than normal
texts.Message_20002703: and helped Nicole score shopping coupons for this month
texts.Message_20002707: It's fine. Getting up early is no big deal for me
texts.Message_20002708: If you need to get up early to grab some coupons I can help you, too
texts.Message_20002709: I haven't missed out on one yet
texts.Message_20002710: Today's coupons have all been snapped up
texts.Message_20002711: I'll let you know ahead of time next time there's more
texts.Message_20002712: You'll have to get up early... But that shouldn't be a problem for you

texts.Message_20002801: I just ate this new burger
texts.Message_20002802: Inside it had lettuce, cheese, a fried egg, and ham
texts.Message_20002803: But what was special about it, was that it was square-shaped
texts.Option01_20002804: Are you sure it wasn't a sandwich?
texts.Message_20002806: It was good, as good as a round burger
texts.Message_20002808: But then it's still a burger, there's no way it'd taste bad
texts.Message_20002809: That's the best thing about burgers
texts.Message_20002810: A sandwich...? I've never heard of such a thing before
texts.Message_20002811: But there're vegetables and meat stuffed between two pieces of bread. Isn't that called a burger?
texts.Message_20002812: Or is this actually a new type of burger...?
texts.Message_20002813: Hmm... I really don't know enough about burgers. I need to learn more

texts.Message_20002901: Last night I had a strange dream
texts.Message_20002902: In my dream, I saw swirling sand, flags fluttering, and the air filled with the smell of rust
texts.Message_20002903: I exhaled this pale mist with each breath, and held a cold knife tightly in my hand
texts.Option01_20002905: What movie did you watch before you went to bed?!
texts.Message_20002906: It's okay. I just felt a little tired when I woke up
texts.Message_20002908: Like I've seen a similar scene before...
texts.Message_20002909: In a movie? Or in real life...
texts.Message_20002911: So, I was in a war movie scene in my dream?
texts.Message_20002912: ...I should concentrate on having better dreams
texts.Message_20002913: Sorry. I'm going back to sleep. Perhaps I can continue this movie... I'd like to know how it ends

texts.Message_20003001: Ummm... There's something I want to ask you about
texts.Message_20003002: Did I send you any weird messages yesterday?
texts.Message_20003006: So, yesterday, Nekomata stole of my phone and said she wanted to message my contacts...
texts.Message_20003007: Looks like she was just trying to freak me out...
texts.Message_20003008: Anyway, as long as you weren't bothered by any weird messages
texts.Message_20003009: I did? Sorry to bother you
texts.Message_20003010: Nekomata stole my phone yesterday and said she was going to message my contacts...
texts.Message_20003011: I looked through all the logs and couldn't find anything... Maybe she deleted the messages
texts.Message_20003012: Anyway, whatever she sent, please don't take it personally... It wasn't my intention

texts.Message_20003101: When I went to the newsstand to pick up magazines this morning
texts.Message_20003103: It felt... so soft and cute
texts.Message_20003108: Let's bring him some snacks to eat next time?
texts.Message_20003109: A nice meaty bone should do the trick, right?
texts.Message_20003110: Really? This is the first time an animal has taken a liking to me...
texts.Message_20003112: If it's okay, we can go to the newsstand together and play with Howl?

texts.Message_20010101: I had a prophetic dream in the night: I dreamed the first person to give me 200 Dennies would have good luck all day. Of course, the first person I wanted to give the good news to was my favorite Proxy!
texts.Option01_20010102: I'll send you the money right now
texts.Option02_20010103: I'm all good on luck for today
texts.Message_20010105: Such manners, no wonder you are my favorite Proxy
texts.Message_20010106: You've been so honest and sincere in paying me, you deserve a lucky day!
texts.Message_20010108: No way, how could someone not need luck?
texts.Message_20010109: For just 200 Dennies you can have a day full of luck! It's such a good deal, you should think about it carefully

texts.Message_20010202: Talented Girl Boss Finally Launches Business, Attracting Industry Attention
texts.Message_20010203: Invest now and experience unprecedented high returns!
texts.Message_20010204: Don't miss out, it's too good to miss!
texts.Message_20010205: Reply A to support her with money. Reply B to support her with even more money
texts.Message_20010208: You've chosen to support her with money. Please transfer the appropriate amount of Dennies to this account before the end of the day
texts.Message_20010209: Thank you for supporting a talented business woman~
texts.Message_20010210: You chose to support her with even more money! I'd expect nothing less from a video store boss with an incredible eye for business!
texts.Message_20010211: Please transfer the appropriate amount of Dennies to this account before the end of the day~ I look forward to your future support!

texts.Message_20010301: Oh yeah, your video store is doing so well these days. You must have pretty much any movie?
texts.Message_20010302: I heard you've got a secret collection of more expensive cult movies on top of the mainstream stuff. You know, the kind of stuff you can't really let anyone else see?
texts.Message_20010305: What were you thinking of? I mean rare indie movies that you can't find on the open market!
texts.Message_20010306: There's one called "First Piece of Soil," you know it? It tells the story of the family that first built New Eridu
texts.Option02_20010308: Why do you want that movie?
texts.Message_20010310: Can't I just want to watch a movie without any ulterior motive!
texts.Message_20010311: Rumor has it that the movie contains the history of how the prestigious Mayflower family struck it rich...
texts.Message_20010312: If I can learn how to do that, then it won't be long before we Cunning Hares can strike it rich, too!
texts.Message_20010313: You gotta give me a call if you ever get your hands on it. To rent or for sale, whatever. Just name your price!

texts.Message_20010401: What's up? Did you find a tape of First Piece of Soil yet?
texts.Message_20010404: What a legend! I'll stop by the video store and pick it up as soon as I'm free.
texts.Message_20010406: I'll leave it there for you.

texts.Message_20010501: Get up, get up, get outta bed!
texts.Message_20010502: If it's important, it's worth saying three times!
texts.Option01_20010503: What are you doing up so early...
texts.Message_20010505: Because I can smell a wonderful business opportunity!
texts.Message_20010506: Time is money. So I'll wake you up every morning to help you take control of your time, and you can pay me to do so
texts.Message_20010508: Wh—What? You managed to get up earlier than me...
texts.Message_20010509: Dang. I'll definitely get up earlier tomorrow! And then I'll wake you up
texts.Message_20010510: 300 Dennies per wake-up call! No bargaining!

texts.Message_20010601: The early bird gets the worm... Or rather, the early rabbit gets the carrot~
texts.Message_20010602: The Cunning Hares have taken on a whole bunch of commissions! Turns out there really are more jobs going in the morning
texts.Message_20010603: Good job I set ten alarm clocks this morning!
texts.Option01_20010604: You need ten alarm clocks just to get up?
texts.Message_20010606: What? Everyone wakes up like that!
texts.Message_20010607: I'm not lazy! You mean you don't get up the same way?
texts.Message_20010608: I always unconsciously hit snooze for the first three alarms
texts.Message_20010609: Then I do the same again for the following three...
texts.Message_20010610: And then once the final four alarms go, I'm totally awake!

texts.Message_20010701: Let me fill you in on some juicy gossip
texts.Message_20010702: A crazy piece of news that's sure to surprise everyone!
texts.Message_20010703: Today, the Cunning Hares managed to...
texts.Message_20010705: Everyone's already washed up and had breakfast... At this hour!
texts.Message_20010708: Just sharing the joy. You may not have noticed, but this actually proves something...
texts.Message_20010709: My morning wake-up call service is so successful it works on even the hardest of targets!
texts.Message_20010710: And this concerns you! It proves...
texts.Message_20010711: My morning wake-up call service is an extraordinary success!
texts.Message_20010712: How about that? Feeling the excitement? Don't just feel it, act on it!

texts.Message_20010801: Here's the great Nicole's daily divination~
texts.Message_20010802: Your lucky color today is pink!
texts.Message_20010803: Pay extra attention to a beautiful girl with pink hair
texts.Message_20010804: Yes, she is the one fated to be...
texts.Message_20010806: Just stay by her side and listen to her instructions and your life will go much smoother!
texts.Message_20010809: I told you, it's a beautiful girl with pink hair~
texts.Message_20010811: Now that you mention it, I AM a "beautiful girl with pink hair"!

texts.Message_20010902: Umm... About the money I owe you from yesterday...
texts.Message_20010903: I was supposed to deposit it into your account this morning, but there was a bit of a hiccup...
texts.Message_20010906: I—It was totally unexpected! I had no zero intention of not paying you back!
texts.Message_20010907: Oooh, you really are a good person!
texts.Message_20010908: Trust me, I'm sure I can pay it back even though I might not know exactly when right now...
texts.Message_20010909: As an apology, I'll go into the video store today and put in a day's free labor for you, as interest
texts.Message_20010910: That's a pretty good deal, right?
texts.Message_20010913: Hmm~ Then I'll see you at the video store today. Just tell me when!
texts.Message_20010916: No problem, I'll see you at Random Play!

texts.Message_20011001: So? I was awesome yesterday, right?
texts.Message_20011002: I bet I brought in loads of customers, right?
texts.Message_20011005: Hmm~ Told you, I'm a business genius!
texts.Message_20011006: But thanks to you, I managed to put together that money before the deadline rolled around...
texts.Message_20011007: This is something that's very important to me
texts.Message_20011009: I won't forget what you did

texts.Message_20011101: Did you stand me up yesterday?!
texts.Message_20011102: I was trying to be nice, I was even gonna work for free
texts.Message_20011106: Sigh, why must I be such an honest business woman...
texts.Message_20011107: Pick another time that's convenient and I'll drop by the store to see you
texts.Message_20011111: Don't forget this time, or else I won't pay you back!

texts.Message_20011201: Luckily, the person on the other end of the line was a human being, not the legendary "world's scariest voice..."
texts.Message_20011202: —As if! The voice on that call sounded worse than any urban legend!
texts.Message_20011203: It just sounded like a kidnapping to me...
texts.Message_20011204: You think a kidnapper could have taken a hostage and is communicating with the victim's family over a payphone...
texts.Message_20011205: Wouldn't that mean we accidentally took a call from the kidnapper?
texts.Option01_20011206: Weirdos are always calling this number
texts.Message_20011208: I've heard about that, too. A strange old lady who's always calling this number or something...
texts.Message_20011209: I hope it really is just a prank...
texts.Message_20011210: Anyway it's getting late. Let's head back soon
texts.Message_20011211: Sigh, I should've known better than to make this kind of bet with Billy and the others
texts.Message_20011212: When you think about it, cleaning the toilet really isn't a big deal...

texts.Message_20011302: And I really can't pretend I didn't hear that call
texts.Message_20011303: What if there were survivors... I'd feel so terrible
texts.Message_20011304: So I'm going back to check out that payphone again tonight
texts.Message_20011309: I sure know how to pick my friends. For justice!
texts.Message_20011310: So then let's meet up late tonight next to the payphone

texts.Message_20011401: How come you didn't come by yesterday?
texts.Message_20011405: I knew it! I waited for ages
texts.Message_20011406: You should've told me! Making me wait so long like that...
texts.Message_20011407: But nothing special happened last night. I didn't see a soul besides a Public Security patrol
texts.Message_20011408: But something still doesn't feel right...
texts.Message_20011409: If you've got the time, why don't we meet up there another night and stake it out?
texts.Message_20011412: Cool, I'll see you then by the payphone!

texts.Message_20011503: I can't believe my photo was eliminated from the "Most Outrageous Group Photo" contest during the open audition stage!
texts.Message_20011504: Our photo was perfect! Obviously these voters have no taste whatsoever
texts.Option01_20011505: You're just too cute, Nicole. You're not outrageous enough
texts.Option02_20011506: It's because you have too many enemies, Nicole...
texts.Message_20011507: You say that like it's fact~
texts.Message_20011508: But I could have really used the PR it would have got us. I wonder if there's any similar of competitions going on...
texts.Message_20011509: What! How could such a friendly, well-loved boss like me make enemies?
texts.Message_20011510: Those guys are just jealous of me! Hmph, next time I'll win for sure!

texts.Message_200116_01: R U there? R U there? R U there?
texts.Message_200116_02: Got a minute? I've got an invitation for you.
texts.Message_200116_03: I'm here, I'm here, I'm here
texts.Message_200116_04: What's up, why are you spamming me?
texts.Message_200116_05: I thought it was a debt collector for a sec!
texts.Message_200116_06: You bet! I AM a debt collector... JK! Come hang out!
texts.Message_200116_08: Hmph! I knew you weren't the debt collecting type!
texts.Message_200116_09: Where do you wanna go? I'm down for anything~
texts.Message_200116_10: Sounds good! Where do you wanna go?
texts.Message_200116_13: Are you taking me out for a fancy dinner? Or is it serious business?
texts.Message_200116_14: I just wanted to ask you out...
texts.Message_200116_15: You think too much, just wanted to hang out with you is all
texts.Message_200116_16: Oh okay, why didn't you say so earlier! Where to?
texts.Message_200116_17: Oh, okay... Sure! Where are we going?
texts.Message_200116_19: Let's go for a stroll on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200116_21: My daily divination says I have fantastic luck today!
texts.Message_200116_22: Can't waste a lucky day like this. Since you want to go to Box Galaxy too...
texts.Message_200116_23: Let's hit up the gacha machines there!
texts.Message_200116_24: Who knows, my good luck might rub off on you!
texts.Message_200116_28: Please, share your good luck with me!
texts.Message_200116_29: Really? Then we'll hit the jackpot today!
texts.Message_200116_31: Let's meet near Box Galaxy! You pick the time!
texts.Message_200116_34: You know that vending machine on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_200116_35: I heard that thing is always glitching, toss in your coins and no drink comes out
texts.Message_200116_36: If you give it a good kick, sometimes stuff just falls out...
texts.Message_200116_37: It's such an inconvenience for the good people of Sixth Street! I was thinking of taking a closer look at it.
texts.Message_200116_38: How about we go there together?
texts.Message_200116_40: You just want the free stuff, don't you?
texts.Message_200116_41: Alright! I knew you'd be interested!
texts.Message_200116_42: Wdym! I'm just curious! You must be curious about this mysterious vending machine too, surely~
texts.Message_200116_43: Let's meet near the vending machine on Sixth Street! You pick the time!

texts.Message_20011703: I was waiting ages all by myself
texts.Message_20011704: And only ended up getting the standard prize that I didn't even want!
texts.Message_20011707: Seeing that you're so honest, buy me lunch and I'll forgive you~
texts.Message_20011708: It's a deal, I'll remind you
texts.Message_20011709: You must be making bank if business is keeping you this busy
texts.Message_20011710: So then, you buy me lunch and we forget about you standing me up. It's a deal!

texts.Message_200118_04: Are you being chased by a debt collector, too?
texts.Message_200118_05: But wait, I thought you guys were loaded?
texts.Message_200118_06: I just wanted to ask you out.
texts.Message_200118_07: I just wanted to meet you.
texts.Message_200118_08: Oh okay, why didn't you say so earlier
texts.Message_200118_09: Have you been studying the art of smooth talking? Share some tips with me.
texts.Message_200118_10: Where do you want to go? Nothing too pricey, I hope.
texts.Message_200118_15: I'd like to invite you to hang out with me.
texts.Message_200118_16: {M#I'd like to request you to hang out with me.}{F#Let's hang out~}
texts.Message_200118_17: Okay, I shall honor your request. Where are we going?
texts.Message_200118_18: Sure thing. I'll give you a 20% discount on this commission.
texts.Message_200118_19: Haha, just kidding. I'm down. Where do you wanna go?
texts.Message_200118_20: Let's go to Coff Cafe on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200118_22: The coffee shop on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_200118_23: You know, I was actually planning to go there today.
texts.Message_200118_25: I had a feeling you'd want to go there.
texts.Message_200118_27: Really? How did you know? Teach me your ways.
texts.Message_200118_28: Hmmm, I'm glad we're on the same page! Let's meet there then.
texts.Message_200118_29: Why don't you pick the time? I'm down whenever.
texts.Message_200116_21: My daily divination says I have fantastic luck today!
texts.Message_200116_22: Can't waste a lucky day like this. Since you want to go to Box Galaxy too...
texts.Message_200116_23: Let's hit up the gacha machines there!
texts.Message_200116_24: Who knows, my good luck might rub off on you!
texts.Message_200116_28: Please, share your good luck with me!
texts.Message_200116_29: Really? Then we'll hit the jackpot today!
texts.Message_200116_31: Let's meet near Box Galaxy! You pick the time!

texts.Message_20011901: Hey hey hey, you promised to come kick the vending machine with me
texts.Option02_20011905: I didn't want to vandalize public property
texts.Message_20011907: Vending machines aren't even public property
texts.Message_20011909: It's cool. I'll hit you up next time, just you wait~

texts.Message_200120_04: Are you being chased by a debt collector, too?
texts.Message_200120_05: But wait, I thought you guys were loaded?
texts.Message_200120_06: I just wanted to ask you out.
texts.Message_200120_07: I just wanted to meet you.
texts.Message_200120_08: Oh okay, why didn't you say so earlier

texts.Message_200120_10: Where do you want to go? Nothing too pricey, I hope.
