texts.Message_200120_16: {M#I'd like to request you to hang out with me.}{F#Let's hang out~}
texts.Message_200120_17: Okay, I shall honor your request. Where are we going?
texts.Message_200120_18: Sure thing. I'll give you a 20% discount on this commission.
texts.Message_200120_19: Haha, just kidding. I'm down. Where do you wanna go?
texts.Message_200120_21: Let's go for a stroll on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200120_23: My daily divination says I have fantastic luck today!
texts.Message_200120_24: Can't waste a lucky day like this. Since you want to go to Box Galaxy too...
texts.Message_200120_25: Let's hit up the gacha machines there!
texts.Message_200120_26: Who knows, my good luck might rub off on you!
texts.Message_200120_28: Please, share your good luck with me!
texts.Message_200120_29: Really? Then we'll hit the jackpot today!
texts.Message_200120_31: Let's meet near Box Galaxy! You pick the time!
texts.Message_200120_34: You know that vending machine on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_200120_35: I heard that thing is always glitching, toss in your coins and no drink comes out
texts.Message_200120_36: But if you give it a good kick, sometimes stuff just falls out...
texts.Message_200120_37: It's such an inconvenience for the good people of Sixth Street! I was thinking of taking a closer look at it.
texts.Message_200120_38: How about we go there together?
texts.Message_200120_40: You just want the free stuff, don't you?
texts.Message_200120_41: Alright! I knew you'd be interested!
texts.Message_200120_42: Wdym! I'm just curious! You must be curious about this mysterious vending machine too, surely~
texts.Message_200120_43: Let's meet near the vending machine on Sixth Street! You pick the time!

texts.Message_20012102: Did you completely forget about Coff Cafe yesterday?
texts.Message_20012106: Just as well I didn't go either~
texts.Message_20012108: Let's call it even and go next time!

texts.Message_20012202: There's something I want to talk with you about, face-to-face
texts.Message_20012203: It's a big deal okay! And you'll never guess what it is!
texts.Message_20012206: You're so busy! I'll just come find you later
texts.Message_20012207: Great, when are you available? I'll head directly to the front of the video store to find you!

texts.Message_20012302: I said it was a big deal!
texts.Message_20012303: How are you gonna make it up to me?
texts.Message_20012307: But it CAN solve this! I'll be sure to remind you next time I see you, and if it's enough then we can consider it settled~
texts.Message_20012309: How about we be a little more practical and you cut me a discount on that debt I owe you? Think it over, won't ya!

texts.Message_20012401: Lemme tell you some good news
texts.Message_20012402: I got a thank-you letter from a client today!
texts.Message_20012404: Reading all that made my eyes hurt. I guess that's the problem with being too awesome~
texts.Option01_20012406: Are you sure it isn't a letter of complaint?
texts.Message_20012409: Who'd you take us for? We're the highest-rated odd-job agency in all of New Eridu!
texts.Message_20012410: Though, I have received letters of complaint before, too...
texts.Message_20012412: Do you want a thank-you letter, too? I can write you one if you do

texts.Message_20012501: Sigh... Hardly any commissions these days
texts.Option01_20012504: Don't worry about it so much
texts.Message_20012507: But that would also require my landlord to not worry about it so much
texts.Message_20012508: Sigh, I won't bore you anymore. Time I went back to posting ads on Inter-Knot
texts.Message_20012509: I gotta land a commission today!
texts.Message_20012512: Oh, speaking of... Why don't we help each other?
texts.Message_20012513: What is it people say these days? Let's get that bread~

texts.Message_20012601: I just found a bunch of bad reviews...
texts.Message_20012603: Someone is trying to sully the name of us Cunning Hares!
texts.Message_20012604: Could it be one of our competitors trying to review-bomb us?
texts.Option01_20012605: Could be someone with a grudge
texts.Message_20012608: Sigh, it's hard not to have a target painted on your back when you're this good
texts.Message_20012609: I never thought you'd get me so well~ All that money I spent on your commission fee was worth it!
texts.Message_20012611: Even though there're sometimes a few minor setbacks along the way...
texts.Message_20012612: But the end result is what matters!

texts.Message_20012701: I've got an important question to ask you
texts.Message_20012705: Then I'll pick the one that ends in a 0!
texts.Message_20012707: Looks like my luck's pretty average today
texts.Message_20012709: Then I'll pick the one that ends in a 1
texts.Message_20012711: Looks like your luck is pretty good!
texts.Message_20012712: Next time we get coffee, it's on me!

texts.Message_20012801: I went out last night at midnight cause something came up
texts.Message_20012802: Y'know, Sixth Street is kinda scary late at night
texts.Message_20012803: There's a talking dumpster, and also this payphone that suddenly rings by itself...
texts.Message_20012804: And some weirdos who ran away at the sight of me!
texts.Message_20012806: What's with that! It's so quiet and peaceful during the day...
texts.Option01_20012807: I think it's pretty peaceful at night, too
texts.Option01_20012808: Feeling paranoid cause you've been up to no good?
texts.Message_20012810: I guess you couldn't be a Proxy if you didn't have the courage
texts.Message_20012811: Then next time I wanna go out at night, I'll hit you up
texts.Message_20012812: I wasn't up to no good. Why, everything I do is always by the book!
texts.Message_20012813: And it's normal to feel scared when something like that happens
texts.Message_20012814: It's weirder if you're not scared!

texts.Message_20012901: I got another scratch card from the newsstand and won first prize again!
texts.Message_20012902: But this picture on the card is kinda...
texts.Message_20012903: But first prize is still first prize! That means I'm going to have great luck all-day
texts.Message_20012905: You jealous? Huh? Want some of my luck~?
texts.Message_20012908: Hmph, seeing as you asked so nicely...
texts.Message_20012910: You'll have amazing luck today, just like me~
texts.Message_20012911: So that's what you really think about me? Someone who always asks for money!
texts.Message_20012912: Whatever. I'm going to be the bigger person here
texts.Message_20012913: And despite what you said, I'm still gonna give you some of my luck!

texts.Message_20013003: And everyone else in the Cunning Hares overslept, too!
texts.Message_20013004: Even Anby's insane internal clock failed
texts.Message_20013006: No more team-building at night for us...
texts.Message_20013007: If I knew, I would've gotten you to wake me up!
texts.Message_20013008: Would you like to book a wake-up call? Monthly subscription available!
texts.Message_20013009: Next time, tell me beforehand and I can help out
texts.Message_20013010: ...Hey, you sound like me! You sure learn fast, huh?
texts.Message_20013011: But today really was just an accident
texts.Message_20013012: Someone as self-disciplined as me doesn't usually have a need for any wake-up calls~
texts.Message_20013013: For free? You're such a good friend!
texts.Message_20013014: Speaking of which... If we both wake each other up, then neither of us would have to pay, right?
texts.Message_20013015: I'm a genius... Next time, let's do that!

texts.Message_20020101: Manager, where were you this afternoon?
texts.Message_20020102: I waited at Godfinger for such a long time!
texts.Option01_20020103: I was caught up in something urgent
texts.Option01_20020104: I'll make it up to you next time
texts.Message_20020105: Well, I guess it can't be helped... Another time, then
texts.Message_20020106: Alright, it's a deal! Next time, you have to play a few rounds of games with me, Manager!

texts.Message_20020201: I've been thinking, my current facial components can't really express my emotions and it makes me seem kind of introverted, so I want to get new components that display facial text. What do you think? Should I make the change?
texts.Option01_20020202: You must have misunderstood the meaning of "introverted"
texts.Option01_20020203: What you have now is already adorable
texts.Message_20020204: I don't think so. How can I get its meaning wrong when it's such a simple word?
texts.Message_20020205: Quiet, absorbed in own thoughts, emotionally reserved, and keeps other people at a distance...
texts.Message_20020207: Happy as I am to receive your compliments...
texts.Message_20020208: But I've always thought my facial components are cool, not adorable!
texts.Message_20020209: Wait a minute. Does everyone else find this expression adorable?
texts.Message_20020210: Then why do I always get beaten up by Nicole and the rest? Is it because I'm too adorable?

texts.Message_20020301: Ding dong! Here's your morning tip from the Starlight Knight:
texts.Message_20020302: A new day with new weather — and new hope budding
texts.Message_20020303: To reach your dreams; strive to protect this city: o Knights!
texts.Message_20020306: You think so too, Manager? Great!
texts.Message_20020307: Good to know that the hour I spent yesterday coming up with this quote didn't go to waste
texts.Message_20020308: Nicole said it was cheesy... But she simply doesn't get the charm of the Starlight Knight!
texts.Message_20020309: Manager, that's no good. You only just got up. How can you be tired already!
texts.Message_20020310: If you're really feeling sleepy, watch an episode of Starlight Knight. That'll perk you right up
texts.Message_20020311: I don't share this life hack with just anyone

texts.Message_20020401: Manager, there's something I've been meaning to ask you!
texts.Message_20020402: So the original Starlight Knight tape came with this special edition which was only released for a few days before it was recalled due to a printing mistake
texts.Message_20020403: This happened years back. You ever heard about it?
texts.Message_20020406: Now, this misprint has become legendary among the fanbase. They say that only true blue real deal Starlight Knight fans own a copy
texts.Message_20020407: And the best part is, this copy has a 10-second long cut of bonus footage that's never been released before!
texts.Message_20020408: Unreleased footage, that's a must-see for real fans, right! So I thought I'd better ask you, Manager.
texts.Option01_20020409: I'll keep an eye out for you
texts.Option01_20020410: You'll be the first to find out as soon as I hear anything
texts.Message_20020411: Yes! I'll be waiting to hear from you then!

texts.Message_20020501: Manager, I hear you've got that special edition of Starlight Knight, right?
texts.Option01_20020503: Don't worry. You can count on me
texts.Message_20020504: That's why you're the best video store in New Eridu! I've been busy lately but I'll come see you as soon as I'm free!
texts.Option01_20020507: Don't worry, I'm saving it just for you
texts.Message_20020508: Thanks, Manager! You really are the best companion a Starlight Knight could ask for!

texts.Message_20020601: Manager! You promised you'd hook me up with a W-Engine yesterday. Where'd you get to...?
texts.Message_20020602: I was looking forward to it
texts.Message_20020606: It's okay. I felt a bit down at the thought of losing out on a W-Engine, but I'm all good!
texts.Message_20020607: Thanks for the chat, Manager. Next time lunch is on me!

texts.Message_20020701: "Those who cannot give up something are destined to end up with nothing."
texts.Message_20020702: That's why I've made a big decision — I've decided to give up:
texts.Message_20020703: Sleeping in late in the mornings!
texts.Message_20020706: Right? Yeah! I reckon it's a pretty amazing decision, too!
texts.Message_20020707: "Those who can muster the determination to leave their warm bed each morning can achieve anything."
texts.Message_20020710: Hey, what are you doing up already!
texts.Message_20020711: Dang, Manager! So you can muster the determination to leave your warm bed too... No wonder you're so good!

texts.Message_20020802: This time of day is the hardest. I just woke up feeling groggy and can't wait to go back to sleep!
texts.Message_20020803: If you're faced with the same problem—
texts.Message_20020804: Just put on the Starlight Knight soundtrack!
texts.Message_20020805: You'll be instantly awake, pumping, and ready for the day with just one listen!
texts.Option01_20020807: You really do put in a lot of effort to promote the Starlight Knight
texts.Message_20020808: Heh, so you're a pro at working up early huh...
texts.Message_20020809: Wanna hear the ending theme of Starlight Knight? It's the perfect background music for getting work done!
texts.Message_20020811: I'm not doing it to promote the Starlight Knight! It's just a really effective way of doing things. Give it a try—

texts.Message_20020902: Tell me... Why does happiness always pass by so fast?
texts.Message_20020903: Sigh, I wish I could go back in time...
texts.Message_20020904: Go back to a time I didn't have to get up so early...
texts.Option01_20020906: Why not just go back to last night when you were falling asleep?
texts.Message_20020907: Don't you reckon so too? People aren't designed to get up so early...
texts.Message_20020908: Sleeping 'til you wake up naturally, that's the way life should be!
texts.Message_20020909: You're right — just when you're starting to nod off is when I'm at my happiest...
texts.Message_20020910: I'd love to stay in bed but Nicole will chew me out. Forget it!

texts.Message_20021002: I was watching a late-night drama last night and I just couldn't stop watching...
texts.Message_20021003: And just like that I accidentally stayed up all night...
texts.Message_20021004: Luckily, my facial components aren't that smart
texts.Message_20021005: Otherwise everyone would be able to see the deep dark circles under my eyes!
texts.Option01_20021007: Don't forget to look after your health, Billy
texts.Message_20021008: Don't stereotype me like that, Manager! I do have other favorite late-night dramas!
texts.Message_20021009: Although last night, I was actually watching Oh~ Sweetie...
texts.Message_20021010: It's just an occasional all-nighter. It's no big deal, really!
texts.Message_20021011: Hmm? Something about that comment feels weird...

texts.Message_20021101: What do you think, Manager? I did pretty well yesterday, right!
texts.Option01_20021104: You did a great job promoting Starlight Knight
texts.Message_20021105: Ain't that the truth! But don't talk like that, I'm good at dealing with customers~
texts.Message_20021106: I promoted the new Starlight Knight movie to loads of people yesterday
texts.Message_20021107: That's right — but hang on now, that's not all! I bet sales were pretty good yesterday, right?
texts.Message_20021108: Even though I did promote Starlight Knight to a whole bunch of people...
texts.Message_20021109: And I met some other fans of Starlight Knight
texts.Option01_20021110: But Starlight Knight has always been famous
texts.Option01_20021111: There's loads of Starlight Knight fans out there
texts.Message_20021112: It's still not enough though. My goal is for everyone in the world know about the Starlight Knights!
texts.Message_20021113: But I have to thank you, Manager
texts.Message_20021114: And I'd like to try again sometime, if I ever get the chance

texts.Message_20021201: Manager! Don't tell me you've forgotten about our deal!
texts.Message_20021205: I knew you'd forgotten! Your memory is just like mine
texts.Message_20021206: You didn't forget? Well then how come you didn't come!
texts.Message_20021207: Were you too busy? Shall we reschedule?
texts.Message_20021210: Alright. See you at the video store then

texts.Message_20021301: I had a great time yesterday
texts.Message_20021302: But I was in such a rush I totally forgot we were supposed to meet!
texts.Message_20021304: Name your punishment, Manager. Whatever you want!
texts.Message_20021305: But hopefully it's something that won't get me apprehended by the authorities — or get me in trouble Nicole!
texts.Option01_20021307: Just buy me a cup of coffee
texts.Message_20021308: Of course! I'm a man of my word.
texts.Message_20021309: Then buy me a cup of coffee
texts.Option01_20021310: I want you to make me a cup of coffee!
texts.Option01_20021311: Just a cup of coffee? That's it? You really are too kind...
texts.Message_20021312: If it were Nicole, she'd have blackmailed me into an expensive meal
texts.Message_20021313: Just a cup of coffee? That's it? Manager, you really are too kind!
texts.Message_20021314: If it were Nicole, she'd have blackmailed me into an expensive meal
texts.Message_20021315: Alright, to show my sincerity, I'll make a cup of coffee just for you!
texts.Message_20021316: I've never brewed coffee before... But I'm sure it's a piece of cake!
texts.Message_20021317: Tin Master on Sixth Street looks just like me, so I guess I'm genetically predisposed to brewing good coffee
texts.Message_20021318: So I'll brew up some coffee for you, then take it straight over to the video store
texts.Message_20021319: Manager, what time are you free?

texts.Message_20021402: I told you I'd be bringing coffee over. How come you were out!
texts.Message_20021405: You weren't there! I waited ages for you
texts.Message_20021406: I waited so long I ended up drinking the coffee I brought for you
texts.Message_20021408: When are you free next, Manager? I'll bring another coffee over
texts.Message_20021411: Okay, I'll see you at the video store then
texts.Message_20021412: And don't leave me hanging this time, okay!

texts.Message_20021501: Hey Manager, remember that Sixth Street Motor Legend from yesterday?
texts.Option01_20021503: A rebel from an Outer Ring biker gang?
texts.Message_20021505: No no no, what I heard was...
texts.Message_20021506: He's actually the boss of Turbo! I think his name's Enzo or something...
texts.Message_20021507: Enzo is the boss of Turbo, right? So you already know him? You're so well informed...
texts.Message_20021508: But it's all just rumors. There's no concrete evidence
texts.Message_20021509: I'm gonna go to Turbo during the day and get some info from Enzo in person...
texts.Message_20021510: Come with me, Manager! Any time's good, it's up to you
texts.Message_20021513: Great! See you outside Turbo, then!

texts.Message_20021601: Manager! Why didn't you come yesterday?
texts.Message_20021602: I spent the whole morning outside Turbo like some idiot
texts.Message_20021603: The boss spent the whole time looking at me funny!
texts.Message_20021606: I should've known you'd forget... Since I almost forgot myself
texts.Message_20021607: But I went in the end!
texts.Message_20021608: You didn't go, did you? I knew it!
texts.Message_20021609: My memory might not be great, but I can at least remember what happened yesterday!
texts.Message_20021610: I never took you for such a forgetful person, Manager...
texts.Message_20021611: But anyway, why don't we go some other time?
texts.Message_20021614: Awesome. Let's meet up outside Turbo then
texts.Message_20021615: If you forget again, I'll come looking for you at the video store!

texts.Message_200217_04: Perhaps we can do something together?
texts.Message_200217_05: Although I've no idea what to do...
texts.Message_200217_07: {M#Wanna go somewhere together?}{F#Let's go out and have fun!}
texts.Message_200217_10: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_200217_13: You're asking me out! I'm flattered.
texts.Message_200217_14: {M#Is it because you have a place in mind that you're too embarrassed to go alone?}{F#Is there somewhere you've been dying to check out but didn't want to go alone?}
texts.Message_200217_16: {M#I just wanted to hang out.}{F#I just wanted to hang out and have a good time with you!}
texts.Message_200217_17: Huh? Guess I read that wrong.
texts.Message_200217_18: Wow, you really think highly of me, Manager! That's touching!
texts.Message_200217_19: Where would you like to go? I'm down for anything!
texts.Message_200217_23: And it's perfect for taking pictures.
texts.Message_200217_24: Speaking of which, I've been practicing some awesome Starlight Knight poses lately, and I need someone to take some pictures of me
texts.Message_200217_25: I heard you're a pro at taking photos, so I was hoping you'd help me out...
texts.Message_200217_27: I'll make sure you look just like the Starlight Knight himself!
texts.Message_200217_29: Aww... Thank you so much, Manager!
texts.Message_200217_30: Let's meet near Box Galaxy, then.
texts.Message_200217_31: When are you available? I'm free whenever!
texts.Message_200217_34: I was planning to play a few rounds, too!
texts.Message_200217_36: But just a heads up, my skills have really leveled up lately.
texts.Message_200217_41: When are we meeting? The sooner, the better!

texts.Message_20021802: After agreeing to meet up at Box Galaxy, something came up and I had to leave right after getting there
texts.Message_20021803: I hope you weren't waiting long?
texts.Option01_20021804: It's fine. I didn't go either
texts.Option01_20021805: I waited an eternity for you
texts.Message_20021806: What? So you didn't go either... That's great! I thought I'd left you high and dry...
texts.Message_20021807: Really! I'm really sorry... Next time, lunch is on me!

texts.Message_200219_03: Huh? Is it a special day today?
texts.Message_200219_05: It's the day we'll hang out and have fun.
texts.Message_200219_06: It's the day we meet up and have a great time.
texts.Message_200219_08: Huh? We made plans? I totally forgot...
texts.Message_200219_09: It's my fault! I'll update my memory module later... Thanks for reminding me, Manager!
texts.Message_200219_11: Where do you wanna go? I'm game for anything!
texts.Message_200219_13: If you're asking, I'm definitely free!
texts.Message_200219_17: {M#Since you're free, let's hang out.}{F#Since you're free, wanna hang out?}
texts.Message_200219_24: Oh, it's been a while since I've been there.
texts.Message_200219_25: Perfect, I've been wanting to check out some CDs!
texts.Message_200219_28: Let's go, we'll see who has better taste in music
texts.Message_200219_29: Ofc! You know me best, Manager!
texts.Message_200219_31: Just pick a time that works for you. Let's meet at Bardic Needle.
texts.Message_200217_34: I was planning to play a few rounds, too!
texts.Message_200217_36: But just a heads up, my skills have really leveled up lately.
texts.Message_200217_41: When are we meeting? The sooner, the better!

texts.Message_20022001: Manager! You stood me up again yesterday!
texts.Option01_20022004: I got lost on the way over to Godfinger.
texts.Message_20022005: You're even more brazen than when I forget!
texts.Message_20022006: Even I can see that's a half-hearted excuse!
texts.Message_20022007: But the Starlight Knights are nothing if not always tolerant! Let's meet up again next time you're free.

texts.Message_20022101: Manager! Planning to go to Bardic Needle sometime?
texts.Message_20022102: Take me with you if you do!
texts.Message_20022103: I haven't been for ages and I want to pick out some discs
texts.Message_20022106: Awesome! Looks like I asked you right on time!
texts.Message_20022107: How is it you're even busier than the Starlight Knights who're out here saving the whole world!
texts.Message_20022108: Let's go next time you're free then
texts.Message_20022109: Pick a time, Manager. I await your instructions!

texts.Message_20022202: Manager, is there something you'd like to apologize to me for?
texts.Message_20022205: You can't even admit it! You stood me up yesterday, you didn't show up at Bardic Needle
texts.Message_20022206: Exactly! I was stood outside Bardic Needle all day. Everyone thought I some weirdo trying to attract customers
texts.Message_20022207: But since it's you, Manager, I'm willing to forgive you
texts.Message_20022208: Just don't stand me up again next time!

texts.Message_20022302: I've got a little surprise for you
texts.Message_20022303: Ah... It's not a surprise now I've said it!
texts.Message_20022305: Pretend like you never saw that message...
texts.Option01_20022306: I saw it, and I'm free
texts.Option01_20022307: I saw it, but I'm not free right now.
texts.Message_20022308: Awesome! Then let's pick a time to meet up

texts.Message_20022401: Manager! Even after I let slip about the surprise, you still didn't come
texts.Message_20022402: If it were Nicole, she'd have turned up for sure!
texts.Option01_20022403: My surprise was having too much work yesterday
texts.Message_20022405: So you've already had a surprise at work...
texts.Message_20022406: Oh, I see. You don't need surprises huh? Baloney!
texts.Message_20022407: I was actually going to give you something, but now it's all gone!

texts.Message_20022501: I've been left in charge of the office again
texts.Message_20022504: But why is it always me left behind?
texts.Message_20022507: Oh! So that's why. I get it
texts.Message_20022508: Looking after things is important. They need a reliable Starlight Knight like me to keep an eye on things here
texts.Message_20022509: You've pulled me out of a funk with just one word. You really are good, Manager!
texts.Message_20022510: I'm not the sharpest tool, so don't go trying to trick me
texts.Message_20022511: The foundation, huh? I've never heard that one before
texts.Message_20022512: Everyone in the Cunning Hares knows that we're all equal!
texts.Message_20022513: Fine, I admit with the exception of Nicole...

texts.Message_20022602: Noodles or hamburgers, which do you prefer?
texts.Message_20022606: Woohoo, thank you, Manager! I knew it
texts.Message_20022607: I just bet Anby you liked noodles better. The loser has to clean the toilet today
texts.Message_20022608: I'd already lost for a week running...
texts.Message_20022609: But thanks to you, Manager, I can shake off the toilet curse!
texts.Message_20022610: What?! You prefer burgers... General Chop is gonna be as heartbroken as I am!
texts.Message_20022611: I just bet Anby you liked noodles better. The loser has to clean the toilet today
texts.Message_20022612: I'd already lost for a week running... Looks like that's gonna continue
texts.Message_20022613: Dang, it's all my fault. I don't know you well enough, Manager!

texts.Message_20022701: Just now at Godfinger, a bunch of people came up and surrounded me.
texts.Message_20022703: I thought they were lookin for a fight, and I was all ready to call PubSec...
texts.Message_20022704: But turns out, they wanted me to take them on as disciples!
texts.Message_20022705: That's the kind of trouble you gotta put up with if you're top of the leaderboard
texts.Option01_20022706: Did you take them on as disciples then?
texts.Option01_20022707: Let me take that trouble off your hands then
texts.Message_20022709: My Cunning Hares' work keeps me pretty busy. Nicole would be angry if I secretly took on followers
texts.Message_20022710: But I still taught them a few basic gaming skills I've picked up over the years
texts.Message_20022711: After all, spreading light and love is a Starlight Knight's noble duty!
texts.Message_20022713: You gotta get more points than me first!
texts.Message_20022714: Or I could give you my account, and you play for me?
texts.Message_20022715: Sounds good to me... Then I can keep the high score!

texts.Message_20022803: It's all because of that horror movie Anby watched yesterday!
texts.Message_20022804: I spent the whole night fighting zombies in my dream...
texts.Option01_20022806: Starlight Knights aren't afraid of zombies
texts.Message_20022808: Because I ended up biting the zombies in the neck!
texts.Message_20022809: ...Hang on. Why did I bite the zombies in the neck?
texts.Message_20022810: How could I be afraid of zombies!
texts.Message_20022811: Fine, maybe I was just a tiny bit afraid...
texts.Message_20022812: But at least I ended up winning!

texts.Message_20022904: Oh, so you're just as bored as I am then! Good to know.
texts.Message_20022905: Sigh, today's so boring. I don't even know what to write in my work report for today...
texts.Message_20022906: How about "working hard to keep the machines all running smoothly"? Sounds like work right?
texts.Message_20022907: Well, I guess I'm chattin with the Manager right now!
texts.Message_20022908: That's great. I can write this in the work report for today: "Exchanging important information with Proxy"
texts.Message_20022909: Reckon Nicole'll give me a raise if she reads that?

texts.Message_20023001: Manager, do you think you're a particularly lucky person?
texts.Message_20023002: Or that you just have average luck?
texts.Message_20023006: I read on Inter-Knot if you hang out with other lucky people, your own luck slowly improves
texts.Message_20023008: Manager! I really need to hang out with you a lot more...
texts.Message_20023009: I reckon you're lucky enough, Manager
texts.Message_20023011: Me and Anby were doing rock-paper-scissors to see who'd get to use the TV, and I lost again!
texts.Message_20023012: It's been so long now since I last saw Starlight Knight on TV. It feels like my heart is starting to rust...

texts.Message_20023101: Manager, I dreamed about you last night!
texts.Message_20023102: You treated me to eat ten whole bowls of noodles, and then you were drinking all this coffee...
texts.Message_20023103: Nicole said, what's on your mind during the day goes into your dreams during the night
texts.Message_20023104: Maybe I haven't been eating enough recently, hence the dream...
texts.Option01_20023105: You can't drink too much coffee at once
texts.Message_20023108: I don't know why but Tin Master seems to advocate drinking only one cup of coffee a day
texts.Message_20023109: If you used the power of money on him... Could you get to drink more coffee?
texts.Message_20023110: But we're getting a little off-topic. What were we talking about in the first place...
texts.Message_20023111: Course not! The Cunning Hares staff meals are filling
texts.Message_20023112: Anything tastes great so long as you're not the one doing the cooking
texts.Message_20023113: But thinking about it from another angle...
texts.Message_20023114: Maybe I just want to have dinner together with you, Manager!

texts.Message_20030101:
Mackerel, oh, I yearn for thee~ Nicole denies it, a fishy decree~ Grant me mackerel, meow, I plea~
Snake, mouse, or sparrow, Which do you like? I'll leave one at your door in return.
texts.Message_20030104: What? I didn't know you had such... interesting tastes.
texts.Message_20030105: Very well then. You'll hand over the fish and I'll give you the goods at the same time
texts.Message_20030106: I'm off to buy some cheap plastic models of a snake, mouse, and sparrow~
texts.Message_20030108: I get it. You want to give me free mackerel
texts.Message_20030109: If you must, I'll reluctantly accept~ Sigh, why was I born such a good person?

texts.Message_20030202: I've just upgraded my OS, so I wanna gift you a fat red packet
texts.Message_20030203: Just reply "Lady Nekomata is the best in the world" to claim it!
texts.Option01_20030205: Lady Nekomata is the best in the world
texts.Option01_20030206: How come I didn't know about such a function?
texts.Message_20030207: Thanks. That's my lunch plans sorted!
texts.Message_20030208: I bet Anby you'd say those exact words. And I won~
texts.Message_20030209: Ah c'mon! Couldn't you just say "Lady Nekomata is the best in the world" and let me win the bet?
texts.Message_20030210: I just bet Anby you'd say those exact words, and now I've lost and cost myself lunch!

texts.Message_20030301: Hello, U there? I need your help now~
texts.Message_20030302: It's super urgent!!! Plz reply asap
texts.Message_20030304: Have you got a tape of "Raiders of the Hollow 4" at the store?
texts.Message_20030305: I'm dying to see it! I can't wait~
texts.Message_20030308: No wonder you're the best video store in New Eridu~ You got your hands on it so fast!
texts.Message_20030309: I'll come pick up the movie in a while then, thanks!
texts.Message_20030310: If you could find it, that'd be great! I'm sure you will!
texts.Message_20030311: I've seen the first three in the Raiders of the Hollow series. There's no way I'm missing the fourth!

texts.Message_20030402: "Raiders of the Hollow 4," the latest one — can I come into the store and get it?
texts.Message_20030406: I'll be in as soon as I finish dealing with some work!

texts.Message_20030502: Why are we hardwired to sleep at night and work by day...
texts.Message_20030503: The sun's so bright during the day, and there's all this different weather to deal with. It's such a pain...
texts.Message_20030504: We should be active at night, and doze in sweet comfort during the day. Right?
texts.Option01_20030505: Bad weather happens at night too, you know...
texts.Option01_20030506: Night or day, I don't care — all I wanna do is sleep
texts.Message_20030508: Can you actually recall more diverse weather conditions during the day than at night?
texts.Option01_20030509: Yeah, because I'm sleeping at night...
texts.Option01_20030510: Yeah, because I don't have any memories of each night...
texts.Message_20030513: That's what I was thinking, but I wasn't gonna say it out loud~
texts.Message_20030514: Sleeping all day and all night is far too lazy!
texts.Message_20030515: People will hate you if you do that~

texts.Message_20030601: Today I woke up aching all over...
texts.Message_20030602: It must be because I'm still tired from work yesterday!
texts.Message_20030605: Hard work is a hard life
texts.Message_20030606: Yesterday, I beat up ten flunkies who'd skipped out on their debts, then ended up running around all day trying to get away from this debt collector. And then, I fell into a Hollow...
texts.Message_20030607: Nicole should really consider giving me a promotion!
texts.Message_20030610: I wanna be a team leader! Give me Anby and let me manage her work! Heehee~
texts.Message_20030612: I just beat ten flunkies who'd skipped out on their debts all by myself, but they were all pretty weak
texts.Message_20030613: Then I had to run for ages to lose this debt collector, though I only had to run a mile...
texts.Message_20030614: Then, I fell into a Hollow — but I got out easily
texts.Message_20030615: Sigh, why must I be such a hardworking individual~

texts.Message_20030704: If you're not up yet — wake up!
texts.Option01_20030706: Why do you care so much about whether I'm awake or not...
texts.Message_20030708: I woke up suuuuper early today!
texts.Message_20030709: Now that I'm up, I can't let anyone else keep sleeping in~
texts.Message_20030711: Once I get up, I can't just let anyone else keep enjoying their sleep!

texts.Message_20030801: I'm so tired from my morning run...
texts.Message_20030803: Morning is the most tiring time of day.
texts.Message_20030804: Running is nothing compared with getting up early!
texts.Option01_20030805: You actually went running in the morning???
texts.Message_20030807: What? What's so surprising about that?
texts.Message_20030808: That girl Anby gets up to run every morning.
texts.Message_20030810: Running is fine. Especially for someone like me who's got a lot of energy to spend every day.
texts.Message_20030814: Hmph, of course I am! So what if Anby runs every morning, I won't lose to her!

texts.Message_20030902: Yesterday, you promised to play hide and seek with me, but you ran off!
texts.Message_20030903: I was hiding outside for half the night...
texts.Option01_20030905: You're too good at hiding. I couldn't find you.
texts.Message_20030907: Hmph, I guess hide and seek is my wheelhouse after all~
texts.Message_20030908: But that's not an excuse for you failing to find me!
texts.Message_20030909: At least try to come up with a more reasonable excuse!
texts.Message_20030910: That sounds like something that movie nerd Anby would come up with.
texts.Message_20030911: Whatever, seeing as we didn't finish things last night, you pick a time and let's do it again!
texts.Message_20030915: Remember, this time you can't just run off like last time!

texts.Message_20031002: I've been caught up in a terrible dispute.
texts.Message_20031003: Right in front of your video store, too.
texts.Message_20031004: Please help me, or else the cops will arrest me!

texts.Message_20031103: I really was this~ close to being taken by Public Security!
texts.Message_20031107: So you could come today and settle things!
texts.Message_20031108: Pick a time, and let's meet at the entrance to the video store.
texts.Message_20031111: We're set then. And you'd better come this time!

texts.Message_200312_02: Please send me a message if you see this
texts.Message_200312_05: No work at the Cunning Hares today
texts.Message_200312_11: Where do you want to go? I'm whatever~
texts.Message_200312_15: Huh? You're the one who asked me to send you "a message"
texts.Message_200312_18: {M#I'll take you to a fun place!}{F#I miss you so much, Nekomata!}
texts.Message_200312_19: Sure, I'm bored out of my mind anyway!
texts.Message_200312_21: Where do you feel like going?
texts.Message_200312_25: I was just thinking about going!
texts.Message_200312_35: The newsstand? Sure, sounds good to me!
texts.Message_200312_36: And I know a spot where the local cats hang out...
texts.Message_200312_39: Not mine! It's where all the stray cats from Sixth Street chill.
texts.Message_200312_41: Then let's head to the newsstand. I'll bring some treats!
texts.Message_200312_42: When's good for you? Let me know, and I'll see you then!

texts.Message_20031302: You didn't go to the video store at all yesterday, did you?
texts.Message_20031305: Why are you saying that like it's so obvious?
texts.Message_20031306: Then it must've been a video store in another dimension!
texts.Message_20031307: I waited all day in the store yesterday, but you never came
texts.Message_20031309: You gotta treat me to an apology banquet next time!

texts.Message_200314_05: Wait, you're not a thief, are you? Give that phone back to its rightful owner!
texts.Message_200314_06: Or are you just... trying to be all cute and stuff?
texts.Message_200314_07: I was just trying to be cute. I want to hang out with you.
texts.Message_200314_08: I'm not the owner, but I want to hang out with you.
texts.Message_200314_10: I got a screenshot of that!
texts.Message_200314_11: Next time you deny being cute, I'm using this against you. Hmhmhm!
texts.Message_200314_13: Caught you! I got a screenshot of that!
texts.Message_200314_14: You're the one who sent that meow meow!
texts.Message_200314_15: Alright. Where do you want to go?
texts.Message_200314_18: I'm so bored... Even my tail is starting to rust!
texts.Message_200314_19: {M#Should we find something to do?}{F#Let's find something fun to do!}
texts.Message_200314_22: First, I gotta check with Nicole before I bail!
texts.Message_200314_23: Work's chill at Cunning Hares, but I can't just walk out~
texts.Message_200314_24: Hope Nicole doesn't cut my pay for this...
texts.Message_200314_25: Alright, it's done. Where are we going?
texts.Message_200314_27: Let's head to Box Galaxy and kill some time!
texts.Message_200314_29: I was actually thinking of going there too!
texts.Message_200314_35: Alright then! You pick a time!
texts.Message_200314_39: I'm down for some gacha games, too.
texts.Message_200314_40: Let's meet at the most visible landmark on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_200314_46: Yeah, it's a popular meetup spot
texts.Message_200314_47: You pick the time! And don't be late

texts.Message_20031501: We said we'd go and play with the kitties yesterday
texts.Message_20031502: But you left all those kitties waiting on Sixth Street
texts.Message_20031503: Aren't you scared of all the dead mice they'll bring you?
texts.Message_20031507: You have to bring an awesome gift for them next time
texts.Message_20031508: Dried mackerel and canned cat food at least. Nothing less!

texts.Message_20031601: Are you to go shopping at 141 today?
texts.Message_20031602: If so, take me with you!
texts.Message_20031606: Fine. I'll ask again another day
texts.Message_20031607: When are you thinking of going?

texts.Message_20031706: If you went, you'd know I wasn't there~
texts.Message_20031711: But next time we agree to meet up, make sure you actually go!

texts.Message_20031803: I'm sure you're free today, right?
texts.Message_20031807: Ugh — fine, I'll believe you just this once! Guess I'll catch you some other time then
texts.Message_20031808: Let's meet at the most visible landmark on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_20031809: That's right, the legendary Bangboo &*@^#$ statue
texts.Message_20031810: Next to the gadget store Box Galaxy!
texts.Message_20031811: You pick a time. We'll meet at Box Galaxy, and don't be late!

texts.Message_20031903: I couldn't resist, so I ended up getting a bunch of gacha!
texts.Message_20031906: Hmph, I'm not Nicole, y'know. You think you can buy me for so cheap?
texts.Message_20031907: Those puppy-dog eyes are no substitute for canned cat food!
texts.Message_20031908: I've made a note of this in my little black book. If it happens again...
texts.Message_20031909: You feel just how sharp these claws of mine are!

texts.Message_20032006: All good. Just a little accident!
texts.Message_20032007: Oh, man. I was just kidding around with Anby
texts.Message_20032008: I lied and said I messaged you on her phone while she was sleeping
texts.Message_20032009: Then she tried to steal my phone. She doesn't have a sense of humor~
texts.Message_20032011: No matter how tricky they make the lids on canned cat food, I can always rip them open with my bare hands!
texts.Message_20032012: I wouldn't butt dial you. It's all Anby's fault
texts.Message_20032013: It was just a joke, but she actually tried to grab my phone. Luckily she didn't get it~

texts.Message_20032102: If someone really, really, absolutely doesn't want to get up in the morning
texts.Message_20032108: Because I've felt like this for a week already!
texts.Message_20032109: I used to sleep in before, but never this bad... It must be all the work lately making me tired
texts.Message_20032110: Nicole should give me some workplace accident compensation...
texts.Message_20032112: But I think really early risers are the ones who aren't normal
texts.Message_20032113: How is it possible for someone to get up so early in the morning and then go outside and exercise?
texts.Message_20032115: Isn't he the one who has an alarm clock installed in his body?

texts.Message_20032201: I found this wallet on Sixth Street. I didn't know who it belonged to
texts.Message_20032202: When I handed it to Public Security
texts.Message_20032203: the officer praised me as a "good kid"...
texts.Option01_20032205: Should he have called you a "good citizen" instead?
texts.Message_20032207: No, the point is — it makes me sound like some domesticated cat
texts.Message_20032209: "Good citizen" sounds much better to me
texts.Message_20032210: Probably because that's what Nicole's always muttering to herself...

texts.Message_20032301: When I went into the Hollow with everyone yesterday
texts.Message_20032302: I bumped into this Hollow Raider who looked familiar
texts.Message_20032303: As soon as this guy saw me he turned tail and ran, like a rat seeing a cat!
texts.Message_20032304: He was gone so fast he didn't even have time to grab the Ether matter that was with him...
texts.Option01_20032306: Nekomata! Your almighty reputation precedes you
texts.Option01_20032307: What did you do to that guy?
texts.Message_20032308: C'mon... I'm just doing my job~
texts.Message_20032310: I don't really want to be so flashy
texts.Message_20032311: I just want a peaceful life
texts.Message_20032312: But I just can't help myself~
texts.Message_20032313: I don't actually have any idea what I did to the guy...
texts.Message_20032314: I probably just beat him up or something!
texts.Message_20032315: Yikes, I never thought I'd actually traumatize someone like that

texts.Message_20032404: Guess what, guess what? Go on, ask me (ask me!)
texts.Option01_20032406: Maybe we should refrain from asking.
texts.Message_20032407: Because of my excellent performance with the Cunning Hares
texts.Message_20032408: Nicole has promised to give me a raise~
texts.Message_20032409: She also said I'm the fastest employee to ever get a raise out of all the Cunning Hares ever!
texts.Message_20032410: Sigh, the others might get jealous when they hear how awesome I am~
texts.Message_20032411: How are you not in the slightest bit interested?!
texts.Message_20032412: Fine, don't ask then. There's no way I'd tell you unprompted about how Nicole's giving me a raise

texts.Message_20032501: Anby says Howl over at the newsstand licked the back of her hand
texts.Message_20032502: I was licked on the hand once by a Sixth Street stray cat
texts.Message_20032503: If it happened to you, would you prefer a cat or a dog?
texts.Message_20032506: How could you be so greedy!
texts.Message_20032507: Plus it would be way better for a Sixth Street cat to lick you. They're so cute.
texts.Message_20032509: And their tails are easier to stroke!
texts.Message_20032510: Heehee, I knew you'd pick a cat
texts.Message_20032511: I'm telling you, people who get licked by cats will get good luck
texts.Message_20032513: Not like dogs. All you get if a dog licks you is a soaking wet hand!

texts.Message_20032602: I'm much more easy-going than when I first joined the Cunning Hares
texts.Message_20032608: For a while, I thought I was better off just being by myself
texts.Message_20032609: I never thought living with others could be so fun~
texts.Message_20032610: Plus... I get the chance to chat with people like you all the time. It's hard not to be happy
texts.Message_20032612: But I also feel just a little bit different now
texts.Message_20032613: Maybe it's just because I've been in such a good mood these days?
texts.Message_20032614: For instance, when I'm chatting like we are now~
texts.Message_20032615: So I really have to thank you!

texts.Message_20040102: It would have left a bad impression on me if it had been someone else.
texts.Message_20040103: Yet, we have partnered before. I believe you're a reliable Proxy who aims to become like Phaethon one day.
texts.Option01_20040105: Sorry, I was so busy that it slipped my mind.
texts.Option01_20040106: I'll bring it the next time we meet.
texts.Message_20040107: ...I see. Seems like you've had a rough day.
texts.Message_20040109: How about you just keep the money. Take it as a prepaid commission fee. I'm sure we'll work together again in the future.

texts.Message_20040201: Good morning. How about having the Hell-level Spicy Cup Noodles as breakfast?
texts.Option01_20040203: Skip it if you want to be healthy.
texts.Message_20040206: For the sake of my health, I'll pick one that's less spicy.
texts.Message_20040208: You think what you said to me has fallen on deaf ears, don't you?
texts.Message_20040209: I did listen to you, but it's hard for me to change my mind once I've decided on something. You should know that.
texts.Message_20040210: The next time we meet, I'll recommend a cup noodle brand to you. Get ready, Hell-level Spicy Sweetheart!
texts.Message_20040212: To get rid of the excess salt consumed, I'll double my stamina training today.

texts.Message_20040304: Good morning, Crimson Dawn Muscled Man.
texts.Message_20040307: Aren't you going to answer me?
texts.Message_20040308: Good morning, Crimson Dawn Muscled Man.
texts.Message_20040309: Broke? Of course not. I've just done 233 push-ups.
texts.Message_20040311: Aren't you going to answer me?

texts.Message_20040504: You know it. Just as I thought.
texts.Message_20040505: It's the title of the documentary Captain Magus mentioned before.
texts.Message_20040506: "Every soldier who works in Hollows should watch it. Consider it part of the training," he said.
texts.Message_20040507: Do you know where to get the tape?
texts.Message_20040508: I'll help you look for it.
texts.Message_20040509: I don't have it with me, but I'll try get it for you
texts.Message_20040510: I appreciate that. You really are well-connected.
texts.Message_20040511: Just get in touch with me when you have it.

texts.Message_20040601: Have you found the videotape of "Glorious Guardians"?
texts.Option01_20040603: When can you come and get it?
texts.Message_20040605: I'm on a mission. Let's meet in a couple of days.
texts.Message_20040608: I guess you still remember the code word from last time?

texts.Message_20040702: I've folded my blanket. It is an impeccable as always.
texts.Message_20040705: A tidy bed reflects the meticulousness of a soldier.
texts.Message_20040706: If military discipline is not strictly adhered to, it will lead to the collapse of an entire army.
texts.Message_20040708: Of course, there was a deserter who folded her blanket neatly the day she deserted.
texts.Message_20040709: ...I hope you will never meet her.
texts.Message_20040710: I'm surprised you're interested in this.
texts.Message_20040711: There's a trick commonly used by the trainees — use a toothbrush to prop up the corners inside.
texts.Message_20040712: Try it. I'm going to training now. Good luck

texts.Message_20040801: I'm on my morning jog with Orphie.
texts.Option01_20040804: Let's work hard toward becoming like Phaethon today
texts.Message_20040807: Orphie is struggling to keep up with me.
texts.Message_20040808: I'm going to speed up and put some pressure on her.
texts.Message_20040809: She's a dedicated soldier. I'm sure that will motivate her to catch up.

texts.Message_20040901: I got up and found that Seed was pretending to be asleep again.
texts.Message_20040902: That's typical of him — putting on meaningless pretense.
texts.Message_20040903: By the way, good morning, Proxy.
texts.Message_20040906: No slacking off today too, alright?
texts.Message_20040907: I can't be beaten by Seed, that people-pleaser.
texts.Message_20040908: Think about your ambition of becoming like Phaethon!
texts.Message_20040909: Phaethon wouldn't be as lazy as you.

texts.Message_20041002: We agreed to wake up early. Don't be a deserter.
texts.Message_20041003: You know what happens to deserters, right?
texts.Option01_20041005: Let me sleep a bit more
texts.Message_20041006: I believe you'll get up right away.
texts.Message_20041008: Now, you have outperformed 99% of Proxies in New Eridu. That's how easy it is to become like Phaethon.
texts.Message_20041010: I understand that Proxies often don't have a fixed routine. Still, being healthy is the cornerstone of everything.
texts.Message_20041011: As long as you're driven to improve yourself, I'll continue to wake you up every morning.

texts.Message_20041101: These are great cat photos. Thank you
texts.Message_20041102: I bet this cuteness can turn anyone into a cat person
texts.Option01_20041104: That's what a cat person would say
texts.Message_20041105: No, you perfectly captured and recorded the most endearing moments of feline cuteness, that's what you did
texts.Message_20041106: Orphie said she always thought I was a dog person before.
texts.Message_20041107: I only searched for pictures of canine Thiren maids because I had to disguise myself for a mission...
texts.Message_20041108: Now, my homepage is flooded with pictures of canine Thiren girls and maids...
texts.Message_20041110: I think being around cats is more relaxing for me
texts.Message_20041111: Want to try it together? Let's schedule a time to meet up
texts.Message_20041115: I'll wait for you at the same place as last time. You'd better not be late

texts.Message_20041203: Unless it hits a vital spot...
texts.Message_20041204: Like the brain, eyes, heart, arteries... or the spine of a deserter
texts.Option01_20041206: Something came up last minute, and I forgot
texts.Message_20041207: Fine, I'll give you another chance
texts.Message_20041210: I hope... I'll get to see you this time

texts.Message_20041301: I am back from Hollow Zero
texts.Message_20041305: Let your words become a star on my uniform
texts.Message_20041306: We can meet, but there's no need for celebration. Completing missions is just my job
texts.Message_20041307: When are you free? I'll visit you

texts.Message_20041404: Never mind. But you had better come this time, or prepare to do some push-ups
texts.Message_20041405: "Next time" sounds so vague. Let's decide on a time
texts.Message_20041409: I'll wait for you at the noodle shop

texts.Message_200415_02: I've got some insider intel for you, Soldier 11.
texts.Message_200415_03: I'm deep in an infiltration mission
texts.Message_200415_05: Our cover got compromised because my cell phone just vibrated
texts.Message_200415_06: We're making a break for it earlier than planned. If you need anything, keep it short.
texts.Message_200415_07: I was going to ask you out
texts.Message_200415_08: I wanted to know if you have time
texts.Message_200415_09: You could've just asked. I won't say no. Where to?
texts.Message_200415_10: You may be an outsider, but your intel is always reliable.
texts.Message_200415_12: I was going to ask you out
texts.Message_200415_13: Just wanted to meet you and catch up
texts.Message_200415_15: ...More like intel on a certain soldier's relationship status
texts.Message_200415_21: Let's pick out some videotapes together...
texts.Message_200415_23: Watching movies won't make you the toughest soldier.
texts.Message_200415_25: I remember the road in front of the video store is perfect for a jog.
texts.Message_200415_28: Sure, I could use some exercise.
texts.Message_200415_29: Let's meet up near the video store on Sixth Street. You pick the time.
texts.Message_200415_32: Just give me a time, and I'll be there no matter what.

texts.Message_20041606: I was so looking forward to going through video game training with you
texts.Message_20041607: I guess I'll just have to do this another time. Please do show up next time

texts.Message_20041702: It is the same even for civilians
texts.Message_20041703: Orphie can't join stamina training as she's on a mission
texts.Message_20041704: Would you like to jog with me to make up for the training I've missed?
texts.Option01_20041706: Oh, please don't drag me into this
texts.Message_20041708: That's a pity, but it doesn't matter. I can jog alone
texts.Message_20041710: Let's meet near the video store on Sixth Street like last time

texts.Message_20041801: You usually come when I ask you out
texts.Message_20041802: But when it comes to jogging, you're nowhere to be seen
texts.Option01_20041804: I got held up by something else...
texts.Message_20041805: I'll believe you just this once.
texts.Message_20041806: Don't let me find evidence of your weakness
texts.Message_20041808: I'll show you how important it is to be fit

texts.Message_20041901: I have a day off today. Do you happen to be free?
texts.Message_20041902: The latest issue of the Ridu Newsletter is coming out soon. I want to check out the newsstand
texts.Message_20041903: I would like you to come with me
texts.Message_20041908: Next time then, when you're free
texts.Message_20041909: Let's meet near the newsstand on Sixth Street
texts.Message_20041910: You name a time. I trust you'll be punctual

texts.Message_20042001: You were a no-show at the newsstand yesterday
texts.Message_20042002: But you were hanging around the video store on Sixth Street, which was just a stone's throw away from the newsstand
texts.Message_20042005: It's all right. I didn't lose out on anything.

texts.Message_20042101: I've been wanting to eat at Waterfall Soup on Sixth Street
texts.Option01_20042104: Enjoy your meal! I'm quite busy these days...
texts.Message_20042105: How did you know I would ask you to come along?
texts.Message_20042107: That's a shame. I'll invite you next time
texts.Message_20042108: Pick a time then. I'll work around your schedule

texts.Message_20042201: Suppressive fire can be done by one person
texts.Message_20042202: But do you know why it's better when two people work together?
texts.Message_20042205: It's because they can cover for each other when they need to refill on ammo
texts.Message_20042206: The same applies to having noodles. Though one person can do it...
texts.Message_20042207: It's better to go with another person, if you get what I mean
texts.Option01_20042209: I'll honor our deal next time!

texts.Message_20042302: Captain Magus once told us of his experiences at a field hospital
texts.Message_20042303: There was a cat in the hospital, always lying on the beds of critically wounded soldiers. Those it chose to lay by would soon pass away
texts.Message_20042304: I've been noticing this black cat down in the alleyways behind the arcade.
texts.Message_20042305: Let's find some time to go and check on the cat together
texts.Message_20042306: I have a duty to protect civilians in the event of any real danger
texts.Option01_20042309: I'll be there once I'm done.
texts.Message_20042312: I'll keep an eye on it until you're available
texts.Message_20042313: Then let's meet on the street behind the arcade at midnight.

texts.Message_20042401: I watched that black cat alone for ages yesterday
texts.Message_20042405: You stood me up, but I found spending time with the cat quite relaxing

texts.Message_20042504: It's hard to believe a Proxy brimming with ambitions like yourself
texts.Message_20042505: Would just be daydreaming about nothing at all
texts.Message_20042506: ...unless you've just finished a particularly tricky commission
texts.Message_20042507: I'm just reviewing the operation right now
texts.Message_20042508: As expected of the Proxy they call "Phaethon." I was right about you
texts.Message_20042509: I have to keep working harder just to keep up with you. Bye now

texts.Message_20042601: Question: Do you know what a "safe word" is?
texts.Message_20042605: I had to stand in as an instructor to train the new troops today
texts.Message_20042606: But my style seems to be a little stricter than they're used to
texts.Message_20042607: "This instructor's the type to not even stop if you say the safe word!"
texts.Message_20042608: That's what I heard them saying on their break
texts.Message_20042610: But Trigger said I shouldn't really look into it...
texts.Message_20042611: It can't be very important if you don't even know what it means

texts.Message_20042706: I just finished a mission working with a civilian Proxy, and they almost got us into a major problem
texts.Message_20042707: I'm ashamed. If I were working with you...
texts.Message_20042708: Then I wouldn't have put my colleagues in such a dangerous situation
texts.Option01_20042710: There's no rulebook for this kind of thing...
texts.Message_20042711: You seem to be growing in self-confidence. That's good, as long as you've got the strength to match
texts.Message_20042712: You're right. You can never have too many plan Bs

texts.Message_20042809: But I've still got the energy to complete today's
texts.Message_20042812: Sorry. I dropped my phone just then
texts.Message_20042813: Maybe I really should go take a nap for 15 minutes
texts.Message_20042814: Take care of yourself too, with the change of seasons, Proxy

texts.Message_20042902: you may temporarily experience this loss of feeling in your body,
texts.Message_20042904: I went to the noodle shop on Sixth Street yesterday and ate 3 bowls of super spicy noodles in one go
texts.Message_20042905: I had a slight stomach ache in the morning
texts.Message_20042908: Just the opposite, I feel ashamed
texts.Message_20042909: It's enough to prove I've been slacking on my personal fitness
texts.Message_20042910: A good soldier should always be aware of their own physical state
texts.Message_20042912: But sometimes when faced with a bowl of super spicy noodles, there's nothing you can do
texts.Message_20042913: It's truly delicious, so perhaps it's not my fault after all

texts.Message_20043001: I suddenly remembered — something quite thought-provoking happened recently
texts.Message_20043002: It's a follow-up from us working together, so I've been authorized to share it with you
texts.Message_20043003: I apprehended a fleeing soldier, and they insulted me as a mindless military lackey, claiming life held no enjoyment for me
texts.Message_20043004: But do people really need that much joy in their lives?
texts.Message_20043008: well, I think everyone has their own personal definition of what "joy" is
texts.Message_20043010: Compared to "joy," isn't "doing what you want" more important?
texts.Message_20043011: And besides, my life isn't completely devoid of joy
texts.Message_20043012: Captain Magus told me I laugh more since getting to know you
texts.Message_20043013: ...I don't mean that I'm laughing at you
texts.Message_20043014: Sorry, I'm really bad at talking about this kind of stuff

texts.Message_20043104: Orphie gave me a calorie-counting wristband
texts.Message_20043105: It's said to be good for managing your health
texts.Message_20043106: I barely moved this morning, but it's already saying I've burned 200 calories
texts.Message_20043107: I haven't even done my stretches
texts.Option01_20043109: Are you sure that's not your pulse
texts.Message_20043111: I'll get Trigger to give me some bread
texts.Message_20043112: With a heart rate of 200, would I still be able to chat with you right now...
texts.Message_20043113: Sorry, I'm still not that strong, but I'll try my best

texts.Message_20043202: Which do you think sounds better?
texts.Message_20043205: Can't you give me a more constructive answer than that?
texts.Message_20043206: I want to change the alarm on my phone
texts.Message_20043207: I'm using the factory default "ding ding" at the moment
texts.Message_20043208: But isn't "ding ding" kind of childish? For someone who's a soldier...
texts.Option01_20043210: Good point. You should change it
texts.Message_20043214: Someone said I'm making a big deal out of nothing, but I have never made a big deal out of nothing

texts.Message_20043303: I've brought shame on the Defense Force
texts.Message_20043308: I lost something very important yesterday while getting noodles on Sixth Street
texts.Message_20043309: I have to get it back before it's leaked to the public and causes a negative impact
texts.Message_20043310: You know your way around here better than I do. Can you please help me look for it? I'll wait for you on Sixth Street by the video store
texts.Message_20043313: I hope I'm not troubling you

texts.Message_20043401: Eternal Cat Kin, you still remember that black cat on Sixth Street, right?
texts.Message_20043402: I promised it I'd meet it late tonight at the old spot on Sixth Street
texts.Option01_20043404: Have your powers grown to the point where you can make plans with a cat?
texts.Message_20043405: There's a way... You can do it, too
texts.Message_20043406: ...This is one of my goals, which still has yet to be realized
texts.Message_20043407: Anyway, I'm going to Sixth Street tonight to meet up with it
texts.Message_20043408: If you want, you can come with me

texts.Message_20043502: There's something I want to tell you in person
texts.Message_20043503: When you're free, meet me near the video store on Sixth Street.
texts.Message_20043506: Good. See you at the usual time, then.

texts.Option02_40900102: Should I try to decode this or...?
texts.Message_40900105: My phone was knocked to the ground
texts.Message_40900106: Because Harumasa and Yanagi jumped onto my desk
texts.Message_40900111: You wonder why they jumped onto my desk?
texts.Message_40900113: There was a cockroach on the ground
texts.Message_40900115: You don't need to be afraid
texts.Message_40900118: Why are you afraid of cockroaches?
texts.Message_40900121: It's a deep caramel color with a metallic sheen
texts.Message_40900125: You said the same thing as Yanagi and Harumasa

texts.Message_40900203: I could freeze to death here for three days
texts.Option02_40900205: Maybe you can turn up the temperature a little bit?
texts.Message_40900209: Imagine I'm training on a snow-capped mountain...
texts.Message_40900212: There is no signal in the snowy mountains
texts.Message_40900215: Soukaku and I are on duty tonight
texts.Message_40900216: If I turn up the temperature

texts.Message_40900301: I've heard that watching videotapes is also a form of training
texts.Option02_40900302: I want to know who said that...
texts.Message_40900305: But those words linger in my thoughts
texts.Message_40900306: If it's alright, I'd like to come by your store and pick up a videotape
texts.Option02_40900307: I look forward to your visit

texts.Option02_40900404: I want to ask you out
texts.Option01_40900406: Do you want to watch a movie?
texts.Option02_40900406: How about going for some noodles?
texts.Message_40900409: Then let's meet at Lumina Square
texts.Message_40900410: Let's go to the cinema together
texts.Message_40900416: Waterfall Soup on Sixth Street should be more convenient for you

texts.Option01_40900501: I had a dream about you last night
texts.Option01_40900504: So I'd like to meet up today
texts.Option02_40900504: So... I'd like to see you today
texts.Message_40900506: But I'd also like to see you
texts.Message_40900507: Is there somewhere you'd like to go?
texts.Option01_40900508: How about a stroll by the sea?
texts.Message_40900510: I also want to go to the seaside
texts.Message_40900511: Then let's take a walk along the seaside.
texts.Message_40900514: Could you accompany me to the Outer Ring?

texts.Message_40900601: When I was waiting for you at the cinema
texts.Message_40900603: So I had to leave early, and couldn't wait for you
texts.Option02_40900605: It's okay, let's meet up next time

texts.Message_40900702: I went to the wrong noodle shop
texts.Option01_40900703: We were meeting at the one on Sixth Street!
texts.Option02_40900703: It's the one on Sixth Street!
texts.Message_40900705: No wonder you didn't show up at Waterfall Soup in Lumina Square
texts.Message_40900707: I thought you stood me up.

texts.Message_40900801: I didn't see you by the seaside
texts.Message_40900806: I also tend to forget things easily
texts.Message_40900807: But I rarely forget things that are related to you.

texts.Message_40900902: Didn't we agree to meet in the Outer Ring
texts.Message_40900905: I was worried I got the time wrong
texts.Message_40900906: I've gotten a lot of things wrong lately...
texts.Message_40900907: It's okay, let's meet next time.

texts.Message_41300102: i dunno which one to pick, mind if I ask you
texts.Message_41300104: noodles, fried rice, rice cake soup, and sourdough... which one!
texts.Option01_41300105: Why are they all staple foods?
texts.Option02_41300105: Is it time to eat already...?
texts.Message_41300106: actually, Id rather have some meat! But the allowance I set aside for a late night snack isnt that much, hehe...
texts.Message_41300107: I wanna eat them all... can you not decide either, Proxy?
texts.Option01_41300108: They all sound so delicious it's hard to pick
texts.OptionLong01_41300108: They all sound so delicious it's hard to pick... How about a different one every day? Then today, tomorrow, the day after that and the day after THAT you can rotate through them all!
texts.Option02_41300108: Whenever you can't choose, just leave it up to fate
texts.OptionLong02_41300108: I really can't choose... So how about drawing straws? We write out four different strips, and whatever you draw you have to eat
texts.Message_41300111: Thats so clever!!! I got it!!! Let's do that!
texts.Message_41300112: Its a midnight snack! Im thinking ahead about what kind of midnight snack I wanna eat!

texts.Message_41300202: when other people are singing, what should I do?
texts.Option02_41300203: Hmm... Keep quiet and don't disturb them

texts.Message_41300205: I was listening, and I didnt make any noise. I was focusing real hard!
texts.Option01_41300206: Who were you listening to sing today?
texts.Option02_41300206: If it was Nagi singing, then you could be forgiven for getting distracted...
texts.Message_41300208: today we went out with Section 5! Before going out I saw Nagi chatting with Harumasa and Harumasa was really shocked! He was waving his hands around desperately shouting something like "No no, Ill do it myself"
texts.Message_41300209: and then once we got to the place, Harumasa kept singing...
texts.Message_41300210: while Harumasa was singing, I took my shot and wolfed down all the fruit and braised pork on the table!
texts.Message_41300212: actually, I wasnt even that hungry!
texts.Message_41300213: but if nobody ate it then itd be wasted right?

texts.OptionLong01_41300214: Mmm... You're right, Soukaku. If everyone's singing, then someone's got to eat the free food
texts.Option02_41300214: Besides eating, you should cheer on Harumasa
texts.OptionLong02_41300214: Mmm... How about next time Harumasa finishes a song, you stop for a second and clap for him, Soukaku?
texts.Message_41300215: yes yes yes! thats what I was thinking too...
texts.Message_41300216: um... but next time, Ill clap along when Nagi claps

texts.Message_41300220: i get it! Ill clap next time, too!
texts.Message_41300221: i asked him to eat but he said he was full...?

texts.Message_41300302: do you really rent out video tapes at your video store?
texts.Option02_41300303: If you want to borrow a videotape, you have to call me "Manager"
texts.Message_41300304: great! can you please help me?
texts.Message_41300305: Do you know the ridu tour? i really want to watch it, but i always end up missing it...
texts.Message_41300306: someone from section 5 told me if i had a videotape i could watch as many episodes as i wanted in one go!
texts.Option02_41300307: No problem. I'll find the entire collection for you
texts.Message_41300311: manager, manager help me. plz can you do sumthin for me...

texts.Option01_41300404: The Ridu Tour, right? It's here
texts.Option02_41300404: Come pick up the videotapes when you're free, Soukaku
texts.Message_41300407: wow did you know what i was going to ask before i even said anything!
texts.Option02_41300408: Because I'll always remember your commissions
texts.Message_41300410: imm all this way away from you, proxy, and you don't have a telescope or nuthin. so how can you read what it says?
texts.Option01_41300411: ...You're right, Soukaku... I was just kidding...
texts.Option02_41300411: Oops, busted. I was just guessing there

texts.Message_41300413: whatever you do, dont lend it to anyone else
texts.Message_41300414: ill come find you real soon to get that tape!!
texts.Message_41300417: thank you for helping me find those videotapes!

texts.Option02_41300505: I haven't finished up yet but I can right now~
texts.Message_41300506: its great having your own shop! you can close shop whatever time you want...
texts.Message_41300507: so where should we go hang out!
texts.Message_41300510: your sooo so awesome, proxy. Im hungry too teeheehee
texts.Message_41300511: can you eat spicy food? beef or lamb? how much can we get? let me count my allowance
texts.Message_41300512: can you wait for me a while? I wanna ask nagi for an advance on tomorrow's allowance... plus the day after tomorrow, and the day after that
texts.Option01_41300513: Take it easy, Soukaku. No need to rush
texts.Option02_41300513: How come you don't even have time to use punctuation marks
texts.Message_41300514: its super urgent Ill be real quick

texts.Message_41300526: what a coincidence! All it takes is seeing the word hungry for me to get hungry...
texts.Message_41300527: whatever! when your hungry you gotta eat!

texts.Message_41300604: so we had to freeze them all

texts.Message_41300607: ...ahh, no. proxy, do you wanna hang out with me?

texts.Message_41300609: i was thinking about you, too

texts.Message_41300616: you really love watching movies proxy!
