texts.Message_41301001: i waited ages at the office...
texts.Option01_41301003: I got caught up with something...
texts.Message_41301005: and after we finally had the chance...
texts.Message_41301006: can i call you next time?
texts.Message_41301007: make sure you come next time, please...

texts.Message_41301102: can i stay over at ur place for one night?
texts.Option01_41301103: Sure... But are you running away from home, Soukaku?
texts.Option02_41301103: Does Miss Tsukishiro know about this?
texts.Message_41301105: may i come to proxy's shop in the evening to talk in person?
texts.Option02_41301106: Then I'll close the shop early today.

texts.Message_41500101: I was taken away by the N.E.P.S. today
texts.Option02_41500102: Confess, and you'll get off easier. Keep resisting, and you'll regret it!
texts.Message_41500103: Don't look at us like that. We're law-abiding citizens here
texts.Message_41500104: ...They just wanted to check the permits for the commercial logistics company tied to the Sons of Calydon
texts.Message_41500105: The officer told me, "You're such a promising youngster with a noble temperament."
texts.Message_41500106: "You must be the boss of the Sons of Calydon."
texts.Message_41500107: ...Never in my whole life have I ever heard such music to my ears
texts.Message_41500108: Before I knew it, I was already following him
texts.Message_41500109: We had a nice chat in his office for about an hour
texts.Option01_41500110: Finally, someone who sees your worth.
texts.Option02_41500110: Don't tell me he mistook you for Caesar, did he?
texts.Message_41500111: ...Until he said, "Please sign here, Miss Caesar."
texts.Message_41500112: Kuso! I'll remember this humiliation until the day New Eridu falls
texts.Message_41500114: Caesar, the day will come when I'll be giving you a taste of this!
texts.Message_41500115: Hey, Proxy — I don't think you have the right to say that kind of thing to me!

texts.Message_41500201: Something really terrible happened today... Ahhh!
texts.Message_41500202: When I woke up this morning, I saw Caesar had sent me a DM at midnight
texts.Message_41500203: "Tank you, Lucy. Even tho we're always arguing"
texts.Message_41500204: "You taught me how to play the piano, which helped me control my mood through music"
texts.Message_41500205: "You're the most cultured person around here. I hope I can learn more from you"
texts.Option01_41500206: Sounds like there's a part of you that Caesar really admires.
texts.Message_41500207: ...When exactly did that wild boar learn how to be so cunning?
texts.Message_41500208: She totally did that on purpose to break down my defenses...
texts.Message_41500209: ...But luckily I told her off and made her take it all back
texts.Message_41500210: So now I've got my steely resolve back!
texts.Message_41500211: It feels good to be able to focus once again on ways to defeat Caesar...
texts.Message_41500212: Moving? No, it's bad! Absolutely terrifying!
texts.Message_41500213: I felt horrible after reading that message, as if Burnice was climbing all over me

texts.Message_41500301: Could you help me find this videotape?
texts.Message_41500302: I heard you can get your hands on any videotape you want
texts.Message_41500305: The "TreCarls"... It's a story about a family of Bangboo
texts.Message_41500306: There must be something in the water, because I somehow have a real hankering for watching this braindead family comedy
texts.Message_41500307: I heard it's pretty hard to get though
texts.Message_41500308: But I can count on you... Right?
texts.Message_41500312: Don't worry. I'm just asking about something suitable for all ages

texts.Option02_41500402: Just come and pick it up.
texts.Message_41500404: Just like you said, you really know your stuff
texts.Message_41500405: I'll be in to pick it up soon. Thanks a lot

texts.Message_41500503: Who said you could talk to me like that?
texts.Option01_41500507: Should I come find you in the Outer Ring?
texts.Message_41500509: can take the initiative and ask me to hang out
texts.Message_41500511: Let's meet up by the Outer Ring highway
texts.Message_41500515: the riverside trail near Lumina Square?
texts.Option02_41500516: I feel like getting some fresh air.
texts.Message_41500518: I'll give those little boars the day off today, for your sake
texts.Message_41500519: When do you wanna take a riverside stroll?
texts.Message_41500521: Is there something you wanna celebrate?
texts.Option01_41500522: Nah, I just wanna meet up with you, Lucy.
texts.Option02_41500522: Every single day is a miracle worth celebrating!
texts.Message_41500523: ...Proxy, you're not allowed to talk like that again
texts.Message_41500524: Is there anywhere you want to go in particular?

texts.Message_41500603: I've been cleaning up after some of Caesar's latest messes
texts.Message_41500604: Why do I have to do this kind of stuff?!
texts.Option01_41500605: Come hang out, and you'll feel better.
texts.Option02_41500605: Let's go for a walk together and relax.
texts.Message_41500606: You're a big help. I'll let that boar clean up her own mess this time
texts.Message_41500708: You want to take me out for a massage...
texts.Message_41500709: At Old Duyi's Physiotherapy Studio in Lumina Square, right?
texts.Message_41500711: Funny you mention it, my shoulders and back have been feeling pretty tight lately
texts.Message_41500712: Guess I've been cracking the whip too much?
texts.Message_41500713: You pick a time to meet up
texts.Message_41500714: I'll do my best to accommodate you
texts.Message_41500717: Asking me out without a plan?
texts.Message_41500718: Am I just someone you hit up to kill time whenever you're bored?
texts.Message_41500719: ...The Proxy I know wouldn't treat me like that
texts.Option01_41500720: I can go with you wherever you want.
texts.Message_41500721: You sure gotta way with words.
texts.Message_41500722: How about coming with me to get my hair done?
texts.Message_41500723: Let's meet at Beaverson Beauty Salon in Lumina Square
texts.Message_41500817: You want me to help you relax?
texts.Message_41500819: I'm not sure I can be of any help... What exactly do you want me to do?
texts.Option01_41500820: I just wanna hang out with you.
texts.Option02_41500820: I just wanna have a walk around with you.
texts.Message_41500821: Is there anywhere you want to go?

texts.Message_41500903: You were the one who wanted to hang out, but you never showed up
texts.Message_41500905: I get it, but... I was really looking forward to it
texts.Message_41500906: So, how are you gonna make it up to me?
texts.Message_41500907: ...Fine, I'll forgive you this one last time

texts.Message_41501001: You didn't show up at the riverside trail yesterday
texts.Message_41501003: You left me hanging there like an idiot
texts.Option01_41501004: I'm sorry... It won't happen again
texts.Option02_41501004: I promise I won't stand you up next time.
texts.Message_41501005: Is there gonna be a next time?
texts.Message_41501006: There isn't going to be any next time
texts.Message_41501007: Don't even think about asking me out again!
texts.Message_41501008: ...Unless I'm in a really good mood

texts.Message_41501101: We were supposed to meet up at Lumina Square yesterday...
texts.Message_41501102: I waited there, but you never showed up
texts.Option02_41501103: Something urgent came up last minute.
texts.Message_41501104: I'll give you this one chance. You dare pull that again and I'll never forgive you
texts.Message_41501105: If anyone else said that, I wouldn't believe them
texts.Message_41501106: Well then... Let's plan something next time you're free

texts.Message_41501202: So I went to get my hair done on my own
texts.Option01_41501203: I wanna see your new do, Lucy!
texts.Option02_41501203: I promise I won't stand you up next time.
texts.Message_41501204: You stood me up and you still talk like that?
texts.Message_41501205: I've got to hand it to you, you've got some nerves
texts.Message_41501207: I'll give you one more chance to ask me out

texts.Message_41600101: I have a question for you
texts.Option02_41600104: They're the foundation of New Eridu!
texts.Message_41600106: I'd expect nothing less from the best Proxy in New Eridu
texts.Message_41600107: Don't tell me you've never experienced what it's like to be short on Dennies?
texts.Message_41600110: Good thing I didn't meet you when I was at my most desperate for Dennies
texts.Message_41600112: Great, you're still within the realm of normal humanity
texts.Message_41600114: I just earned a fortune today.
texts.Message_41600115: Though I spent a lot too
texts.Message_41600117: But Dennies are meant to circulate, right?
texts.Message_41600118: Shame I can't send cash on here
texts.Message_41600120: Let the Dennies flow between us!

texts.Message_41600205: That's what Lucy and the others said
texts.Message_41600206: Burnice said I should use this soybean as my profile picture
texts.Message_41600208: I think this smile looks a little sly
texts.Message_41600209: I don't give off that vibe, do I?
texts.Message_41600217: I knew you were a good person!
texts.Message_41600219: Forward this immediately to the main group.

texts.Message_41600301: Proxy, I want to borrow a videotape from you
texts.Message_41600303: All I remember is that it was about a scientist who predicted the Hollow disaster ahead of time and tried to warn people, but nobody believed him
texts.Message_41600304: It was a pretty abstract name, "Nobility" or something...
texts.Message_41600306: That should be it. Sorry, I'm not very good at remembering names
texts.OptionLong01_41600308: Don't worry, I've already found the Nihility videotape
texts.OptionLong02_41600308: Sounds like a philosophical question... Don't worry, I've already found the Nihility videotape
texts.Message_41600309: That's good. You're always so reliable
texts.Message_41600310: I just so happen to be in town, your shop is on Sixth Street, right?
texts.Message_41600311: I'll come and pick it up when I have some time
texts.Message_41600312: Ah... I remember now, it was Nihility. I'm not very good at remembering names

texts.Message_41600408: But it's fine, I settled it in one punch

texts.Message_41600413: I was just thinking of going to see Yeh Yeh

texts.Message_41600416: It looks kind of funny, so I just call it "Yeh Yeh"
texts.Message_41600417: Let's meet under the cactus in Blazewood
texts.Message_41600419: Not exactly, "Yeh Yeh" is the cactus in Blazewood that looks like it's making a peace sign
texts.Message_41600421: But I'm not very familiar with the area
texts.Message_41600422: Can you send me the coordinates for the exact location of the vacant lot on the corner?

texts.Message_41600430: I'll leave it to you, then

texts.Message_41600444: But I should be free now
texts.Message_41600448: I'll let you know next time

texts.Option01_41600518: Seeing as I haven't seen it...

texts.Message_41600543: You had my heart was racing for a second there
texts.Message_41600544: Let me guess, you want to meet up?
texts.Message_41600546: When have I ever said no?
texts.Message_41600547: Go on, where do you wanna go then?
texts.Message_41600548: Oh, then I'll transfer you 100, I don't need the change
texts.Message_41600549: Looks like your account wasn't hacked

texts.Message_41600604: They said I got stood up, and was crying behind my sunglasses
texts.Option02_41600605: I got lost on my way over
texts.Message_41600606: It's okay, I was just worried something happened to you
texts.Message_41600607: It's cool if you forgot. Happens to me all the time
texts.Message_41600608: Let's meet up some other time

texts.Message_41600611: Next time I'll come meet you

texts.Option01_41600706: I'm the one who crossed into another dimension
texts.Message_41600707: Haha, so that's what it was
texts.Message_41600708: Let's meet some other time, just avoid any other dimensions!
texts.Message_41600710: We'll just meet up another time

texts.Message_41600802: I waited ages, but you didn't come to save me
texts.Message_41600806: If I hadn't been stood up, I would have believed it.
texts.Message_41600808: Let's hang out again some other time
texts.Message_41600811: Let's hang out some other time

texts.Message_41600912: Let's arrange to meet some other time, just don't forget

texts.OptionLong01_42000109: Go to sleep. It's good for your health

texts.Message_42000209: Alright, I did it on purpose

texts.Message_42000211: So I pretended to send them by mistake
texts.Message_42000214: Alright, I did send it by mistake

texts.Message_42000218: Have you forgotten I'm an archer?
texts.Message_42000219: How could these hands press the wrong button!

texts.Message_42000301: A long, long time ago, there was a man...
texts.Message_42000302: Every day he woke up feeling exceptionally tired, but he had no memory of what happened the night before
texts.Message_42000303: He began to suspect that he was ill and had developed a sleepwalking disorder
texts.Message_42000304: So he went to see a bunch of doctors... but they all thought he was healthy
texts.Message_42000305: Until one day, he woke up in the middle of the night and found that he was not lying in his warm bed! Instead, he was in a strange Hollow
texts.Message_42000306: What's even more frightening is that his body turned into an Ethereal...
texts.OptionLong01_42000307: What happened then? Don't leave the story hanging like that!
texts.OptionLong02_42000307: I know the ending! The truth is...
texts.Message_42000308: I want to know what happens next too
texts.Message_42000309: I actually just want you to help me find a movie
texts.Message_42000311: Being the best video store manager in all of New Eridu, I'm sure you can handle it, right?
texts.Message_42000314: I'll go get it from you when I'm done with my vacation
texts.Message_42000315: No no no! Don't spoil it. I still want to enjoy watching the movie!

texts.Message_42000414: Then let's meet at Lumina Square!
texts.Message_42000415: Reverb Arena? The drinks there are pretty good!
texts.Message_42000416: I used to go there often for a drink
texts.Message_42000417: Nice! You have a good taste!
texts.Message_42000418: Then let's meet at Reverb Arena!
texts.Message_42000419: I see. You should have said so earlier!

texts.Message_42000423: As long as I'm not working, I feel energetic every day!
texts.Message_42000424: But when it's time to work...

texts.Option01_42001107: How about we go for a walk?
texts.Option02_42001107: Let's get out of the house and do something
texts.Message_42001108: Sure. I was feeling a little bored
texts.Message_42001109: Where do you want to go?
texts.Option01_42001110: How about going to Lumina Galleria?
texts.Option02_42001110: How about going to Port Elpis?
texts.Message_42001111: Lumina Galleria? Sounds good! There's plenty of shops over there
texts.Message_42001112: But there's quite a lot of people there too
texts.Message_42001113: I hope we don't run into any fans. That'd be a hassle
texts.Message_42001114: But it should be fine. Let's do it
texts.Message_42001116: It really is a nice place
texts.Message_42001117: It's perfect for enjoying the scenery and daydreaming
texts.Message_42001119: Alright, let's meet at Port Elpis then
texts.Message_42001120: Yeah, I want to see you too
texts.Message_42001123: Are you playing "truth or dare" or something?
texts.Message_42001126: But I really do want to see you
texts.Message_42001127: Let me guess. You want to go out and do something?
texts.Message_42001129: Of course, you can rely on me
texts.Message_42001130: Where do you feel like going?

texts.Message_42200102: Can you tell me if it's funny or not?
texts.Message_42200104: The secret to why fries and ketchup are so delicious together? It's betrayal between family members!
texts.Message_42200107: Because they're both from the nightshade family
texts.Message_42200108: The casual act of dipping fries in ketchup is in sharp contrast to the twisted notion of close relatives turning on each other
texts.Message_42200109: So it should make people laugh
texts.Message_42200111: A joke that needs explaining is a failed joke. I understand
texts.Message_42200112: Nobody ever laughs when I tell this joke
texts.Message_42200113: I guess I'm just not very good at telling jokes
texts.Message_42200114: But I really like this joke, so I wanted to share it with you
texts.Message_42200118: Personally, I don't think the joke's level of humor justifies such enthusiasm

texts.Message_42200201: Do you like red bean buns?
texts.Message_42200202: I think red bean buns are the perfect food — easy to carry and delicious
texts.Message_42200203: They're softer and easier to swallow than hard tack, and unlike canned food, there's no packaging left behind
texts.Message_42200204: I used to eat them a lot
texts.Option01_42200205: Are they easy to carry around?
texts.Message_42200206: With no liquid or sauce, I can just stash one in my chest pocket and go when rushing to work
texts.Message_42200207: The only downside is that the red bean bun will get flattened, so it doesn't look so good
texts.Message_42200208: It's unfortunate, but a flattened red bean bun isn't suitable for sharing with others
texts.Message_42200209: Who'd want to eat such an ugly red bean bun, right?
texts.Message_42200210: The protein in burgers does seem to be higher
texts.Message_42200211: Looks like you take care to consume a lot of protein
texts.Message_42200212: That's good to hear... I was a little concerned, though it might be forward of me, that you weren't eating well

texts.Message_42200302: I want to rent a videotape
texts.Option02_42200303: Was there something specific you want to watch?
texts.Message_42200305: Perhaps if I come to the store I'll see something I like
texts.Message_42200307: I'll come take a look then

texts.Option01_42200401: I'm in desperate need of some relaxation...
texts.Message_42200404: Is there some way I can help you relax?
texts.Message_42200406: So where do you want to meet?
texts.Option01_42200407: How about we go get a coffee?
texts.Option02_42200407: How about we watch a movie?
texts.Message_42200408: If we're going to meet at a cafe...
texts.Message_42200409: Can we go to the one on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_42200410: We often stop by the cafe at Lumina Square for coffee when we have to do fieldwork
texts.Message_42200411: I always feel like the coffee tastes faintly of work
texts.Message_42200414: The cinema at Lumina Square is currently rescreening a movie I've been wanting to watch...
texts.Message_42200415: Would you come watch it with me?
texts.Message_42200416: When would be a good time for you?

texts.Option01_42200503: I propose we talk about how to enjoy some downtime?
texts.Option02_42200503: About when we should meet next
texts.Message_42200505: That's definitely worth discussing, thank you for your proposal
texts.Message_42200506: Is there somewhere you'd like to go?
texts.Message_42200508: At the entrance of the shopping mall at Lumina Square?
texts.Message_42200509: Whenever I walk by, I always spot lots of couples waiting there
texts.Message_42200514: What I meant was, it's a common place for meetups...
texts.Message_42200515: Anyway... what time should we meet?
texts.Message_42200517: ...The place I want to go isn't very interesting
texts.Option02_42200519: I want to listen to you
texts.Message_42200521: Let's meet at the pharmacy by the metro exit at Lumina Square

texts.Message_42200602: Did you get the time wrong?
texts.Message_42200606: Well, let's meet another time then

texts.Message_42200701: We agreed to meet at the cinema yesterday
texts.Message_42200703: I don't think I got the time wrong
texts.Option02_42200704: I promise I won't stand you up next time
texts.Message_42200705: Try not to dwell on it too much
texts.Message_42200706: I hadn't been waiting too long
texts.Message_42200707: when I got called away by work...
texts.Message_42200708: Let's schedule a more convenient time next time

texts.Message_42200801: We arranged to meet at Lumina Square yesterday
texts.Message_42200805: Next time, please choose a time that's more convenient for you, and I'll make sure to be there

texts.Message_42200904: I see. Well, so long as you're okay
texts.Message_42200905: Let's plan something another time when it's more convenient

texts.Message_42800101: Hey, Proxy! Just wanna ask: Does your car run on new energy or good old gas?
texts.Option02_42800102: New energy, if you mean Ether
texts.Message_42800104: Young folks these days dig the new stuff...
texts.Option01_42800105: New energy cars are quite pleasant to drive
texts.Option02_42800105: I've gotta do my bit for the environment
texts.Message_42800106: Alright alright, you city folks are always so particular...
texts.Message_42800107: A couple of days ago, I tried driving an Ether vehicle, and the handling felt quite different...
texts.Message_42800108: Anyway, Steeltusk is still this lady's go-to...
texts.Message_42800109: With high-quality fuel, the driver's cabin even has this sweet smell
texts.Message_42800110: Heh... that smell really lifts my spirits

texts.Message_42800201: I think I messed up again
texts.Message_42800206: Hmm? Has Lucy come to complain about anything to you...?
texts.Option01_42800207: I don't need her to come complaining to figure that out...
texts.Message_42800208: Sigh, city girls get fired up real quick
texts.Message_42800209: Cooling them down is a whole other challenge... She really gives lil ol' me a hard time...
texts.Message_42800210: Alright, can't rely on you every time...

texts.Option01_42800301: When are you planning a vacation, Piper?
texts.Message_42800303: If I don't have any goods to run, I've got plenty of time to spare...
texts.Option01_42800305: If you're free, how about we hang out?
texts.Option02_42800305: I want to go out. Want to join me, Piper?
texts.Message_42800306: Go out... You youngsters are always full of energy
texts.Option01_42800308: How about a massage to unwind?
texts.OptionLong01_42800308: How about a massage to unwind? I know a great spot at Lumina Square
texts.Option02_42800308: I'd like to watch a movie
texts.OptionLong02_42800308: I'd like to watch a movie at Lumina Square. How's that sound?
texts.Message_42800310: Everything in the city feels so soft and squishy...
texts.Message_42800311: Driving all day leaves my muscles pretty rock-solid...
texts.Option02_42800312: That robot's hands are even more rock-solid...
texts.OptionLong02_42800312: That robot's hands are even more rock-solid... I mean, the shopkeeper's skills are rock-solid!
texts.Message_42800313: Since you put it like that... Okay~
texts.Message_42800315: Why bother spending the money? You run a video store, don't you?
texts.Message_42800316: Why don't you just grab a videotape and hit play?
texts.Message_42800317: Or... do video store managers have to keep up with all the new releases?
texts.Option01_42800318: Yeah, it's all part of the job
texts.Option02_42800318: Not really. I just love watching movies
texts.Message_42800319: I see... I'll keep you company then
texts.Message_42800321: This weather is perfect for taking a nap...
texts.Message_42800322: Just saying the word makes me drowsy...
texts.Message_42800323: Well, I'm off to catch some Z's...

texts.Message_42800403: Like... hitting the jackpot with a scratch card?
texts.Message_42800404: Or is your video store booming today... or your Proxy business is on the up?
texts.OptionLong01_42800405: Neither. It's just I had this dream where I was someone else... I can't recall the details, but it left me feeling happy
texts.OptionLong02_42800405: ...You're on fire, Piper!! You guessed it all! Luck's been on my side since I woke up, everything's going smoothly
texts.Message_42800406: Wish I could borrow some of that luck...
texts.Message_42800407: Already tried my luck with a scratch card... Maybe I'll grab a drink and see if I'll win "Another Bottle"
texts.Message_42800410: Where do you feel like going?
texts.Option01_42800411: Have you been to the coffee shop on Sixth Street?
texts.Option02_42800411: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_42800412: The one with a Panda at the entrance?
texts.Message_42800413: I remember passing by it once...
texts.Option01_42800414: I'll treat you to a coffee
texts.Option02_42800414: Tin Master is a pro at making coffee
texts.Message_42800415: Well... I guess we can meet up
texts.Message_42800418: You've got racetracks in the city, right? I'm feeling lucky today...
texts.Option01_42800419: ...If Lucy catches wind of this, I'm toast
texts.Option02_42800419: ...If {F#Wise}{M#Belle} finds out, I'll be in deep trouble
texts.Message_42800421: Alright... There's an arcade in Lumina Square, isn't there?
texts.Message_42800424: What's up? Having a rough day?
texts.Message_42800425: Hey, come on... Don't sweat it...
texts.Message_42800426: A lot of stuff seems trivial in hindsight... No need to stress over things that don't matter
texts.Option01_42800427: How do you stay so chill all the time, Piper?
texts.Option02_42800427: How come you never get anxious, Piper?
texts.Message_42800428: I've been through my fair share...
texts.Message_42800429: Life's short... Stay positive, and you can weather anything
texts.Message_42800430: Do what makes you happy... Wisdom from someone who's seen some stuff
texts.Option01_42800431: Then... Do you want to hang out Piper?
texts.Option02_42800431: So... do you wanna go have some fun, Piper?

texts.Message_42800501: Little Proxy, were ya busy and forgot about yesterday?
texts.Message_42800503: I can't believe a young'un like you forgets more than me
texts.Message_42800504: Lucky for you, I'm not your customer
texts.Message_42800505: Little things like this don't really matter, just try not to forget the important things

texts.Option01_42800602: ! I totally forgot about the movie...
texts.Option02_42800602: I got the movie time wrong...
texts.Message_42800603: Had I known, I would have given you another reminder yesterday
texts.Message_42800604: But the seats in the cinema were so comfortable, so no worries

texts.Message_42800701: Hey, Proxy? Did you stand me up because you didn't want to treat me?
texts.Option01_42800702: No, not at all... Sorry... I got the time mixed up...
texts.Option02_42800702: Sorry... I'll double-treat you next time...
texts.Message_42800703: Luckily I had nothing urgent going on
texts.Message_42800704: I checked out the coffee menu... but couldn't make heads or tails of it
texts.Message_42800705: Next time, you can pick a coffee for me

texts.Message_42800801: Why didn't you tell me there are no racing games in the arcade?
texts.Message_42800802: Plus, you didn't even show up
texts.Option01_42800803: Sorry, I got caught up with something...
texts.Option02_42800803: Sorry... I should have told you, Piper...
texts.Message_42800804: Ahhh, young folks can be forgetful these days...
texts.Message_42800805: Well, if you spot an arcade with racing games, give me a shout

texts.Message_42800901: Proxy, do you have the video collection of recent job recruitment ads?
texts.Message_42800902: I think that videotape is called... We Need You?
texts.Message_42800903: I've not very busy lately, so I'm looking for a fun part-time job
texts.Option01_42800904: Oh, the compilation of recruitment programs, right? I'll go look for it
texts.Option02_42800904: I'll keep an eye out for you

texts.Message_42801001: Steeltusk's getting fixed up, so I'm lounging around Sixth Street...
texts.Message_42801002: Those Sixth Street benches are uncomfortable for someone of my advanced years
texts.Message_42801003: Mind if I crash on your couch for a bit?
texts.Message_42801005: See you at the store soon then

texts.Message_100700101: Helo, Proxy, I got yer contact info from Lucy.
texts.Message_100700103: Ive been meening to get yer contact info befor, but my fone broked — it's not like I forgot about you two!
texts.Option02_100700104: Yeah... Your old phone was ancient...
texts.Message_100700105: I swear, I jus got a new fone today, no lies here!
texts.Message_100700106: Anyways, now I can talk to ya more eazily, tho I'm not that good at readin and writin, so expect some typos.
texts.Option01_100700107: No worries, I can understand you just fine!
texts.Option02_100700107: I can help you with that if you want.
texts.Message_100700110: Even tho I'm a bit sad to say gooby to my old fone...

texts.Message_100700201: Proxy, you still awake? Don't forget to lock yer doors and windos tonite.
texts.Option01_100700202: What?! Is there a thief around?
texts.Message_100700204: We were out for a nite ride, saw a big ol' storm clowd rollin' in from far away. Gonna rain hard tonite, for sure.
texts.OptionLong01_100700205: Thanks for the heads up. We always close everything in this house anyway. Will y'all be okay?
texts.OptionLong02_100700205: Caesar, aren't you worried yourself? Are your motocycles gonna be alright?
texts.Message_100700206: Nah, we'll be fine. Jus' gotta make sure not to park them where there might be a landslide.
texts.Message_100700207: Honestly, the sound of rain on the bikes puts me rite to sleep. I kinda like it.
texts.Option01_100700208: Rain sounds are classic white noise.
texts.Option02_100700208: Rainy nights are perfect for sleeping.
texts.Message_100700209: Wow, ya sure know a lot, Proxy. I learned sumthin new today!
texts.Message_100700210: When it rains hard like this, folks in the Outer Ring hurry to catch rainwatter cause the water trucks don't come every day. We even got a fillter on our bikes.
texts.Message_100700211: Anyway, I'm off to help collect sum watter. Sweet dreams!

texts.Message_100700301: Proxy, guess what? Someone sent me a bokay today!
texts.Message_100700303: Don't you have this tradishun in the city? The bride closes her eyes and throws the bokay to the guests, and whoever catches it will receive good luck.
texts.OptionLong01_100700304: {M#Oh yeah, I remember now. I think it means love is coming your way.}{F#Ohh, I heard about that! And the good luck is falling in love!}
texts.Option02_100700304: The details are a bit different.
texts.OptionLong02_100700304: {M#I think the details are a little different. In the city, it's said to bring you true love.}{F#I think the details are a bit different. In the city, it's supposed to help you find true love, not just bring general good fortune!}
texts.Message_100700305: Hey hey hey, wha true love?
texts.Message_100700306: Uh, um, well, I think um isn't it a bit early to discuss this? Yeah, definitely too early!
texts.Message_100700308: Wait, what do you mean by sending this emogi right now?!
texts.Message_100700310: Ah, you're doing this on purpose, aren't you? Just trying to make me look silly!
texts.OptionLong01_100700311: Sorry, sorry — kidding! Just take it like an Outer Ring person would.
texts.Option02_100700311: You can save up all your luck for love!
texts.OptionLong02_100700311: Luck in love is also a kind of luck. If you can't use it now, keep it for later!
texts.Message_100700312: Um, anyway that's uh what I meant. I just wanted to share my luck with you!
texts.Message_100700313: Okay, enough about this. Good night!

texts.Option02_100700401: Caesar, have you come into the city these days?
texts.Option02_100700404: Something has to have gone wrong for me to text you?
texts.Message_100700405: Cool! Sure! A little strool around New Eridu sounds nice.
texts.Option01_100700407: Let's go play some games then!
texts.Option02_100700407: Is there anything you want to do?
texts.Message_100700409: Proxy, I remember there's an arkade near your place, so I'll meet you there first. We can decide what to play when we meet!
texts.Message_100700410: Just let me know when you've decided on the time.
texts.Message_100700413: If you ask me, it's been a long time since I became the acting Overlord. I'd love to find an worthy oponent for a good fight.
texts.Option01_100700414: I'll find you a good place for it!
texts.Message_100700415: For real? There's a place like that?
texts.Option01_100700416: See you at Lumina Square, and you'll see when you get there~
texts.Message_100700417: Alright, since you say so, how could I refuse?
texts.Message_100700418: Let's meet up at Lumina Square. I'll let you decide the time!
texts.Message_100700419: Haha no way! I couldn't be happier.
texts.Message_100700420: It's rare that everyones fre. Want to find a place to hang out in New Eridu? hang out in New Eridu?
texts.Message_100700421: Wow, you skared me! I was just thinking about coming to the city soon, and then I got your mesage!
texts.Option02_100700422: Are you here to hang out with friends?
texts.Message_100700424: I just closed a businis deal recently, so I'm taking a few days off.

texts.Option02_100700501: I heard you're in Blazewood right now?
texts.Message_100700502: What's up? Nothing going on these days?
texts.Option01_100700503: Even a Proxy wants to slack off sometimes.
texts.Option02_100700503: Just nothing exciting at the moment.
texts.Message_100700504: Gotcha. Wanna come out and chill? I'm in Blazewood with everyone for a few days.
texts.Message_100700506: There's a market during the day, and I heard there's gonna be a metier shower tonight! You should be able to see it purfectly here. Wanna come?
texts.Option02_100700507: I'm all about that meteor shower!
texts.Message_100700508: No problem, let's go to the market together! Just let me know when you're coming, and I'll be waiting!
texts.Message_100700510: No worries, I'll wait for you here tonight! Don't be late!
texts.Message_100700511: Yep, I'll be here for a few days. What's up?
texts.Message_100700513: Sure thing! I was actually thinking of inviting you over!

texts.Message_100700601: Are you okay, Proxy? You never showed up.
texts.Message_100700603: Oh, come on, we're friends. It's totlly fine!
texts.Message_100700604: Did you manage to sort out that urgent thing yesterday?
texts.Option02_100700605: Thanks to you, everything went smoothly.
texts.Message_100700606: Glad to hear it. If you ever need help, just let me know. Don try to handle it all by yourself.
texts.Message_100700607: Let's plan something for another time!
texts.Message_100700608: You had me worried there for a sec. I thought something happened to you.
texts.Message_100700609: As long as youre okay. But if your not feeling well or too tired, dont push yourself, okay?
texts.Message_100700610: Let's plan something for another time!

texts.Message_100700701: Hey Proxy, you alright? I waited for you at Lumina Square yesterday, but you never showed.
texts.Option01_100700702: Ahhh! I got the meeting place all wrong!
texts.OptionLong01_100700702: Ahhh! I got the meeting place all wrong! Caesar, I'm soooo sorry!!
texts.OptionLong02_100700702: Oh shoot... I forgot... I'm really sorry, Caesar!
texts.Message_100700703: So you mixed up the meeting place?
texts.Message_100700704: I waited and thought maybe I got the place wrong.
texts.Message_100700705: Didn't expect you to be so forgetful. Thats not the impresion I had of you.
texts.Message_100700706: Let's doble-check the spot next time before we head out! We can hang out again soon!
texts.Message_100700707: What? You forgot? Seriously? I waited for so long!
texts.Message_100700709: Haha, I was just messing with you. I figured something urgent mustve come up.
texts.Message_100700710: Apoloji accepted! I ended up shopping and doing a bunch of stuff, so no biggie.
texts.Message_100700711: Let's catch up next time~ You promised to take me to that place where we can fight as much as we want!

texts.Message_100700801: Proxy, you okay? You never showed up at Blazewood. Did something happen?
texts.Option02_100700802: I'm sorry... There's a problem with the car...
texts.Message_100700803: I see. I was kinda worried. Glad you're okay
texts.Message_100700804: Too bad you couldn't make it. The market was packed yesterday. I wanted to show you some cool stuff.
texts.Message_100700805: So that's what happened! What a shame...
texts.Message_100700806: The market was packed yesterday. I wanted to show you some cool stuff.
texts.Option02_100700807: Ugh, I wish I could've gone...
texts.Message_100700808: Don't worry, I'll drag you here next time there's a market in Blazewood!

texts.Message_100700901: Proxy, why didn't you come yesterday? Don't tell me you forgot about the meteor shower!
texts.Option02_100700902: Sorry, I was super tired last night.
texts.OptionLong02_100700902: Sorry, I was super tired last night. I thought I'd take a quick nap before meeting you, but I overslept...
texts.Message_100700903: I see. That's cool, all good! I mean, you're a Proxy, so I guess it can't be helped.
texts.Message_100700904: But dont overdo it. Take care of yourself.
texts.Message_100700905: Last night's meteor shower was so beautiful. I really wish you could've seen it.
texts.Message_100700906: There'll be another chance. I'll ask you again next time!
texts.Message_100700907: Haha, no worries. Everyone messes up sometimes.

texts.Message_100701001: Proxy, you there? I need a little help with something.
texts.Message_100701002: After thinking it over, I realized I need an expert's opinion.
texts.Option02_100701003: What can I do for you, Overlord?
texts.Message_100701004: No, no, not in a Hollow.
texts.Message_100701005: Besides, going to a Hollow wouldn't only require "a little help."
texts.Message_100701006: Actually, I was going to ask you something about movies. There's the one I want to watch but I haven't been able to find it because I don't know what it's called.
texts.Message_100701008: It looks like it's a kinda old drama film, but there're also all these fantasee elements too.
texts.Message_100701009: The storey goes like this: a girl's fiansay dies in a plane crash, and later she discovers she can go back in time to the morning of the axident.
texts.Message_100701010: But she tries many times without success to save her fiansay, and each time she travels back she gets closer and closer to the time of the accident.
texts.OptionLong01_100701011: I remember that movie. I was on the edge of my seat the whole time...
texts.Option02_100701011: How come you don't remember the title?
texts.OptionLong02_100701011: You remember the story so well, but not the title?
texts.Message_100701013: t's a reel shame I've only watced a corruppted tape of it that cuts out befor the end, and I don't even know the name of the moovie.
texts.Option01_100701014: Got it. Leave it to me.
texts.Message_100701016: Oh, the tape was found in a scraped car in a Hollow, and the cover's completely damaged.
texts.Message_100701017: And when we watched it at the drivein, we realized that the start and end were completely fried.
texts.Message_100701019: Hey, stop making fun of me.

texts.Message_100701101: Proxy, do you still remember the movie I told you about last time?
texts.OptionLong01_100701102: Don't worry. I won't forget. That movie's called "Last Flight."
texts.OptionLong02_100701102: I found it! The movie you're looking for is "Last Flight."
texts.Message_100701103: So that's the name? It actally fits the story pretty well.
texts.Message_100701104: Awesome, thanks to you, I can finally see how the story ends!
texts.Option01_100701105: I'll bring it to you next time?
texts.OptionLong01_100701105: How about I leave the tape in Blazewood when I visit next?
texts.Option02_100701105: Want to watch it at our store?
texts.OptionLong02_100701105: Want to watch it at our store? I'll be at home and I've stocked up on snacks.
texts.Message_100701106: I could swing by your place to pick it up. I'm in the city today helping Big Daddy with something. I'll be done soon.
texts.Option01_100701107: Want to watch it at our store?
texts.Message_100701109: Sure, I'm actually in the city today helping Big Daddy with something, so see you later!

texts.Message_101000103: You're a Rookie Proxy, aren't you?
texts.Message_101000104: Are you interested in a combat commission?
texts.Message_101000105: They are commissions where you don't have to explore the area yourself! Perfect for rookies!
texts.Message_101000106: Take a look at this one!
texts.Message_101000108: If you don't like it, maybe this one will do!
texts.Message_101000110: It's also suitable for those who are just starting out in the business!
texts.Option02_101000112: Send an attachment again, and you'll get blocked.
texts.Message_101000113: Σ(°△°|||) It's not spam — how could it be!? These are all genuine commission requests!
texts.Message_101000114: As an intelligence broker, I carefully select commissions suitable for novice Proxies. Take a look and decide for yourself. How about that?
texts.Message_101000115: Σ(°△°|||)︴Rookie, you're so intimidating... But sending commission info through attachments is a common method used by intelligence brokers!
texts.Message_101000116: You may not be familiar since you only just registered. You'll get used to it. If you have other questions, you can ask me. I can be like your big sis!
texts.Option01_101000117: ...Sis? Aren't you a bit too forward?
texts.Option02_101000117: ...I'm not... Never mind, I'll take a look.
texts.Message_101000118: Everyone says that, but I don't think it's a flaw! Shouldn't we be nice to newcomers?
texts.Message_101000119: Good, you're willing to learn! Then I'll send you some more!
texts.Message_101000120: So, remember to check the combat commission info I sent you. If you do well, I'll come looking for you again!

texts.Message_101000201:
Inter-Knot Selection, proxies' connections!
Featured: Rally Commission: Metro Terminal!
Tired of fighting alone in the Hollow? Want to play to your strengths? Looking to avoid Ethereals and focus on exploration? Or "Just tell me where at, and I'll fight all the way to the old construction site!" If you seek to fully utilize your abilities, our Rally Commission is the perfect choice for you!
Check out more in our Inter-Knot Rally Commission section.
Inter-Knot Recommendation, your daily inspiration!

texts.Message_101700101: I think I discovered a secret.
texts.Message_101700102: Lighter claims to be 188 cm tall.
texts.Message_101700103: But Big Daddy is also 188 cm.
texts.Option01_101700106: Big Daddy wears special insoles that make him look taller?
texts.Message_101700107: ...Don't let Caesar catch you saying that.
texts.Message_101700108: She'd flatten you like a pancake.
texts.Message_101700109: Big Daddy would never be so vain.
texts.Message_101700110: Anyway, it's probably just Lighter exaggerating his height a bit.
texts.Message_101700111: That kind of thing's really important for dudes like him.
texts.Message_101700112: Lighter's always been cool and mysterious, never letting anyone get too close.
texts.Message_101700113: If I go over there and whisper to him...
texts.Message_101700117: Don't tell me you've got a thing against Lighter?
texts.Message_101700118: Lighter's over a head taller than me, so he's gotta be at least 180 cm.

texts.Message_101700202: But she always talks down to me like I'm some kid.
texts.Message_101700206: I'm a young woman with my own stuff going on!
texts.Message_101700207: Last time, Piper gave me a lighter.
texts.Message_101700208: It's got these pretty designs on it, so I treasured it and kept it safe.
texts.Message_101700209: I never let Caesar touch it, cos I was afraid she'd break it.
texts.Message_101700210: Then Caesar told me that the design was from the lottery retailer, and they gave them out for free to regulars.
texts.Message_101700211: And I realized Piper just picked it up while buying lottery tickets...
texts.Message_101700213: Right! She's the size of a child.
texts.Message_101700214: Then it hit me — I'm the one who's being treated like a kid.

texts.Option01_101700301: Where have you been these days?
texts.Option02_101700301: Have you been busy at work?
texts.Message_101700302: Still stuck in the Outer Ring.
texts.Message_101700303: I wanna get into the city... I really wanna get into the city...
texts.Option01_101700304: Wanna meet up in the city?
texts.Message_101700305: I was waiting for you to say that. Where should we go?
texts.Message_101700307: I was just thinking I need to check out the latest car detailing products.
texts.Message_101700308: This kid walked past our base the other day and said,
texts.Message_101700311: Let's go together... I wanna pick up some stuff and deck out the bikes.
texts.Message_101700314: What were you just talking about?
texts.Message_101700316: Correct! As a reward, you can come with me!
texts.Message_101700318: Work can always wait til tomorrow. The Sons of Calydon's not some sweatshop.

texts.Message_101700405: Don't scare me! I—I'm not scared!
texts.Option01_101700406: Haha all good, I just wanted to hang out.
texts.Option02_101700406: No, I just wanted to ask you to hang out.
texts.Message_101700407: I love going out! Where where?
texts.Option01_101700408: Then let's meet up at Random Play.
texts.Option02_101700408: Let's meet up at the Public Security office.
texts.Message_101700410: Just kidding! I watched some teen rom-coms and always wanted to try that line on someone.
texts.Message_101700411: I'll bring four bottles of Nitro-Fuel. Is that enough?
texts.Message_101700412: If you need more snacks, just DM me.
texts.Message_101700414: A Proxy visiting a PubSec office is like a french fry jumping into the fryer... Or a mouse going to visit a cat.
texts.Option01_101700415: I just need to do some paperwork there.
texts.Option02_101700415: I've just got something that needs doing.
texts.Message_101700416: I've got some paperwork to do, too.
texts.Message_101700417: Hope we'll both get in and out without any trouble~
texts.Message_101700420: Just tell me if there's anything weird.

texts.Message_101700502: I was on my way to meet you up, but my car broke down halfway there. It took a while to get a tow truck...
texts.Option01_101700504: It's okay. Something came up so I didn't go in the end.
texts.Option02_101700504: You never showed so I just went home.
texts.Message_101700505: Thank goodness... I got really unlucky this time. Let's catch up again next time!
texts.Message_101700506: Sorry, please don't be mad. If you're really upset... how about you get to stand me up next time? Deal?

texts.Message_101700601: I didn't see you at 141 yesterday
texts.Option01_101700603: I went. But I didn't see you there.
texts.Option02_101700603: I was so tired and forgot about it yesterday...
texts.Message_101700604: Rats, I must've gone to the wrong branch!
texts.Message_101700605: I blame 141 for opening too many stores...
texts.Message_101700606: Anyway, we can meet up next time we're both free! For sure~
texts.Message_101700607: It's easy to lose track of things when you're worn out from work!

texts.Message_101700701: I didn't see you at the store yesterday.
texts.Message_101700702: Your {M#sister}{F#brother} said you were out doing something.
texts.Message_101700704: Goodness me... You be extremely careful when handling that!
texts.Message_101700705: We can take a rain check. I mean so long as we're both still alive, there're endless chances to meet up, right?
texts.Message_101700706: You can do it, Proxy! And if you can't, just call me any time!

texts.Message_101700802: I'm really worried about you... Is everything okay?
texts.Option02_101700803: Things have changes and I need some more observations.
texts.Message_101700804: You had me really worried — I thought you got arrested by PubSec for a second there.
texts.Message_101700805: That's cool, so long as you're okay.
texts.Message_101700806: Seeya next time at the N.E.P.S. then!
texts.Message_101700807: ...? When I say it out loud, it sounds really weird...

texts.Message_101700901: I really feel like watching some cute movies.
texts.Message_101700902: But someone said my definition of "cute" could be a little misleading.
texts.Message_101700903: So how do I describe it... The movie I wanna watch...
texts.Message_101700905: Oh yeah, I heard about this movie called "Black Tales."
texts.Message_101700906: With all these cute animals on the poster! I just suddenly had to see it. Have you guys got it?
texts.Option02_101700907: I'll try to find it for you.
texts.Message_101700908: Hit me up when you find it, okay! Thanks!

texts.Option02_101701002: I found the movie you wanted.
texts.Message_101701003: Cry cry. How many Burnices do you know?
texts.Message_101701004: I wanted to ask if you found "Black Tales" yet...
texts.Message_101701008: Hang on, I'm setting off soon.

texts.Message_102000102: I'm almost done with my Bangboo modification research.
texts.Message_102000103: Swing by TURBO sometime, and bring Eous with you.
texts.Message_102000105: I'll explain when you get here. I'll be waiting for outside my store.

texts.Message_102000201:
☆ New Stages Open ☆ Special Rewards Await!
Dive into the latest, thrilling stages of "Hollow Rider," the most popular VR training program in the HIA Career Club!
Brace yourself for more challenging trials and double-danger high-risk* encounters! Epic rewards are yours to claim!
Are you the legendary Hollow Vanguard everyone in New Eridu has been waiting?

* The VR training program is virtually simulated. The HIA guarantees complete safety for all participants. All rights reserved.

texts.Message_102000302: Stop anything you're doing, I have a big job for you.
texts.Message_102000303: But this one... Well, it's a bit risky. I fully understand if you don't want to accept it.
texts.Option02_102000304: Anything is negotiable as long as the pay's good enough.
texts.Message_102000305: Haha, I knew I could count on you.
texts.Message_102000306: Have you heard about Shiyu Defense?
texts.Option01_102000307: Shiyu? Is it related to Hollow Zero?
texts.Option02_102000307: Defense? Is it related to the Defense Force?
texts.Message_102000308: Exactly, Shiyu Defense is a new operation initiated by the Defense Force in Hollow Zero.
texts.Message_102000309: I'm sure you're aware the Defense Force regularly explores and clears out deadly Ethereals within Hollow Zero to slow down its expansion.
texts.Option01_102000310: Yeah, but I thought that was an internal operation?
texts.Option02_102000310: So they're looking to outsource some of the work?
texts.Message_102000311: You've hit the nail on the head...
texts.Message_102000312: They've secretly contacted a group of intelligence brokers and independent Hollow investigators to handle the operation.
texts.Option01_102000313: Wow? What do the Hollow Investigative Association say about this?
texts.Option02_102000313: Independent Hollow investigators? The Defense Force must have a sense of humor.
texts.Message_102000314: I'm not sure why they chose to go this route, but business is business, I guess. At least the pay seems quite decent.
texts.Message_102000315: But we're talking about dealing with deadly Ethereals... So, what do you say?
texts.Option01_102000316: Seeing as it's Hollow Zero... count me in.
texts.Option02_102000316: As long as they pay well, I'm game.
texts.Message_102000317: Great! As expected from my most trustworthy legendary Proxy!
texts.Message_102000318: I'll take care of the permissions and paperwork, and you can simply access the Hollow through your HDD system.
texts.Message_102000321:
Alright, fine! Let's hope you'll come back in one piece!
Now hurry up and get to your HDD so we can both make some money.

texts.Message_102000401: This must be your Knock Knock account, right, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Independent Investigator?
texts.Message_102000402: Great, now I can contact you directly
texts.Message_102000405: This is Ray from White Star Institute. We worked together at Scott Outpost, remember?
texts.Message_102000406: You forgot about me? Or are you just playing dumb?
texts.Message_102000407: Well, playing dumb won't help, cause I've got a new commission for you.
texts.Option01_102000408: Why do I always have to work overtime?
texts.Option02_102000409: Ugh, here we go again, another headache of a job...
texts.Message_102000410: Hmph, in New Eridu, you can't escape death, Hollows, and work. It's just the way it is.
texts.Message_102000411: With someone as capable as you, I've got to leverage your skills to the fullest.
texts.Message_102000412: Meet me at Scott Outpost when you have time. We need to talk about this in person.

texts.Message_102000501: {M#Mr.}{F#Miss} Independent Investigator, I am Roland, chief of the New Eridu Defense Force stationed at Scott Outpost. I previously worked with your team during the Shiyu Defense.
texts.Option01_102000502: Did Section 6 send reinforcements for that mission?
texts.Option02_102000503: You're the one who blocked the truck!
texts.Message_102000504: Indeed. I trust you already understand the urgency and importance of any Hollow Zero missions.
texts.Message_102000505: Blocking the truck was just a metaphor. But it comforts me to know you still remember the Defense Force mission
texts.Message_102000506: To cut to the chase: Based on the skills you've demonstrated, my team and I have agreed that we can now authorize you to join in another Hollow Zero mission
texts.Message_102000507: A true soldier never passes up a chance to distinguish themselves, and this chance is now yours
texts.Option02_102000509: Can you give me the details?
texts.Message_102000510: That's right, but as far as I know, none of the investigators involved in the Hollow Zero mission are cowards, and no one would pass up the chance to receive special military supplies
texts.Message_102000511: If you want to know more, come see me at Scott Outpost
texts.Message_102000512: Good, this is exactly the response the Defense Force needs. In short, participating in this mission requires a strong team, and the Defense Force will provide special support with supplies
texts.Message_102000513: I'll be waiting for you at Scott Outpost

texts.Message_102500101: Dear citizen XXX! Greetings from your super friendly neighbor and trusted pal, Officer Mewmew!
texts.Message_102500105: Sorry! I forgot to change the greeting template and accidentally sent it out. Purrr
texts.Message_102500106: You'll forgive lovely Mewmew, right, meow?
texts.Message_102500108: Anyway, the Good Neighbor Community celebration at Lumina Square has started!
texts.Message_102500109: And guess who's in charge? Yeah, it's me. Your kind and friendly neighbor, Officer Mewmew!
texts.Message_102500110: I'm sending this message to invite you to join the celebration!
texts.Message_102500111: Feel free to pay me a visit at Lumina Square!

texts.Option02_102500202: ...Ugh, don't ask me such an embarrassing question.
texts.Message_102500204: I've done the math over and over again, and it won't change no matter who does it.
texts.Option01_102500205: What are you doing math for so late?
texts.Option02_102500205: If you want, I can help you out tomorrow. What do you think?
texts.Message_102500206: It's nothing, Proxy. Sorry for bothering you.

texts.Message_102700101: Manager, are there more movies that are pure fiction, or based on real events?
texts.Option01_102700102: I haven't done the research on that yet...
texts.Message_102700103: I used to think everything in the movies was fake
texts.Message_102700104: But somebody once told me, the point is whether you can see the truth in it or not
texts.Message_102700105: If it's based on real events, then as long as I know what the real event is, I can tell by watching
texts.Option01_102700106: Wouldn't you be spoiling it for yourself?
texts.Option01_102700108: Just watch movies and have fun
texts.OptionLong01_102700108: Just watch movies and have fun. Your personal happiness is definitely real
texts.OptionLong02_102700108: A movie's just a movie. Why do you have to get more out of it?
texts.Message_102700110: Actually I think so too, but I feel like it's stupid of me. I never get the deeper meaning behind movies or anything...
texts.Message_102700111: But Manager, you think the same, even as someone who has watched so many movies...
texts.Option01_102700112: What about you, Seth? Do you prefer fiction movies?
texts.Option02_102700112: What about you, Seth? Do you prefer movies based on real events?
texts.Message_102700114: ...If justice is served, I hope it's real. And if evil escapes unpunished, I hope it's fake
texts.Message_102700115: Is it naive of me to think that?
texts.Option02_102700116: Well I hope that could be true, Seth
texts.Message_102700119: Right... But it's also a bit strange to say that all fiction is fake...

texts.Message_102700203: I shouldn't have asked, I should've just filmed it
texts.Message_102700204: I just saw two Bangboo zooming down the street, one chasing the other
texts.Message_102700205: The one getting chased suddenly lay down on the ground, and the one chasing didn't have time to stop so it stepped on it
texts.Message_102700206: And the one getting stepped on used its stretched-out stomach like a drum to boing the other one away, hahaha
texts.Option01_102700207: You should've definitely filmed that, wish I could see that
texts.Option02_102700207: Why did you just watch that happen, Seth
texts.Option02_102700209: Oh yeah, so what were you doing?
texts.Message_102700210: Naturally I was chasing them to prevent them from speeding in the Lumina pedestrian zone
texts.Message_102700211: In the end I managed to pull down the one sent flying from the billboard next door
texts.OptionLong02_102700212: Congratulations on winning first place in the Bangboo race
texts.Message_102700214: It's too bad I didn't film them
texts.Message_102700215: Next time I'll film it first!
texts.Message_102700216: They both stopped in the end, so do I even count as first?

texts.Message_102700303: Alright... Anything I can help you with, Manager?
texts.Message_102700304: Is one of my rentals overdue?
texts.Option01_102700305: I'm not here to remind you about your overdue videotapes
texts.Option02_102700305: There's something else I'd like to ask you, Seth
texts.Message_102700306: Oh, that's good. I thought I might've gotten the return date wrong on a rental or something
texts.Message_102700307: Then what do you need from me, Manager?
texts.Option01_102700308: Come hang out? It's my treat
texts.Option02_102700308: I know you're really busy, Seth, but let me treat you to something
texts.Message_102700310: Where do you feel like going?
texts.Message_102700311: Should be okay if it's near. The breaks around here come in dribs and drabs...
texts.Option01_102700312: Wanna come to Sixth Street for noodles, then?
texts.Option02_102700312: Let's go watch a new release at the cinema
texts.Message_102700313: Does it have to be Sixth Street?
texts.Message_102700314: The noodle shop at Lumina is great too
texts.Option01_102700315: I wanna show you the might of Sixth Street noodles
texts.Option02_102700315: You can return your rentals at the same time
texts.Message_102700319: So you like catching new releases, too!
texts.Message_102700320: You've got all those old classics in the video store, I didn't think you'd keep up with the cinema releases!
texts.Option01_102700321: I love watching those, but getting them in stock is another story entirely
texts.Option02_102700321: Gotta watch them to know how far they've come
texts.Message_102700323: When do you want to go?
texts.Message_102700327: Are you at the store or out and about
texts.Option01_102700329: Why are you typing so fast, Seth
texts.OptionLong01_102700329: Why are you typing so fast, Seth... I'm just watching an old movie so my fingers sent out DMs before I'd finished typing
texts.Option02_102700329: Wait I'm not about to report a crime
texts.OptionLong02_102700329: Hang on, Seth. I'm not about to report a crime... I'm just watching an old movie so my fingers sent out DMs before I'd finished typing
texts.Message_102700332: Don't do that next time. I thought something had happened to you
texts.Option01_102700333: Sorry, sorry. I'll make it up to you in person
texts.OptionLong01_102700333: Sorry, sorry. How about I make it up to you in person... Wanna hang out, Seth?
texts.Option02_102700333: Since nothing's happened, how about we hang out huh, Officer Seth?
texts.OptionLong02_102700333: I'm good! But I wanna invite you to come hang out with me, Officer Seth. All good?

texts.Option01_102700403: Stop working overtime and make some time for us to hang out
texts.Option02_102700403: Stop training so much and make some time for us to hang out
texts.Message_102700405: I'll train first, and then come hang out with you after
texts.Message_102700406: Tell me once you know where we're going
texts.Option01_102700407: Why is it always me deciding?!
texts.Option02_102700407: Alright, I already have something in mind
texts.Option01_102700409: Let's go for a riverside walk!
texts.Option02_102700409: I decided that you should pick where
texts.Message_102700410: A riverside walk? So carefree and breezy...
texts.Message_102700411: But if that's what you like, let's do it
texts.Option01_102700412: Can't you do carefree and breezy, Seth?
texts.Message_102700413: Okay okay, I've already said yes. Quit carrying on...
texts.Message_102700419: I can't think of a time
texts.Message_102700420: Er... How about... I'm going over to Dew Gardening Shop, wanna come?
texts.Message_102700422: I can go pretty much any day this week, it's up to you
texts.Option02_102700424: I didn't take you for that type of person
texts.Message_102700425: Hahahaha so you can get confused too
texts.Option02_102700427: Because I'm lonely so come hang out
texts.Message_102700430: I just dropped my phone on the ground! I'll come out and hang when I say I will... Why do you have to be so mushy about it?
texts.Message_102700431: Well have you figured out where you want to go yet?

texts.Message_102700501: You didn't come eat noodles last night
texts.Message_102700505: I got to chat with the boss a bit — who is great by the way
texts.Message_102700506: And he gave me extra toppings. That's because you introduced me, right?
texts.Option01_102700507: Yup, told you people know me
texts.Option02_102700507: Could be because you're a rare visitor
texts.Message_102700509: Then let's book in again sometime. I think the boss is gonna be happy to see you, too

texts.Message_102700601: Manager, you never came by the cinema yesterday
texts.Option01_102700602: I got the time wrong... What did you end up watching, Seth?
texts.Option02_102700602: Something came up at the last minute... What did you end up watching, Seth?
texts.Message_102700603: I thought about it all day and couldn't make up my mind
texts.Message_102700604: Luckily one of the seniors messaged me
texts.Message_102700605: So I just went back to the precinct
texts.Option01_102700606: Wanna watch something together next time?
texts.Option02_102700606: Can we hang out again later?
texts.Message_102700608: So long as you pick the movie

texts.Message_102700702: I just took a walk beside the river by myself
texts.Message_102700703: You should've come by, the riverside breeze was really nice
texts.Option02_102700704: Wanna do it again next time?
texts.Message_102700705: Actually, it's fine. If you hadn't mentioned it, I wouldn't have thought of taking a walk
texts.Message_102700706: But it's even better if you're there too

texts.Message_102700801: I didn't see you at the gardening store yesterday
texts.Option01_102700802: Things were hectic at the store and I forgot...
texts.Message_102700803: It's cool. I just thought it was a pity
texts.Message_102700804: I wanted to show you the plants at Dew. I really like this gardening store
texts.Option02_102700805: I'll check it out next time!
texts.Message_102700806: Cool I'll show you around next time

texts.Message_102700901: Manager, I have a favor to ask!
texts.Message_102700902: I'd like to rent a super old tape, I wonder if you guys have it
texts.Option01_102700903: We've got a professional collection of vintage films from the past thirty years
texts.Option02_102700903: It's the new movies you have to wonder whether or not we stock them...
texts.Message_102700905: Actually it's a really famous one. It's called "The Big Hollow," you've surely seen it!
texts.Option01_102700906: Couldn't miss it if I tried
texts.OptionLong01_102700906: Oh, that one. I wouldn't open this store without having seen that... Yes, we've definitely got it but I just have to check out the condition of the tape ribbon. When will you be coming over?
texts.OptionLong02_102700906:
Oh, that one... It's a classic but I've been putting it off this whole time...
But we should have that tape here, I'll pull it out. What time are you coming by? I'll watch it before you arrive
texts.Message_102700908: Ping me once you've found the tape

texts.Message_102701001: Manager! I should be able to come by on the weekend
texts.Message_102701002: That videotape I mentioned before — The Big Hollow. Can I rent it then?
texts.Option02_102701003: I've put it aside for you

texts.Message_102701101: Is this Random Play video store?
texts.Message_102701103: "A clip for lonely people to watch"~
texts.Message_102701104: Do you have any tapes like that?
texts.Option01_102701105: ...Er, a few. I'll go check the storeroom
texts.Option02_102701105: Sure, I can put together a list for you
texts.Message_102701106: You're such a pro, Manager~ Thanks so m
texts.Message_102701109: I didn't send those messages! I knocked over my colleague's cup and she took my phone while I was grabbing some tissues
texts.Message_102701110: Are you still there? Are you okay?
texts.Message_102701111: I don't need to borrow any tapes. Sorry to bother you. Really sorry about that...
texts.Message_102701112: Hello? Are you getting my messages?
texts.Option01_102701113: Sorry, I was down in the storeroom
texts.Option02_102701113: Sorry, I was just sorting out that list
texts.Option01_102701117: Alright then. I opened two boxes tho
texts.Option02_102701117: It's fine, just pretend that I didn't organize anything
texts.Message_102701118: ...Sorry. I'll definitely take care of my belongings in the future...

texts.Message_102701201: Manager {F#Belle}{M#Wise}, what time does the noodle shop next door to you guys open?
texts.Message_102701202: Will it be too late if I go after work?
texts.Option02_102701203: Any time before midnight should be fine
texts.Option01_102701205: Are you coming to investigate the Sixth Street noodle shop, Seth?
texts.Message_102701207: Plus I'm kinda curious as to why these two noodle shops are so similar
texts.Message_102701208: Okay pretty much got it. Thanks, Manager. Catch you around I hope

texts.Message_103000101: It's been a while since we last spoke, hasn't it, my old friend?
texts.Message_103000102: Looks like I can't rely on youngsters to take the initiative and get in touch with me first...
texts.Option01_103000103: To tell the truth, I've missed you!
texts.Message_103000104: Aww, just a few words and you've soothed this middle-aged man's weary heart. You're good, Phaethon
texts.Message_103000105: Cold as ice as ever. But I really admire your focus on work efficiency, Phaethon
texts.Message_103000106: Alright, let's get to the point
texts.Message_103000107: You guys must've heard about the recent decline in activity in Lemnian Hollow?
texts.Message_103000108: I'm getting more and more commissions about it these days
texts.Message_103000109: This commission might be a tad dangerous, but the pay is reasonable. How about it, wanna meet up and chat?
texts.Message_103000112: If you're trying to turn me down, at least come up with something more convincing than that
texts.Message_103000113: I'll see you at the usual place
texts.Message_103000114: Want me to order for you? I've got a two-for-one coupon for espresso
texts.Message_103000116: Alright, how about a Barley Latte? My treat
texts.Message_103000117: But don't be late, or your coffee won't taste as good

texts.Message_103000201: Master Proxy, this is Lycaon from Victoria Housekeeping.
texts.Message_103000202: We were informed that you will be paying us a visit for Bangboo maintenance.
texts.Message_103000203: Victoria Housekeeping will be waiting for you near the Sunken Courtyard on the other side of the Ballet Twins.

texts.Message_103000301: Hey, Wise. How's it going? Have you met up with Victoria Housekeeping yet?
texts.Message_103000303: I'm a bit jealous you got to chat with Victoria Housekeeping!
texts.Message_103000304: It's a shame I had to work with Fairy to update the Hollow data in the Ballet Twins...
texts.Option02_103000305: I'll tell you all the fun things that happened when I get back.
texts.Message_103000307: Now that the errand's done, we need to find Rain as soon as possible, Wise. You should hurry back and get ready.

texts.Option02_103000403: Did Billy and the others make it?
texts.Message_103000404: Oh, just letting you know, Billy and the others have made it for the airship, and we're about to take off.
texts.Message_103000405: Yeah! We made it! In the airship right now. We're about to take off soon.
texts.Message_103000406: Well... I wanna apologize. Really sorry for earlier today.
texts.Message_103000407: I agreed to go look for Rain with you but ended up leaving it to someone else.
texts.OptionLong01_103000408: You're apologizing? Did you get threatened? If that's the case just give me a signal!
texts.Option02_103000408: Nicole... What happened to you? What's wrong?
texts.OptionLong02_103000408: Did you eat something weird? Quick! Hand your phone to Nekomata. Get her to tell me how bad your food poisoning is!
texts.Message_103000409: No no I'm fine! Don't worry about me.
texts.Message_103000410: I suddenly realized we've known each other for so long, and although there have been some ups and downs, it's been a pleasure working with you.
texts.OptionLong01_103000411: You're being so weird, Nicole. You're going to court, not prison. Are you really that nervous?
texts.Option02_103000411: Hey, you don't wanna jinx anything...
texts.OptionLong02_103000411: Nicole, why do I feel like you're going to... Trust me, you don't wanna jinx anything... Are you that nervous about going to court?
texts.Message_103000412: Nooo! Not at all! Don't be ridiculous!
texts.Message_103000413: Anyway, I've been really grateful to you all.
texts.Message_103000414: I'll definitely repay you when we get back!

texts.Message_103000501: Sorry for keeping you waiting, Master Proxy.
texts.Message_103000502: We have a plan for passing through the Ballet Twins' atrium now.
texts.Message_103000504: Don't mention it, it's our duty. Besides, we're counting on your help for our future operations.
texts.Option02_103000505: It's my pleasure. I'm a Proxy after all.
texts.Message_103000506: If it's convenient, please give me a call and I'll fill you in on the details.

texts.Message_103000601: Hi, Master Proxy, this is Corin. Sorry to bother you!
texts.Message_103000604: Mr. Lycaon and Miss Rina have gone to the Hollow exit to monitor the enemy. Miss Ellen is awake, too.
texts.Option02_103000606: Thank you for being willing to help us.
texts.Message_103000607: We'll be waiting for you at the entrance to the Hollow.
texts.Message_103000608: You are our important guest, and it's our duty. We'll be waiting for you at the entrance to the Hollow.

texts.Message_104000105: I'll wait for you at the hut behind the gas station
texts.Message_104000106: Oh yeah, come alone and don't let anyone else find out!
texts.Message_104000107: Yeah, I wanna talk to you about something

texts.Message_104000201: Hey, Proxy, your timing couldn't be better. I was just about to message you
texts.Option02_104000203: Did you find out who the snitch was?
texts.Message_104000204: We have a suspect, but it's kind of tricky
texts.Message_104000205: Meet me where we met up last time
texts.Message_104000208: Pretty much. But it's kinda tricky and better if we talk in person
texts.Message_104000210: I'm here. You want to ask about before? I was just about to contact you

texts.Message_104000301: Is that you, Manager? This is Tsukishiro Yanagi
texts.Message_104000302: I'm sending you this message using the contact info from my membership card
texts.Message_104000304: Sorry for the intrusion, but I wanted to ask about the videotape. Can I buy it? You can take payment from my membership card balance
texts.Option01_104000305: Are you going to use it in Section 6?
texts.Message_104000307: More precisely, I tried to watch it, but ended up dozing off soon after starting it
texts.Message_104000308: It's been ages since I slept that well. This videotape works wonders
texts.Option01_104000309: Glad you found a use for it
texts.Option02_104000309: Sure thing. I've made a note of it
texts.Message_104000310: Oh, I just realized commenting on your store's collection might have been a bit impolite. Is it alright if I borrow some other films from your store next time?
texts.Message_104000312: I still have ongoing cases that aren't fully concluded, and I also have upcoming events with the HIA, so it may be some time before I can stop by again
texts.Message_104000313: Work's calling. Let's speak again soon

texts.Message_105000101: I'm here! I'm the Bangboo "Snap" that you met before. Do you remember me?
texts.Message_105000103: Help! This is urgent! This is my last chance! If I miss it, I will regret it for the rest of my life! The only person I can rely on is you! Where are you now? Are you close to Lumina? Do you have a car? Please come find me immediately! I'm sure you'll come!
texts.OptionLong01_105000104: So many exclamation marks, it looks really urgent!
texts.Option02_105000104: Wow, typing all that in one go!
texts.OptionLong02_105000104: Wow, typing all that in one go! Is it really that urgent...?
texts.Message_105000105: I had the message ready to send, and I'm just waiting for your reply! Anyway, come to the movie theater at Lumina, it's urgent!
texts.Option01_105000106: Are you... inviting me to watch a movie?
texts.Message_105000107: What? It's to save me, of course! I'm trapped by the bad guys in black, and it's urgent!
texts.Option01_105000108: Guys in black... Why do they want to capture a Bangboo?
texts.Option02_105000108: Wait a minute... Why don't you just disconnect the Bangboo?
texts.Message_105000109: It's not my Bangboo that's trapped, it's me! Just come, and you'll see what's going on. I'll be waiting at the cinema's back door, wearing a red jacket and red sunglasses!
texts.Message_105000110: By the way, let's have a code phrase: I'll say "chaotic," and you respond with "fried rice." Remember, stay low-key!

texts.Message_200500101: Knock knock knock! Anyone in? Is there anyone here at the video store?
texts.Message_200500103: Haha, don't be like that. It's just an expression of my anxiety, because... it seems there's a thief in your parking lot!
texts.Message_200500104: According to industry norms, I'm not supposed to chat with you about anything other than work.
texts.Message_200500105: But I just so happened to be coming down here for a cup of joe, and just so happened to see a suspicious guy breaking into your parking lot~
texts.Option02_200500106: I'll go check it out now!

texts.Message_200500213: The flowers beside the white knight, I didn't have time to finish coloring them. If you like graffiti, could you please help me give them a bit of color? Any color will do!
texts.Message_200500214: Of course, I'll provide the spray paint! You don't have to worry about any extra expenses~
texts.Message_200500216: Thank you so much! I'll always remember that such an incredible Proxy exists in New Eridu! Thank you so much, and thanks again!

texts.Message_201000101: You must be the mighty and capable store manager President mentioned, right?
texts.OptionLong01_201000102: Who are you? "President"... Do you work for Koleda?
texts.OptionLong02_201000102: "President"? That sounds familiar... Are you an employee at Belobog Heavy Industries?
texts.Message_201000103: That's right. I'm Mishka from Belobog Heavy Industries, and I'd like to ask for your help.
texts.Message_201000104: It's a matter of great importance, So let's talk in person. I can't type fast enough on my phone to explain it clearly.
texts.Message_201000105: Oh, please don't tell anyone about our discussion, especially President!

texts.Message_201000201: Manager, Three Gates have done an inventory and confirmed they have retrieved all lost parts.
texts.Message_201000202: The problem has finally been dealt with. You've saved my life!
texts.Option01_201000203: You no longer need a loan to go to work?
texts.Message_201000204: Yes, and I owe it all to you!
texts.Message_201000205: As promised before, Brutus and I are ready to buy everyone a meal.
texts.Message_201000206: Manager, you must come to the dinner as the guest of honor!

texts.Message_205400101: Received a video file from Koleda. Would you like to view it?

texts.Message_205400201: Do you remember the commission from last time?
texts.Message_205400204: You forgot already? ...Alright, you better forget about the footage too.
texts.Message_205400205: Today's plan is to head to Lumina Square, get the "key," and then enter the Hollow.
texts.Message_205400206: I'll explain the details when you get here.
texts.Message_205400207: We'll wait for you at Lumina Square.

texts.Message_205400301: Proxy, you can start investigating the Hollow inside the school.
texts.Message_205400302: We used the key Grace gave us to enter the abandoned parking lot. We're close to the entrance of the Hollow.
texts.Message_205400305: Alright, I've sent you the coordinates.

texts.Message_205400402: Fortunately, most of the students were not caught in the expansion of the Hollow.
texts.Message_205400403: But after roll call, we noticed three were missing.
texts.Message_205400404: Besides Emmie that we saw, Lisha and Dan are also missing.
texts.Message_205400406: Prepare for the worst, all three may have been sucked into the Hollow.
texts.Message_205400407: Please enter the Hollow as soon as possible and rescue them.
texts.Message_205400408: As for the irresponsible principal who allowed the Hollow to expand

texts.Message_205400501: Proxy, Emmie asked me to meet at Lumina Square
texts.Message_205400502: About that bastard principal, I heard it all from her.
texts.Message_205400503: She brought you some snacks too.
texts.Message_205400504: If it's convenient, could you come over for a chat?
texts.Message_205400505: We'll wait for you at Lumina Square.

texts.Message_205400602: Do you consider yourself more of an "adult" or on the "child" side?
texts.Message_205400605: I just imagined you saying that... it's a little silly but also kinda cute!
texts.Message_205400606: I almost forgot. I messaged to thank you for your help.
texts.Message_205400607: Without you, I couldn't have managed it on my own.
texts.Message_205400608: You helped me not only as a responsible Proxy... but also as a friend.
texts.Message_205400609: ...If I had a reliable friend like {M#Wise}{F#Belle} when I was little, I might have found it hard to grow up.
texts.Message_205400611: ...I suddenly feel weird having said that. Please forget it.
texts.Message_205400614: Ahhhhhhh please forget it! I'll buy you pineapple buns!
texts.Message_205400615: I need to work soon. Aren't you busy too?
texts.Message_205400616: Is that what it's like being an adult?
texts.Message_205400617: However, I've never once thought about going back to the past.
texts.Message_205400618: I've worked hard to get where I am today!

texts.Message_209900101: With the Waning Moon Nigh, the Chosen Shall Descend as the Clock Strikes Midnight. O' Sinners, Await Judgment in Silence!
texts.Message_209900104: Will you be free five minutes from now?
texts.Message_205500105: If the two of you allow, I would like to visit your video store.
texts.Message_205500107: Very well. I'll be right over.
