texts.Message_205500108: Of course. Please wait a moment, I'll be over shortly.

texts.Message_205500201: Regarding the Mockingbird incident from before, I have conducted a preliminary investigation.
texts.Message_205500202: It seems as though this organization is deliberately trying to get close to Miss Lilac.
texts.Message_205500205: The true intentions of these people remain unclear. However, I have already prepared my "bait."
texts.Message_205500206: Perhaps a big fish will take a bite soon.
texts.Message_205500207: Besides, there are some things regarding Miss Lilac that I prefer to discuss with you in person.
texts.Message_205500208: Are you, perchance, available right now? Could we please meet at Lumina Square?
texts.Message_205500210: Very well. I'll be here waiting.

texts.Message_205500302: Master Proxy, everything is ready and I am already in position near the target Hollow.
texts.Message_205500303: Awaiting your further instructions, Master Proxy.
texts.Message_205500305: Thank you. I'll be waiting here for your arrival.

texts.Message_205500401: Master Proxy, Miss Lilac said she wished to express her thanks to both of you in person.
texts.Message_205500402: I wonder if you are available today.
texts.Option02_205500403: She's welcome, any time is fine!

texts.Message_205600101: Good afternoon! Are any of you at Random Play right now?
texts.Message_205600102: {M#I'm not at the store right now. Maybe ask Wise?}{F#I'm a bit busy and not at the store right now. Maybe ask Belle?}
texts.Option02_205600103: Not there at the moment, but I can head back.
texts.OptionLong02_205600103: Not there at the moment, but I can head back now. What's up?
texts.Message_205600104: I might bring a special guest to your store in a bit, just wanted to give you a heads up.
texts.Message_205600106: If possible, please wait there for a bit. You'll know soon!
texts.Message_205600107: I might bring a special guest to your store in a bit... just wanted to give you a heads up. It'd be great if you could be there!
texts.Option01_205600108: No problem. I'll be back soon.
texts.Option02_205600108: No problem. I'm heading back right now.

texts.Message_205600201: Good morning, esteemed managers, just a heads-up! The Crest of Waves trophy application is all set!
texts.Option02_205600202: Is this what they call "Victorian Speed"?
texts.Message_205600203: I've just submitted the application. If everything goes smoothly, it should be ready in a couple of days. Then we just need to pick a good time to give it to Granny.
texts.Option01_205600204: Let me know when you're planning to give the trophy out.
texts.Message_205600205: {M#I'll come too, even though I wasn't much help.}{F#I've been really busy lately, but I still want to help as much as I can.}
texts.Message_205600206: {M#I want to see what the talent show trophy looks like with my own eyes!}{F#If I'm free that day, I'll come along too.}
texts.Message_205600207: Aw, you all want to come? That's perfect! Granny will be so happy to have an audience at the Award Ceremony.

texts.Message_205600301: Good morning. Have any of you seen Granny Leisha today?
texts.Message_205600303: I haven't seen her. Why today? Did something happen to her?
texts.Message_205600304: I'm on my way to the video store. I'll explain more when we meet. If Granny gets there before me, please keep her there. Thanks.

texts.Option01_205600401: Rina, Granny might have gone into the Hollow.
texts.Option02_205600401: Rina, it's very likely that Granny is in the Hollow.
texts.Message_205600402: I never considered that possibility before. Granny has always avoided the Hollow. Why would she go in there by herself...
texts.Message_205600403: But I believe you. After all, no one knows more about Hollows than you do.
texts.Message_205600404: We used 55% of our electricity budget to figure this out, with a reliability of 97%!
texts.Message_205600405: Got it. I've also done my investigations here. Although I could report to Public Security and wait for them to arrange a search, I'd rather go find Granny myself and bring her out...
texts.Message_205600406: After all, I still have some sweetcakes to find, as promised. So, could I ask you to accompany me on a trip to the Hollow, dear guide?
texts.Message_205600408: Thank you very much. See you in a bit.

texts.Message_205700401: {M#There's a sudden rush of people wanting to rent videotapes, while there's a guest at home, too. I'm trapped between a rock and a hard place...}{F#There's a sudden rush of people wanting to rent videotapes, while there's a guest at home, too. I'm trapped between a rock and a hard place...}
texts.Message_205700402: {M#If you're pretty much all done, please come back. We're flat out here!}{F#If you're pretty much all done, please come back. We're flat out here!}

texts.Message_301000101: Every tune is waiting to be heard and savored. Bardic Needle's collection and services have been upgraded, now offering more custom tunes. Can't wait for your visit.
texts.Option01_301000102: Why are you suddenly being so polite?
texts.Option02_301000102: Did you just change your tune?
texts.Message_301000103: It's because — well, it's a secret. No need to spell it out right away.
texts.Message_301000104: In short, it'll help with "that thing." Drop by when you can.

texts.Message_301000201: Dear Manager, remember the song we composed together that day? The sparks between those notes, a language only you and I can decipher. Since then, I've been tailoring special services just for you. Now, this unique musical experience is ready.
texts.Message_301000202: Looking forward to the moment you step into the Bardic Needle again. I'll be here, quietly waiting to share an unparalleled symphony with you.
texts.Option02_301000203: You sent this to all your contacts, right...?
texts.Message_301000204: I'm sure you know what I'm talking about. Just like last time, it's a secret.
texts.Message_301000205: So, I'll be waiting for you at Bardic Needle.

texts.Message_301002101: How's it going, {NICKNAME}? I've been living life to the fullest lately!
texts.Message_301002102: Haha, I can feel your excitement through the phone. I get it! I was the same when I first started. Every time I got a new client, I would be so happy I could burst!
texts.Message_301002103: I suppose you've defeated the ones on your end as well, eh?
texts.Message_301002104: If you're free, let's meet at the cafe

texts.Message_301002201: Hey, {NICKNAME}! Remember me? I've got some awesome news for you.
texts.Message_301002203: I'm so glad you replied quickly. Looks like I made it to your favorite contacts list! By the way, the client loved your last combat commission and wants to give you a new one!
texts.Message_301002204: I've prepared a super-detailed "100 Tips for Rookie Proxies" that covers all sorts of commissions. Take a good look at it, and you'll breeze through your newbie phase with the guidance from Venus!
texts.Message_301002205: Come on. Don't be shy! Tell me where you want to start. Reply with "1" to find out Ethereal characteristics, reply with "2" to check out the best routes, or reply with "3" if you want me to personally introduce some awesome Agents to you. Or... do you want them all?
texts.Option02_301002206: 4, let's just skip the tutorial part and jump right into the commissions.
texts.Message_301002207: Seriously? You don't need my 100 Tips for Rookie Proxies...? I was thinking of sending you one tip each day so you can graduate in 100 days... Feels like you skipped straight to the 101st day or something...
texts.Option02_301002208: Maybe I should read the guide?
texts.Message_301002209: Oh, you don't have to read it. It's just evaluations of failed commissions. Perhaps it'll come in handy when things get tough in the future...
texts.Message_301002210: About the commission, how about we... discuss it in person?
texts.Message_301002211: I have tons of commissions for you in the future, so a friendly face-to-face chat will surely help us get to know each other better! By the way, even though I've been calling myself "big sister," I might actually be younger than you.
texts.Option01_301002212: I don't think so. I'm very young.
texts.Option02_301002212: Yeah, my granddaughter is just as sweet and gentle as you are.
texts.Message_301002213: Hmmm, I have a feeling you'll be the youngest legendary Proxy ever!
texts.Message_301002214: Huh!? Granddaughter? ...Did you come here to spend your retirement on Inter-Knot... Ain't no way! You've got to be kidding me!
texts.Message_301002215: Anyway, let's meet at COFF CAFE on Sixth Street! I checked it out, it's not too crowded and has a good vibe. I'll be sitting at the outermost seat. Is Sixth Street far for you?
texts.Option01_301002216: No, it's pretty close. I'll be there on time.
texts.Option02_301002216: It's not too far. I should be able to get there on time.
texts.Option01_301002218: No, it's pretty close. I'll be there on time.
texts.Option02_301002218: It's not too far. I should be able to get there on time.

texts.Option01_1990500110: Are there commercial spies messing with you?
texts.Option02_1990500110: Is there a most wanted criminal over there?
texts.Message_103000201: Master Proxy, this is Lycaon from Victoria Housekeeping.
texts.Message_103000202: We were informed that you will be paying us a visit for Bangboo maintenance.
texts.Message_103000203: Victoria Housekeeping will be waiting for you near the Sunken Courtyard on the other side of the Ballet Twins.

texts.Option01_301007104: Luckily, we fixed it in time!
texts.Message_301007105: I'll never ever make such basic mistakes again!
texts.Message_301007106: Now, just gotta double-check the drill rig and return the machine...
texts.Message_301007107: One sec... I just can't shake off this strange feeling... Did I forget something?
texts.Message_301007110: Looks like I might need your help again. Can you swing by the construction site after I finish up here?

texts.Message_301007214: I'll never ever make such basic mistakes ever again!

texts.Message_103000203: Victoria Housekeeping will be waiting for you near the Sunken Courtyard on the other side of the Ballet Twins.

texts.Message_301007401: Oh! So you're the one who accepted the commission, right?
texts.Message_301007402: That's great. Have you seen the movie "Dimensional Musketeer"?
texts.Message_301007404: Hah! That's what I like to hear!
texts.Message_301007405: I'm really into the scene where the hero whips out his pistols and takes on a whole bunch of gunslingers.

texts.Message_302001101: So, my shiny rising star, feeling bored without any new commissions lately?
texts.Message_302001102: Or perhaps, want to talk to me about your work problems?
texts.Message_302001105: Huh? You want to talk about work right off the bat?
texts.Message_302001106: Well... that was straightforward. I don't mind your style, though!
texts.Message_302001107: I've sent you the details of the commission through Inter-Knot.
texts.Message_302001108: If you need help, come find me at the coffee shop on Sixth Street~

texts.Message_302001301: Huh? The commission is done already? And the rating is off the charts!
texts.Message_302001302: Your progress was much faster than I expected!
texts.Message_302001303: You never cease to amaze me...!
texts.Message_302001304: Looks like I won't get a chance to use the guide I prepared or the comforting words I had ready in case the commission didn't go as planned!
texts.Message_302001306: Don't joke with me like that. I've been in this business for ages, and I've never seen a novice like you!
texts.Message_302001307: It must be your incredible skills, not my misjudgment of the difficulty level.

texts.Message_301007401: Oh! So you're the one who accepted the commission, right?
texts.Message_301007402: That's great. Have you seen the movie "Dimensional Musketeer"?

texts.Option01_302001901: Are you the host of "Foodie's Guide to Ridu"?
texts.Option02_302001901: I heard you needed clues regarding the Bangboo Golden Town
texts.Message_302001902: You must be the Proxy my fans recommended!
texts.Message_302001904: I promised to get to the bottom of the Bangboo Golden Town's legend for my fans... but I'm still completely clueless at the moment
texts.Message_302001905: I just heard there would be Golden Bangboo near the entrance to the town...
texts.Message_302001906: There's been a place recently! They say that there's Golden Bangboo!
texts.Message_302001907: Could you check the area out for me?
texts.Option02_302001908: If you really have no other clues
texts.Message_302001910: Please keep me in the loop if you find anything!
texts.Message_302001911: When I promise my fans something, I always deliver!

texts.Message_302002005: Have you found the Golden Bangboo and the entrance to Bangboo Golden Town?
texts.Message_302002007: So why haven't you set off yet?
texts.Message_302002008: Ah! I don't mean to rush you. It's just that a friend of mine recently mentioned wanting to explore the Bangboo Golden Town too...
texts.Message_302002009: But I've promised my fans to uncover the truth behind the mystery... If I'm the second to post videos of the town, I can hardly say I've fulfilled my promise
texts.Message_302002011: Due to my Ether aptitude, I can't visit this mythical Bangboo Golden Town myself
texts.Message_302002012: So, please record your experience there as comprehensively as possible
texts.Message_302002015: Great! Oh, I'm sure you'll be happy about the pay. After all, you're a friend of my fan.
texts.Message_302002016: I'm sure you'll be happy about the pay! My fans are all waiting... Please set off as soon as possible!

texts.Message_302002108: I'll figure out a way to apologize to him... As for the commissions, I have complete trust in you!
texts.Option01_302002109: Yeah, you can trust me on this!

texts.Message_301007208: Are you saying that Grace has known about my mistake all along, and she was giving me the chance to remedy the situation?
texts.Option02_301007210: It's alright as long as everything turns out well.
texts.Message_301007212: Crying in front of colleagues is the 24th workplace taboo for newbies!
texts.Message_301007214: I'll never ever make such basic mistakes ever again!

texts.Message_302007301: Oh? Didn't expect to see you again so soon!
texts.Message_302007302: You've actually taken care of those ungrateful brats?
texts.Message_302007303: Good, good! I'm starting to like you more, youngster!
texts.Option02_302007304: It was a walk in the park.
texts.Message_302007305: Hah! Skilled and cocky. You're my kinda people!
texts.Message_302007306: However, there are still some guys in the gang who aren't so convinced and are itching for trouble.
texts.Message_302007307: Just rough them up good until they fall in line.
texts.Message_302007308: Don't you worry! I never forget to reward capable youngsters like yourself!

texts.Message_302007403: Alright! Expert Challenge is now available to you!
texts.Message_302007404: Expert Challenge is now available to you!
texts.Message_302007406: No, no, no! This is just the HIA's latest upgrade to the VR combat experience!
texts.Message_302007407: It's a series of experiential stages recently launched by the HIA!
texts.Message_302007408: Expert Challenge uses larger servers, greatly enhancing the data usage of the simulation system. You can try to create more complex environments and individual units!
texts.Message_302007409: Here, you'll encounter enemies that are more dangerous, rarer, and stronger than before!
texts.Option01_302007410: Sounds like a bunch of cliches.
texts.Message_302007411: Hold on! Let me share some more info with you...
texts.Message_302007412: We've added Dullahan to the Expert Challenge enemy list!
texts.OptionLong01_302007413: It's... been mentioned before in the Association's "Hollow Era" or the reality show "Teach Me, Senpai!"... or something, right?
texts.OptionLong02_302007413: Dullahan? It sounds like some kind of Ethereal. But I'm not very familiar with these...
texts.Message_302007414: Absolutely! It's a powerful, combat-savvy Ethereal... An evil, Hollow-born swordsman.
texts.Message_302007415: It's powerful Ethereal first witnessed in the Laketown Hollow! A terrifying Hollow swordsman.
texts.Message_302007416: Recently, the HIA has finally fully replicated its strength and combat style in VR.
texts.Message_302007417: Even for experienced Hollow investigators, fighting it is a rare and challenging experience...
texts.Message_302007418: Now, you can personally break Dullahan's laser blade in Expert Challenge!
texts.Message_302007421: I guarantee it! The new challenge is sure to impress you!

texts.Message_302007503: That's right, that's the response we're looking for! Considering your quick reply, you must have been playing our Association's VR game lately, right?
texts.Option01_302007504: Well, I've got some good news for you today: Hollow Rider has put out an update with an all-new experience. You can challenge powerful new enemies right now at the Career Club!
texts.Option02_302007504: Oh, have you forgotten me already? I'm a promoter. We met on Sixth Street before!
texts.Message_302007505: I'm just getting in touch to let you know Hollow Rider has put out an update with an all-new experience. You can challenge powerful new enemies right now at the Career Club!
texts.Option02_302007506: They weren't strong enough in the last version?
texts.Message_302007507: Oh, looks like I managed to stir up your competitive spirit?
texts.Message_302007508: So then, stop by the club when you're free and give it a try!

texts.Message_303000101:
Dear Inter-Knot User, the overall Ethereal activity in Lemnian Hollow has been fluctuating dramatically. Please don't forget to update your Carrot!
Tired of fighting alone in the Hollow? Want to play to your strengths? Looking to avoid Ethereals and focus on exploration?
If you seek to fully utilize your abilities, our "Rally Commission: Dark Pavilion" is the perfect choice for you!
Check out more in our Inter-Knot Rally Commission section.
Inter-Knot Recommendation, your daily inspiration!

texts.Message_303000501: ***This message has been sent automatically by Inter-Knot***
texts.Message_303000502: Due to the client timing out, your commission from [AAAInvestigatorTrainingProgram] has been automatically confirmed and the payment has been processed.
texts.Message_303000503: According to Inter-Knot security policy and user agreement, we would like to remind you that this client's account may have been compromised. For your privacy and safety, please do not contact this client or conduct any transactions outside of Inter-Knot.

texts.Message_303500101: {M#Wise}{F#Belle}, I hear you've been quite busy lately
texts.Message_303500103: There's something I'd like to ask you...
texts.Message_303500104: Can you stop by Turbo when you're free?

texts.Message_303500201: {M#Wise}{F#Belle}, wanna stop by for some food today?
texts.Message_303500202: I've got some good news to share
texts.OptionLong01_303500203: Can I finally get onion-free noodles?
texts.OptionLong02_303500203: It's buy one get one free today? Then I'll bring {M#Belle}{F#Wise} along too.
texts.Message_303500206: Anyway, come by the shop and I'll tell you. I've been waiting for ages

texts.Message_303500301: {F#Belle}{M#Wise}, have you got some free time these days?
texts.Option01_303500302: I've always got time for you
texts.Message_303500304: Here's the thing~ Last time we spoke I told you about my problem with the music toys...
texts.Message_303500305: I did a little research after that... and had a very important discussion with the boss!
texts.Option01_303500306: Oh, I know. It's about business at the gadget store, right?
texts.Option02_303500306: I don't have to worry anymore...
texts.Message_303500307: Of course! what else could it be?
texts.Message_303500308: Huh, {F#Belle}{M#Wise}, were you worried about something?
texts.Message_303500309: Anyway... I've been working super hard! But I still need you to help me with something...
texts.Message_303500310: I'd also like your opinion on my thoughts, since you're so clever!
texts.Option01_303500311: ...When you put it like that, Susie, how could I refuse?
texts.Option02_303500311: Sure thing, you can always rely on me
texts.Message_303500313: I'll be waiting for you outside the gadget store then

texts.Message_304000102: Since you chose to accept the gift, here is a reminder from the Spiral Flutist.
texts.Message_304000103: You may open it however you want, and you should know who you might want to give this to.
texts.Message_304000104: You only need to remember that no gifts given can be taken back.
texts.Message_304000105: If you choose to open it, don't look back.

texts.Message_304000203: I thought the Bangboo named Kami North was the only variable in the equation, but I didn't expect it to work so closely with humans...
texts.Option01_304000204: So you really could see what happened in the Hollow!
texts.Message_304000205: Much more. I was right there! I'm overjoyed because I witnessed another possibility when my plans failed! And this overwhelming joy brought me right to you.
texts.Message_304000206: Yes... I just had to greet you to praise a worthy enemy.
texts.Option01_304000207: Wait, you are the Butler just now?!
texts.Option02_304000207: Does that mean... You are the Bangboo just now?!
texts.Message_304000208: Who knows? If you only observe with your eyes, you will always be deceived. When we meet again, perhaps I will be something even more surprising.
texts.Option02_304000209: Why are you targeting the Bangboo?
texts.Message_304000210: You'll find out when you catch me. "One day, I will make sure the Spiral Flutist gets the punishment they deserve!" Didn't you say that? Before that day comes, just try to catch me as if I'm the purest evil in this world.
texts.Message_304000211: I have received your declaration of war, and I gladly accept it.
texts.Message_304000212: The lost city is home to darkness, and the winding streets are the net that catches the prey. We spin silk in the name of malice and crimes, and the music of the flute at the center of the spiral cordially invites you—

texts.Message_305000001: Lana said you'd already arrived. How come I didn't see you?

texts.Message_305000101: The Black Anchor was completely taken down!
texts.Message_305000102: Was it the Public Security? That's impressive.
texts.Message_305000104: Now that it's all settled, want to join me at Port Elpis? You've been working so hard — let me treat you to some signature fries!
texts.Message_304000105: If you choose to open it, don't look back.

texts.Message_309900101: The HIA extends its regards to you, esteemed Independent Investigator of Hollow Zero.
texts.Message_309900102: You have passed the Qualification Assessment, and your Investigation License has been registered. Now you can take on regional investigation commissions.
texts.Message_309900103: Due to a critical shortage of frontline personnel at Hollow Zero, we are officially issuing an urgent recruitment notice for a commission in the Old Capital Metro Zone.
texts.Message_309900104: We stand united to protect our beloved New Eridu from nefarious threats.

texts.Message_309903110: So, remember to note down every win, every showdown with Ethereals, every stare-off with the Hollows!

texts.Message_400600102: dont forget to keep in touch or someone might start worrying
texts.Option02_400600103: Why did your tone suddenly change?
texts.Message_400600104: Ah! S—Sorry! I—I took my phone back...
texts.Message_400600105: Th—That message was sent by Miss Ellen... S—Sorry for the disturbance...
texts.Option01_400600106: I didn't mean to worry you.
texts.Option02_400600106: Are you worried about me, Corin?
texts.Message_400600107: Ah, um... I'm glad you're okay, Master Proxy...
texts.Message_400600108: I—I apologize again! I—I will leave you alone now...

texts.Option02_400600203: Rare to hear you complain about being tired.
texts.Message_400600204: I have been working non-stop for 72 hours...
texts.Message_400600206: There's... no other way... Everyone else has fallen... Only I am left at Victoria Housekeeping Co...
texts.Message_400600207: A cold is really scary... scarier than a critically active Ethereal...
texts.Message_400600208: You should be careful too, Master Proxy...
texts.Option01_400600209: Just go home and get some rest!

texts.Option01_400600301: Wishing for a little maid to fall out of the sky.
texts.Option02_400600301: To find a cute little maid.
texts.Message_400600302: Hmm? I—I can make your wish come true!
texts.Message_400600303: E—Excuse me... What does Master Proxy want?
texts.Message_400600304: I—I'm a maid! You seem to be in a really good mood today, Master Proxy.
texts.Option02_400600305: I've got a little spare time today. Do you want to go out somewhere, Corin?
texts.Message_400600306: Great! I can go anywhere, so why don't you decide!
texts.Option01_400600307: Then let's meet up at the plaza in front of Lumina Galleria.
texts.Option02_400600307: Then let's meet up at Random Play.
texts.Message_400600308: A—Alright! Lumina Galleria has got the Haunted House challenge going on at the moment.
texts.Message_400600309: I sneaked a peek before! The mystery prize is Ames Special Mechanical Lubricant!
texts.Message_400600310: But I didn't pre-register because you need to have two people to make a team...
texts.Option02_400600311: Pick me! Wanna try and win that prize?
texts.Message_400600312: Would you like to go together with me, Master Proxy? That's great!
texts.Message_400600313: It's Ames Special Mechanical Lubricant. Even Lycaon only has eight bottles of it!
texts.Message_400600314: It would be a lot easier to take care of my chainsaw with that.
texts.Message_400600315: But... could I please make an unreasonable request? I—If we win the challenge...
texts.Option02_400600316: I've got no use for it anyway.
texts.Message_400600317: Thank you, Master Proxy! Could you please pick a time that's good for you?
texts.Message_400600319: C—Can I come into the store?
texts.Message_400600320: I—I've got a really important thing that I w—want to ask you about... It'll probably take you about an hour...
texts.Option01_400600321: Sure, we're always on the same page Corin!
texts.Option02_400600321: You've got something to ask me about, too? What is it?
texts.Message_400600322: I—I'll fill you in on the details when we meet...
texts.Message_400600323: Seeing as you want to meet at the store too, you can pick the time.
texts.Message_400600324: When the time comes, I'll be waiting for you outside Random Play.

texts.Option01_400600401: You should ease up sometimes, don't overwork yourself
texts.Option02_400600401: You've been really busy lately. Do you have time to meet up?
texts.Message_400600402: E—Ease up? I—If I'm not careful, Miss Ellen will yell at me...
texts.Message_400600403: I'm n—not busy! I was also thinking about m—meeting up with Master Proxy...
texts.Option01_400600404: I mean, sometimes I still sneak off when things are busy and have a little fun.
texts.Message_400600405: Does Master Proxy want to slack off together? Great!
texts.Message_400600406: Is there anywhere you would like to go?
texts.Option01_400600407: Then let's meet up at the plaza in front of Lumina Galleria.
texts.Option02_400600407: Then let's meet up at Random Play.
texts.Message_400600408: A—Alright! Lumina Galleria has got the Haunted House challenge going on at the moment.
texts.Message_400600409: I sneaked a peek before! The mystery prize is Ames Special Mechanical Lubricant!
texts.Message_400600410: But I didn't pre-register because you need to have two people to make a team...
texts.Option02_400600411: Pick me! Wanna try and win that prize?
texts.Message_400600412: Would you like to go together with me, Master Proxy? That's great!
texts.Message_400600413: It's Ames Special Mechanical Lubricant. Even Lycaon only has eight bottles of it!
texts.Message_400600414: It would be a lot easier to take care of my chainsaw with that.
texts.Message_400600415: But... could I please make an unreasonable request? I—If we win the challenge...
texts.Option02_400600416: I've got no use for it anyway.
texts.Message_400600417: Thank you, Master Proxy! Could you please pick a time that's good for you?
texts.Message_400600419: C—Can I come into the store?
texts.Message_400600420: I—I've got a really important thing that I w—want to ask you about... It'll probably take you about an hour...
texts.Option01_400600421: Sure, we're always on the same page Corin!
texts.Option02_400600421: You've got something to ask me about, too? What is it?
texts.Message_400600422: I—I'll fill you in on the details when we meet...
texts.Message_400600423: Seeing as you want to meet at the store too, you can pick the time.
texts.Message_400600424: When the time comes, I'll be waiting for you outside Random Play.

texts.Option01_400600501: Wishing for a little maid to fall out of the sky.
texts.Option02_400600501: To find a cute little maid.
texts.Message_400600502: Hmm? I—I can make your wish come true!
texts.Message_400600503: E—Excuse me... What does Master Proxy want?
texts.Message_400600504: I—I'm a maid! You seem to be in a really good mood today, Master Proxy.
texts.Option02_400600505: I've got a little spare time today. Do you want to go out somewhere, Corin?
texts.Message_400600506: Great! I can go anywhere, so why don't you decide!
texts.Option02_400600507: At the park beside the river.
texts.Message_400600508: Ah! L—Last time, Miss Rina also said...
texts.Message_400600509: "Corin rocks more of that rubble, industrial vibe?"
texts.Message_400600510: The Brant Street Construction Site really is the most suitable place!
texts.Option02_400600511: More of a what? What kind of vibe?
texts.Message_400600512: Oh, it's like this... Mr. Lycaon has recently been putting together a commercial pamphlet promoting Victoria Housekeeping Co.
texts.Message_400600513: It would be really incredible if there were pictures of all the attendants and maids inside that pamphlet.
texts.Message_400600514: And everyone else's photos are so pretty! But... but I'm the only one without a photo...
texts.Message_400600515: I kept meaning to book a set at the photo shop, but i—in the end... *crying*
texts.Message_400600516: I found out that getting a set of photos shot is really expensive...
texts.Option01_400600517: Maid photos? I can do that!
texts.Message_400600518: Huh? Master Proxy, you know how to take photos, too? That'll really help me save a stack of cash if you could help out...
texts.Message_400600519: So then, when is a good time for you?
texts.Message_400600521: How about the riverside park over by Lumina Galleria?
texts.Message_400600522: Miss Ellen just so happened to gift me this picnic basket which she weaved herself!
texts.Message_400600523: Hmm... S—Suddenly I feel like going on a picnic together with Master Proxy...
texts.Option02_400600524: Will I get to taste your cooking, Corin?
texts.Message_400600525: Th—Then I'll prepare the food, and Master Proxy needs only to pick a suitable time for us!

texts.Option01_400600601: You should ease up sometimes, don't overwork yourself
texts.Option02_400600601: You've been really busy lately. Do you have time to meet up?
texts.Message_400600602: E—Ease up? I—If I'm not careful, Miss Ellen will yell at me...
texts.Message_400600603: I'm n—not busy! I was also thinking about m—meeting up with Master Proxy...
texts.Option01_400600604: I mean, sometimes I still sneak off when things are busy and have a little fun.
texts.Message_400600605: Does Master Proxy want to slack off together? Great!
texts.Message_400600606: Is there anywhere you would like to go?
texts.Option02_400600607: At the park beside the river.
texts.Message_400600608: Ah! L—Last time, Miss Rina also said...
texts.Message_400600609: "Corin rocks more of that rubble, industrial vibe?"
texts.Message_400600610: The Brant Street Construction Site really is the most suitable place!
texts.Option02_400600611: More of a what? What kind of vibe?
texts.Message_400600612: Oh, it's like this... Mr. Lycaon has recently been putting together a commercial pamphlet promoting Victoria Housekeeping Co.
texts.Message_400600613: It would be really incredible if there were pictures of all the attendants and maids inside that pamphlet.
texts.Message_400600614: And everyone else's photos are so pretty! But... but I'm the only one without a photo...
texts.Message_400600615: I kept meaning to book a set at the photo shop, but i—in the end... *crying*
texts.Message_400600616: I found out that getting a set of photos shot is really expensive...
texts.Option01_400600617: Maid photos? I can do that!
texts.Message_400600618: Huh? Master Proxy, you know how to take photos, too? That'll really help me save a stack of cash if you could help out...
texts.Message_400600619: So then, when is a good time for you?
texts.Message_400600621: How about the riverside park over by Lumina Galleria?
texts.Message_400600622: Miss Ellen just so happened to gift me this picnic basket which she weaved herself!
texts.Message_400600623: Hmm... S—Suddenly I feel like going on a picnic together with Master Proxy...
texts.Option02_400600624: Will I get to taste your cooking, Corin?
texts.Message_400600625: Th—Then I'll prepare the food, and Master Proxy needs only to pick a suitable time for us!

texts.Message_400600701: Oh... I did something terrible today... It was... rrreally bad...
texts.Message_400600702: I should probably tell Mr. Lycaon I'm resigning tomorrow... but I don't want to leave everyone... What should I do...
texts.Message_400600705: Yesterday, just before closing, everyone suddenly started discussing a movie called "Back 2 Life"...
texts.Message_400600706: Miss Ellen asked me if I'd seen it, and since everyone seemed to be so enthusiastic about it...
texts.Message_400600708: ...But all lies always get found out!
texts.Message_400600709: Everyone will realize... that I'm a terrible, terrible person... I haven't even seen "Back 2 Life"...
texts.Option01_400600710: If you watch it, it won't be a lie anymore.
texts.Option02_400600710: Just go watch it. Then you won't need to resign.
texts.Message_400600711: Ah? Really? Can I really do that?
texts.Option01_400600712: I'll find the tape, don't worry.
texts.Option02_400600712: I'll make sure you get to see this movie.

texts.Message_400600801: Sorry to bother you... Master Proxy, did you manage to find the "Back 2 Life" tape?
texts.Option01_400600802: Yes, you can come and get it anytime.
texts.Option02_400600802: Of course! Corin, you don't have to resign.
texts.Message_400600804: If Master Proxy has time, I'd like to watch the movie as soon as possible. Is that okay?

texts.Message_400600901: I never thought the noodle showdown would end like this!
texts.Message_400600902: My nemesis turned out to be none other than General Chop...
texts.Message_400600903: But, General Chop isn't my nemesis anymore! We're mutual fans of each other now!
texts.Message_400600904: I was so nervous that my hands were actually shaking the whole time...
texts.Message_400600905: But with your support, I feel I did a great job!
texts.Message_400600906: General Chop's noodles are fantastic. I really learned a lot.
texts.Option02_400600907: I want to try your noodles next time, Corin.
texts.Message_400600908: I feel much more confident in my cooking after hearing praise like that from the two of you!
texts.Message_400600909: Thank you for encouraging me. I really appreciate it!
texts.Message_400600910: Actually, I'm much better at baking. There's no way my noodles are as good as General Chop's.
texts.Message_400600911: I'll thank you next time with a special dessert for Master Proxy!

texts.Message_400601001: Yesterday, neither you nor my nemesis bothered showing up...
texts.Message_400601004: It's fine. Luckily my nemesis never turned up either. Otherwise, I definitely would've lost...
texts.Message_400601005: I know you're really busy... But please come root for me this time!

texts.Message_400601101: I found all the clients who left negative reviews...
texts.Message_400601102: But I wasn't brave enough to go alone... Master Proxy! Please don't make me go out there alone...
texts.Message_400601104: Ermmm... Then I guess I'll ask you to help sort out the negative reviews with me another time...

texts.Message_400601201: You must be really busy these days, Master Proxy. I didn't see you in the Haunted House the other day.
texts.Message_400601202: But don't worry, because the Haunted House challenge will be running for a little while longer.
texts.Option01_400601203: Sorry. I'll definitely make it next time
texts.Message_400601204: Don't apologize, Master Proxy. I'll wait for next time, too.
texts.Message_400601206: I know that you must have your reasons. It's fine. I was the one who bugged you about it in the first place.

texts.Message_400601301: Was there something important that got you sidetracked that day?
texts.Message_400601302: I was at the entrance to Random Play waiting for you to come back...
texts.Option02_400601303: Hope you weren't waiting for too long! I'm sorry...
texts.Message_400601304: I thought so! Master Proxy, make sure to get some rest. Whatever you do, don't overwork yourself.
texts.Message_400601305: I'll reschedule with you whenever you're next free.
texts.Message_400601306: No, it's fine! Don't apologize, Master Proxy. Anyway, it's really nothing important.

texts.Message_400601401: Master Proxy, we arranged to go out and take some photos together on that day...
texts.Message_400601402: You forgot about it, didn't you...? And it's all because I didn't remind you in time!
texts.Option02_400601403: Still got some stuff I need to prepare.
texts.Message_400601404: Alright, that's fine. I was so anxious that day...
texts.Message_400601405: So then, let's reschedule another time?
texts.Message_400601406: I see! It's fine, I also have some preparing to do.

texts.Message_400601501: Master Proxy... You... didn't forget about our picnic, did you...?
texts.Message_400601502: But, even if you really did forget about it... It's fine...
texts.Option02_400601503: I didn't forget. Something urgent came up
texts.Message_400601504: Okay... But I would really love to go on a picnic with you...
texts.Message_400601505: Shall we reschedule at a later date?
texts.Message_400601506: I'd kind of like for you to try some of my food...
texts.Message_400601507: Ah, I see... Not much you could do about that then...

texts.Message_4010001_01: I've been thinking about keeping a cat lately
texts.Message_4010001_02: But Grace says cat hair can easily get into the machinery's crevices and cause issues, so she doesn't recommend it...
texts.Message_4010001_03: I want a cat. I want a cat. I want a cat
texts.Message_4010001_04: I know someone with cat ears
texts.Message_4010001_05: How about watching some fluffy cat movies?
texts.Message_4010001_06: I don't want your friend, I want a real cat
texts.Message_4010001_07: Oh, wait! There's a movie called "7710 and Its Cat," and it's got a cute cat in it
texts.Message_4010001_08: Guess I'll have to settle for a movie cat
texts.Message_4010001_09: I remember a movie called "7710 and Its Cat" with a cat as a lead role
texts.Message_4010001_11: I'll try to find it for you
texts.Message_4010001_12: Great! I'll leave the cat search to you

texts.Message_4010002_01: Hey... Have you found that movie "7710 and Its Cat"?
texts.Message_4010002_05: Actually, my enthusiasm for cats has been waning lately...
texts.Message_4010002_06: I'll come over and tell you about it!

texts.Message_4010003_02: I've been paying close attention to young female customers' videotape preferences
texts.Message_4010003_03: And I realized they pretty much watch anything
texts.Message_4010003_04: Age, gender, race, background, and income...
texts.Message_4010003_05: It's hard to understand customers based solely on external criteria
texts.Message_4010003_07: I'll try my best to not be swayed by the sales pitches of those consulting firms in future...
texts.Message_4010003_08: Looks like you've thought a lot about it
texts.Message_4010003_11: However, my observation yesterday wasn't totally fruitless
texts.Message_4010003_12: I suggested Anton give his client's daughter a gift, like a membership to your video store
texts.Message_4010003_13: So she can come and rent her favorite tapes anytime she wants
texts.Message_4010003_14: Sounds like a pretty fitting gift! Don't you think?
texts.Message_4010003_15: Maybe I should purchase a bunch of membership cards as a bonus for our employees...
texts.Message_4010003_16: Yeah, I'm gonna talk to Ben about it!

texts.Message_4010004_01: I went to the video store when we agreed, but you didn't show up
texts.Message_4010004_03: Ben said I should send you this sticker
texts.Message_4010004_08: You're busy, right? Don't worry about me this time. Just let me know a time that works for you
texts.Message_4010004_10: Okay, I'll see you then at the video store

texts.Message_4010005_01: If I remember correctly, we were supposed to have noodles together yesterday
texts.Message_4010005_03: I had to take care of an emergency
texts.Message_4010005_04: If I had known you weren't coming, I wouldn't have asked Anton to attend the meeting for me
texts.Message_4010005_06: You pick a time, I'll work around your schedule
texts.Message_4010005_08: Alright, see you at the noodle shop

texts.Message_4010006_03: I'm in the middle of a budget meeting
texts.Message_4010006_04: But since Grace and Ben haven't started arguing yet, I don't have much to do
texts.Message_4010006_08: Not now, maybe later... But where are we going?
texts.Message_4010006_09: If I say I'm not busy, you might have doubts about Belobog Industries operations...
texts.Message_4010006_10: I wouldn't, I just wanted to ask you to hang out
texts.Message_4010006_11: Let's meet up when you're not busy
texts.Message_4010006_12: I just finished organizing my schedule and realized I'm actually free today
texts.Message_4010006_13: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_4010006_17: I feel like indulging in something sweet
texts.Message_4010006_20: Let's talk about it in person
texts.Message_4010006_21: Not really... Having stable blood sugar levels is a gift from my parents
texts.Message_4010006_26: I usually drink canned coffee, but you get freshly brewed coffee in a coffee shop like Coff Cafe, right?
texts.Message_4010006_27: It tastes great once you're used to it
texts.Message_4010006_28: Want to give it a try?
texts.Message_4010006_31: When that time comes, I'll be counting on you to recommend your favorite flavor!

texts.Message_4010007_01: I've not had much on recently
texts.Message_4010007_04: Are you trying to make me jealous? Whatever, it's fine
texts.Message_4010007_05: No, I just wanted to ask you to hang out
texts.Message_4010007_06: I wanted to hang out with you
texts.Message_4010007_07: Yeah, I haven't seen you in a while
texts.Message_4010007_10: How are you doing? If there's a commission you need help with, I'm here any time
texts.Message_4010007_12: Let's go for a walk together
texts.Message_4010007_13: So it's not business after all
texts.Message_4010007_14: I'm actually quite happy you're not just contacting me for official business
texts.Message_4010007_15: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Message_4010007_22: It's nothing. You'll find out once we meet
texts.Message_4010007_24: Wait for me at the video store then
texts.Message_4010007_25: What time works for you? I don't want to interfere with your business
texts.Message_4010007_27: No thoughts...? Well, as weird as it sounds, would you come with me to Public Security?
texts.Message_4010007_28: If there's anything you want to do, we can go together!
texts.Message_4010007_29: I do have some stuff to do there
texts.Message_4010007_30: I can go see a friend
texts.Message_4010007_31: Perfect, I've got some business to deal with, too
texts.Message_4010007_32: I want to meet my friend in Public Security!
texts.Message_4010007_34: Let's meet at the Public Security parking lot, then. You pick the time

texts.Message_4010010_02: We were supposed to meet at 141 yesterday, but as soon as I got there, I had to deal with a colleague's mess...
texts.Message_4010010_03: I hope you weren't waiting long?
texts.Message_4010010_04: It's fine. I didn't go either
texts.Message_4010010_06: Great! It's just bad timing this time. Let's reschedule!
texts.Message_4010010_07: My bad... I should have handled my work earlier. Next time ice cream is on me!

texts.Message_4010011_01: I didn't see you at Coff Cafe yesterday
texts.Message_4010011_02: Did you go to the wrong place?
texts.Message_4010011_05: I thought as much, they've got a lot of branches. I'll make it clearer next time!
texts.Message_4010011_07: It's okay if you just play along and say you got the location wrong!
texts.Message_4010011_08: We can meet again next time you're free!

texts.Message_4010012_01: I went to the video store yesterday at the time we agreed
texts.Message_4010012_05: I thought so. I'm sorry we didn't get to meet up
texts.Message_4010012_06: Have you dealt with the emergency? I hope everything went okay...
texts.Message_4010012_07: Let's meet next time you're free!

texts.Message_4010013_03: But don't worry, I did what I needed to
texts.Message_4010013_06: I stood you up first yesterday, so there's no need to explain yourself
texts.Message_4010013_07: Bummer though... I was looking forward to meeting up

texts.Message_4010014_01: Just like we said earlier, I went to Grace's bedroom and put up the flags from Three Gates...
texts.Message_4010014_02: She went home to catch up on some sleep today, and didn't say anything when she came back to the office
texts.Message_4010014_03: I asked her about them, but her expression was real confused. Didn't seem like she was acting...
texts.Message_4010014_04: Looks like she really didn't notice! But it's such a vibrant, obvious red!
texts.Message_4010014_05: My sister is oblivious to anything outside of the lab!
texts.Message_4010014_07: Thanks for your effort and hard work, Koleda
texts.Message_4010014_08: ...I suddenly feel so empty, like I just did all that for nothing...

texts.Message_401001501: I ended up dozing off at the office yesterday.
texts.Message_401001502: And Grace carried me to the car.
texts.Message_401001503: When I woke up, Grace was complaining about how much heavier I've gotten compared to when I was a kid. She said it was a struggle to carry me.
texts.Message_401001505: I mean, I never asked her to carry me in the first place.
texts.Message_401001506: Besides, it's only natural that I'm heavier now than when I was a kid, right?
texts.Message_401001507: If I was lighter than when I was a kid, that'd be a serious problem...
texts.Option01_401001508: You seem pretty lightweight to me, Koleda.
texts.Option02_401001508: You seem pretty solid to me, Koleda.
texts.Message_401001509: Hey, I'm not lightweight at all!
texts.Message_401001510: I should weigh myself sometime... but I don't have a scale at home...
texts.Message_401001511: Should I feel happy... because I'm getting praised...?

texts.Message_401001601: My eye has been bothering me lately. I guess I've been reading way too much.
texts.Message_401001602: Maybe I should give my eye a break. It's my one and only eye, after all.
texts.Option02_401001603: Why are you wearing a blindfold?
texts.Message_401001604: Huh? I thought you knew it.
texts.Message_401001605: Well, it's not a big deal. Just a little accident at work, pretty common in this industry.
texts.Message_401001606: Once you get used to it, it's no problem at all.
texts.Message_401001607: Well, it can be tiring sometimes, and my vision gets a bit limited during fights.
texts.Message_401001608: Grace took me to the hospital once, and the doctor said I might recover with the right treatment.
texts.Message_401001609: But according to him, the healing process needs to be completely distraction-free...
texts.Message_401001610: Impossible for me right now with all my responsibilities at Belobog Industries.
texts.Message_401001611: Well, guess the treatment will have to wait.
texts.Message_401001612: Just make sure you take care of your eyes!!!

texts.Message_401100103: I've figured out why you're not interested in my morning exercise program, Proxy!
texts.Message_401100104: I understand that regular exercise can be a bit boring.
texts.Message_401100105: Whether it's work or exercise, it's important to get people inspired!
texts.Message_401100106: That's why I've been working hard to come up with the Enthusiastic Drills to get you pumped up!
texts.Message_401100107: I'll be sending you the instructional video I just recorded.
texts.Option02_401100109: I'm going to take a nap now.

texts.Message_401100201: The key to the Enthusiastic Drills is doing it together as a team.
texts.Message_401100202: Trust me. There's nothing like sweating it out with your colleagues at a construction site early in the morning! It's totally different from exercising alone at home!
texts.Message_401100203: Yeah! It's all about spirit and building bonds!
texts.Message_401100204: What do you say? Want to join us at the construction site tomorrow morning for some exercise fun?
texts.Option01_401100205: Why are you so obsessed with your Enthusiastic Drills?
texts.Option02_401100205: Morning comes and goes before I even wake up.
texts.Message_401100206: I sent you the instructional video for the Enthusiastic Drills the other day, Proxy.
texts.Message_401100207: But looks like I forgot the most important part.
texts.Message_401100208: Working out at home can be lonely, and it's hard to get that enthusiastic vibe, right, Proxy?
texts.Option01_401100209: Eous will be joining me for the exercise.
texts.Message_401100212: I hope the Enthusiastic Drills will keep you company on those early mornings!

texts.Option01_401100301: Today's perfect for some outdoor exercises.
texts.Option02_401100301: Are you off work now, Anton?
texts.Message_401100303: Every day is perfect for some outdoor exercises!
texts.Message_401100304: But today, in particular, is a wonderful day to hang out with friends outside!
texts.Message_401100307: Any specific place you want to go, Proxy?
texts.Option02_401100308: I was planning to grab some scratch cards at the newsstand.
texts.Message_401100309: Bardic Needle? I was thinking about that place, too.
texts.Message_401100310: Trust me. That music store is on fire!
texts.Option02_401100311: How can a music store be "on fire"?
texts.Message_401100312: You'll understand once you come, Proxy.
texts.Message_401100314: Let's meet up at Bardic Needle. You pick a time!
texts.Message_401100315: Actually, I was planning to swing by the newsstand for something urgent too.
texts.Message_401100316: It's super urgent! It's about my bro.
texts.Message_401100318: Yeah, I'll fill you in when we meet up.
texts.Message_401100319: What time works best for you?
texts.Message_401100320: I'm having a rare day off today.
texts.Message_401100321: Although a day off for me is rare, I don't really feel like taking it.
texts.Message_401100323: "If you keep working, Anton, we'll get fined for violating labor laws."
texts.Option01_401100324: Since you're on vacation, you should be out having a blast.
texts.Option02_401100324: Since you're free, don't waste your time by staying at home.
texts.Message_401100325: You sure know me well, Proxy!
texts.Message_401100326: I'm not the type who can stay still at home.
texts.Message_401100327: So, where do you want to go, then?

texts.Option01_401100401: Today's perfect for some outdoor exercises.
texts.Option02_401100401: Are you off work now, Anton?
texts.Message_401100403: Every day is perfect for some outdoor exercises!
texts.Message_401100404: But today, in particular, is a wonderful day to hang out with friends outside!
texts.Message_401100407: Any specific place you want to go, Proxy?
texts.Option01_401100408: I'm thinking of going to 141 to do some shopping.
texts.Option02_401100408: Actually, I'm not sure about it...
texts.Message_401100410: Truth be told, I've made a shopping list, and I need to discuss it with someone...
texts.Message_401100411: We're getting close to the delivery date, and everyone's been working hard.
texts.Message_401100412: I was planning to get some gifts for my colleagues...
texts.Message_401100413: But I'm having trouble deciding what to get.
texts.Option02_401100414: Lucky for you, I'm a pro at picking gifts.
texts.Message_401100415: I'm so touched... You're so dependable, Proxy.
texts.Message_401100416: Sorry for the inconvenience! You can choose the time!
texts.Message_401100417: I've got a brilliant idea! Since the weather's so lovely today...
texts.Message_401100418: Are you feeling the urge to get some exercise?
texts.Message_401100419: Join us for a sweat session at the construction site!
texts.Message_401100422: I can already feel your enthusiasm!
texts.Message_401100423: It's too late to back out now, Proxy!
texts.Message_401100425: You know the way to the construction site, so come here whenever you like. I'll be waiting for you!
texts.Message_401100426: I'm having a rare day off today.
texts.Message_401100427: Although a day off for me is rare, I don't really feel like taking it.
texts.Message_401100429: "If you keep working, Anton, we'll get fined for violating labor laws."
texts.Option01_401100430: Since you're on vacation, you should be out having a blast.
texts.Option02_401100430: Since you're free, don't waste your time by staying at home.
texts.Message_401100431: You sure know me well, Proxy!
texts.Message_401100432: I'm not the type who can stay still at home.
texts.Message_401100433: So, where do you want to go, then?

texts.Message_401100501: I want to watch a fiery movie!
texts.Message_401100502: Not one of those "Oh~ Sweetie" films.
texts.Message_401100503: A fiery story that could happen in broad daylight!
texts.Option02_401100504: Please be a bit more specific
texts.Message_401100505: Fiery anti-Ethereal weapons... thrilling car chases... and heartfelt paternal love.
texts.Message_401100506: Ah, I remember now! It's called "Family."
texts.Message_401100507: Can you help me find it?
texts.Message_401100509: Haha! I'll leave it to you then?

texts.Message_401100601: Did you find the movie I mentioned earlier?
texts.Option02_401100602: It's ready for you to pick up.
texts.Message_401100603: Wow! No wonder Random Play is the best in town!
texts.Message_401100604: Count to three and I'll be right there — Jk, I'm still at the construction site.
texts.Message_401100606: I'll come grab it as soon as I can!

texts.Message_401100702: If it weren't for you, I probably wouldn't have finished all that work.
texts.Message_401100703: By the way, got time to swing by the site today?
texts.Message_401100705: Consider it a thank-you for yesterday.
texts.Message_401100706: Drop by whenever! I'm always at the site.

texts.Message_401100801: Proxy, did you forget something yesterday?
texts.Message_401100802: Hint: You had a meeting with Anton at the site.
texts.Message_401100803: Breaking a promise is a betrayal of our bond... but thankfully, ours isn't that fragile!
texts.Option01_401100804: Business has been nuts these past few days.
texts.Message_401100805: I get it. The boss always puts off personal stuff for work too.
texts.Message_401100806: Don't mention it! Is that how you say it?
texts.Message_401100807: Still, I hope you can come to the site when you have time. I promised a thank you gift!

texts.Message_401100901: Yesterday, when I took the trash to the recycling center...
texts.Message_401100902: The staff there gave us a big thank you!
texts.Message_401100903: They called us the good kids of New Eridu and said they'd write us a thank-you letter!
texts.Message_401100904: But of course, I turned it down. Good deeds should go unnamed!
texts.Message_401100906: So today, I decided to keep volunteering and sweep the streets!
texts.Message_401100908: The staff said they don't have enough people to cover Sixth Street.
texts.Message_401100909: Isn't this the perfect chance for warm-hearted volunteers like us to step in?
texts.Message_401100910: Accumulating luck isn't the point anymore. What matters is volunteering!
texts.Message_401100911: Just thinking about it gets me pumped!
texts.Message_401100913: I'll be waiting for you in front of the video store

texts.Message_401101001: Yesterday, I swept the entire Sixth Street by myself!
texts.Message_401101002: Waited for you till the end...
texts.Option02_401101003: I'll make it up to you next time
texts.Message_401101004: Really? If you say so, I'll believe it!
texts.Message_401101005: Alright! Because of that, we'll forget about what happened yesterday!
texts.Message_401101006: In fact there's much for us to clean up on Sixth Street! You better show up next time!

texts.Message_401101101: Yesterday, I played a song on loop at Bardic Needle all afternoon.
texts.Message_401101102: The name of the song was called "The One Who Doesn't Show Up"?
texts.Option02_401101103: I got busy and forgot about it...
texts.Message_401101104: Alright, I guess I can forgive you!
texts.Message_401101105: I get it. Being busy makes it easy to forget... even about me.
texts.Message_401101106: Just make sure you show up on time next time. Deal?
texts.Message_401101107: By the way, "The One Who Doesn't Show Up" is a pretty good song. You should give it a listen!

texts.Message_401101201: You didn't come to the newsstand yesterday
texts.Message_401101202: I was alone in the cold wind, waiting for you for a good while.
texts.Message_401101203: It was just Howl and I, the two of us...
texts.Message_401101204: Heck, Bro almost even woofed back!
texts.Option01_401101205: My bad. I must've ended up going to a newsstand in a parallel world.
texts.Option02_401101205: Woof woof, let me hear it!
texts.Message_401101206: Did you at least hang out with another me in that parallel world?
texts.Message_401101208: No way he's going to bark for you. Bro is very unhappy with you what you just said.
texts.Message_401101209: ...Unless you swear on your life never to stand me and my bro up again!

texts.Message_401101301: Yesterday, I was left hanging at 141 for what felt like an eternity.
texts.Message_401101302: Even the Bangboo at the door gave me a look like I were a lost puppy.
texts.Option02_401101303: Maybe they thought you were an eyesore to their business?
texts.Message_401101304: Owning up to your mistakes, I guess that makes you alright!
texts.Message_401101305: But trust me, if you pull this crap again, I'm gonna be so mad!
texts.Message_401101307: Yeah, maybe... I was just a thorn in the Bangboo's side...
texts.Message_401101308: But it's not appropriate for you, who missed an appointment, to say that!

texts.Message_401101401: For people at Belobog, trust is the most precious thing.
texts.Message_401101402: Your no-show, to be honest, hurt a bit...
texts.Message_401101403: But I know! You must have your reasons.
texts.Message_401101405: Has work been too hard lately? Please take care of your health too!
texts.Message_401101407: Let's do this again next time!

texts.Message_401200101: [Link] I'm taking part in the Beaverson Fluffy Furcare Festival Event. Tap on the link to show your support for me...
texts.Message_401200103: It's the season for fur care now
texts.Message_401200104: If you don't take regular care of your fur, split ends will be the last of your worries
texts.Message_401200105: When the weather's dry, static electricity builds up, setting off sparks when you brush against the intelligent machines on-site
texts.Message_401200106: But you shouldn't have that same kind of issue, right? Sometimes I completely forget that you're not a Thiren...
texts.Option01_401200107: I do have a skincare routine, though
texts.Option02_401200107: I'm actually worried about losing my hair
texts.Message_401200108: If your fur is sleek and smooth, then it's hard to be in a bad mood. Right?
texts.Message_401200110: Ah! Are you working too much? Or is that a side-effect of over-exposure to the Hollows?
texts.Message_401200112: Let's go in for a spa when we're both free
texts.Option01_401200113: For a bear, you really are quite pampered, Ben!
texts.Option02_401200113: Can I use your membership card?

texts.Message_401200201: There was an accident on-site today
texts.Message_401200204: This is what happened... An intelligent machine was doing some piledriving, when this mouse suddenly scuttled out from out of nowhere
texts.Option01_401200205: A mouse caused a mech to breakdown?
texts.Message_401200206: Mmm... For some reason, that pile driver had one of its cognitive chip settings calibrated to "Fear Mice"
texts.Message_401200207: It seems an engineer saved a cartoon of a robot cat getting its ears nibbled off by mice onto its hard disk
texts.Message_401200208: The intelligent machine was scared of mice spun out of control, causing the accident. I just so happened to be there when it happened and even earned a few scrapes myself
texts.Option02_401200209: Can heavy machines really just cause minor scrapes like that?
texts.Message_401200210: Er, well I wasn't actually scraped by the AI mecha
texts.Message_401200211: You see, I've watched that cartoon before, so I'm a little... traumatized by mice, too
texts.Message_401200212: When I was panicking to try and get away from the mouse, I tripped over a bag of cement and fell flat on my face...

texts.Message_401200301: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy... Or should I say, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Manager?
texts.Message_401200302: How's business been lately at the store?
texts.Message_401200303: Well, I've got an interest in your video store business
texts.Option01_401200304: Belobog wants to acquire Random Play?
texts.Option02_401200304: You want to come work at Random Play?
texts.Message_401200306: Well... That's not quite within the scope of Belobog business plans at the moment.
texts.Message_401200308: Please don't say that! The President will definitely take things the wrong way if she hears that
texts.Message_401200309: I was just going to rent a copy of a videotape called Best Bid. It's a variety show
texts.Message_401200310: I heard it was a popular TV shopping show for a while. I think I can learn some business acumen from it
texts.Option01_401200311: Let me find Best Bid for you!
texts.Option02_401200311: Can you really learn stuff just like that? I'll keep that in mind!

texts.Message_401200401: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Manager, that videotape I asked about last time, Best Bid. Did you find it?
texts.Message_401200402: If you can't find it, a different one would do just fine
texts.Option02_401200403: You can come pick it up
texts.Message_401200405: I'll come pick it up when I get some free time!

texts.Message_401200501: I just remembered today when I got a DM from Public Security
texts.Message_401200502: I went to Public Security yesterday to deal with a ticket involving one of our work trucks
texts.Message_401200503: This truck carrying construction materials was affected by a Hollow and flipped over near its entrance
texts.Message_401200504: Yesterday was the last day for application reviews
texts.Message_401200505: Looks like there's going to be an unexpected expense tacked onto the end of the company bill this month...
texts.Option02_401200506: It's all the fault of those kindergarten kids from the Sunflower Class!
texts.Message_401200507: Well, at least as "Officer Mewmew," I earned the respect and admiration of those kids for the afternoon
texts.Message_401200508: What an unforgettable memory we share, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy

texts.Message_401200601: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy, I didn't see you at the Bardic Needle on Sixth Street yesterday
texts.Message_401200602: Did I get the place wrong? Maybe there's more than one music store on Sixth Street, or maybe the Bardic Needle has other branches elsewhere like a Coff Cafe franchise?
texts.Message_401200603: Maybe there's more than one Elfy...
texts.Message_401200604: In any case, I'm the one who didn't confirm the meeting place with you
texts.Message_401200605: Did you spend the afternoon waiting outside another music store for me?
texts.Message_401200606: Ugh, I'm getting worked up just thinking about it. I'm really sorry!
texts.Option01_401200607: It's not your fault. Don't take it to heart!
texts.Option02_401200607: Next time I'll definitely bring my playlist with me!
texts.Message_401200608: So long as you're not upset, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy. That's all that counts
texts.Message_401200609: Well, let's go together another time~

texts.Message_401200701: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy, yesterday I spent a long time outside the gadget store researching surprise box probability
texts.Message_401200702: After some thorough research, I was unable to work out the correct probability. You didn't arrive either
texts.Message_401200703: I used to think that your "being on time" was a hundred percent guaranteed. Who knew that even you would turn into a "surprise box" of your own one day...
texts.Option01_401200704: Sorry! I got caught up with something else!
texts.Option02_401200704: There was a sudden Hollow event!
texts.Message_401200705: I understand. For you, unexpected events are just like your beloved gacha
texts.Message_401200707: Life is also a series of surprise boxes. Any time, any place...
texts.Message_401200708: Then I'll save my chance to open a surprise box with {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy until next time

texts.Message_401200801: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy, I didn't see you at the cinema yesterday
texts.Message_401200802: Was there some kind of emergency? If so, I trust everything turned out ok?
texts.Message_401200803: I was a bit worried at first, but it's {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy we're talking about here, so I knew everything would be ok!
texts.Option01_401200804: I'm really sorry. I forgot what time we agreed on
texts.Option02_401200804: I ran into some unexpected trouble
texts.Message_401200805: I understand. You need to be really brave to put yourself out there and watch a movie together with someone!
texts.Message_401200806: There's always an accident waiting to happen somewhere in New Eridu
texts.Message_401200807: In any case, as long as you're ok, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy, that's all that matters
texts.Message_401200808: There'll always be more chances to watch more movies in the future!

texts.Message_401200901: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy, I waited a long time for you by the river yesterday...
texts.Message_401200902: There was a cold wind blowing, so I didn't bother sitting down...
texts.Message_401200903: Still, it wasn't as cold as my heart felt after I realized you weren't coming...
texts.Option01_401200904: I'm sorry! Something happened at work...
texts.Option02_401200904: Next time, I'll be the one waiting for you by the riverside!
texts.Message_401200905: It's alright, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy. I actually go walking along the riverside all the time by myself.
texts.Message_401200906: It's just a real pity that we couldn't chat
texts.Message_401200907: Let's take a raincheck for another day when you're free!

texts.Message_401201002: Roger, this is Ben Bigger. Over!
texts.Message_401201003: Phaethon, go ahead! You in urgent need of help?
texts.Message_401201004: The emergency engineering team is ready and waiting!
texts.Option01_401201005: What a shame. I just wanted to meet up with you
texts.Option02_401201005: I'm putting out an urgent commission... for Ben Bigger to come meet up with me!
texts.Message_401201006: Maintaining client relationships is usually a job for Anton and the President
texts.Message_401201007: But {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy is no ordinary client, of course
texts.Option01_401201009: Shall we go listen to some CDs at Elfy's music store?
texts.Option02_401201009: There's a new series of surprise boxes at the gadget store
texts.Message_401201010: I'll level with you, I'm in the Bardic Needles most weekends
texts.Message_401201011: Last time, I ordered a really rare record from Miss Elfy
texts.Message_401201012: If I'd known, I would've invited you to join me, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy.
texts.Option01_401201013: I want to see Elfy's playlist
texts.Option02_401201013: I'd like to see your playlist
texts.Message_401201015: Once I'm at Sixth Street, I'll knock on the door of your video store
texts.Message_401201017: The Box Galaxy on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_401201018: I remember now. The president mentioned a doll to me a couple of days ago
texts.Message_401201019: "It's fuzzy and soft to the touch, just like Ben's mane"
texts.Message_401201020: Perhaps they have one for sale?
texts.Message_401201022: Let me see... There's a bus to Sixth Street leaving in five minutes
texts.Message_401201024: It's rare to see you take it upon yourself to visit me, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy
texts.Message_401201025: As always, I'm surrounded by ledgers and reports
texts.Message_401201026: Have you brought any good news to save me?
texts.Option01_401201027: Does hanging out with me count as good news?
texts.Option02_401201027: Would it be any help if I invited you out?
texts.Message_401201028: Maintaining close communication with work partners is all part of the job
texts.Message_401201029: Such being the case, I'm sure if I shelve Grace's funding application for the time being
texts.Message_401201031: Have you got any particular destination in mind, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy?

texts.Option01_401201101: I've got an expense that needs reimbursing
texts.Message_401201103: {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy, did the president and the others damage your equipment during in-Hollow operations? Don't tell me it was Eous?
texts.Message_401201104: Please send the list of damaged equipment plus any cost details to my company email... I am terribly sorry...
texts.Option01_401201105: So gullible. Wanna come out for a walk with me?
texts.Option02_401201105: I'm just kidding. Are you free? Wanna come out?
texts.Message_401201108: Please don't joke around about that kind of stuff. I'm already in danger of putting the books in the red this month as it is
texts.Message_401201109: However, what there's plenty of is TIME to spend with you, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy. Where are we going?
texts.Option01_401201110: Wanna go listen to some CDs at Elfy's music store?
texts.Option02_401201110: There's a new series of surprise boxes at the gadget store
texts.Message_401201111: To be honest, I'm actually in the Bardic Needles most weekends
texts.Message_401201112: Last time, I ordered a really rare record from Miss Elfy
texts.Message_401201113: If I'd known, I would've invited you to join me, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy.
texts.Option01_401201114: I want to see Elfy's playlist
texts.Option02_401201114: I'd like to see your playlist
texts.Message_401201115: I look forward to it, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy
texts.Message_401201116: Once I'm at Sixth Street, I'll knock on the door of your video store
texts.Message_401201118: The Box Galaxy on Sixth Street?
texts.Message_401201119: I remember now, the President mentioned a doll to me two days ago
texts.Message_401201120: "It's fuzzy and soft to the touch, just like your mane"
texts.Message_401201121: Perhaps they have one for sale?
texts.Message_401201123: Let me see... There's a bus to Sixth Street leaving in five minutes
texts.Message_401201126: Give me a second to just staple in the last invoice
texts.Option01_401201128: Wanna go for a walk with me?
texts.Message_401201130: Let me just check the weather forecast and my meeting schedule

texts.Option02_401201201: Hey hey hey, you busy right now?
texts.Message_401201202: Roger, this is Ben Bigger. Over!
texts.Message_401201203: Phaethon, go ahead! You in urgent need of assistance?
texts.Message_401201204: The emergency engineering team is ready and waiting!
texts.Option01_401201205: What a shame. I just wanted to meet up with you
texts.Option02_401201205: I'm putting out an urgent commission... for Ben Bigger to come meet up with me!
texts.Message_401201206: Maintaining client relationships is usually a job for Anton and the President
texts.Message_401201207: But {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy is no ordinary client, of course
texts.Option01_401201209: Let's go to the cinema! There's a new movie out
texts.Message_401201210: I think the last time I went to the cinema was ages ago with Anton. He dragged me out to watch a re-release of Final Punch under the guise of "team building"
texts.Message_401201211: And then I came to discover... that niche movies are niche for a reason
texts.Message_401201212: But {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy's taste in movies sets me at ease
texts.Option01_401201213: You don't want to ever be too at ease
texts.Message_401201214: The Gravity Cinema on Lumina Square, right?
texts.Message_401201215: I'll head out once I finish the last of my caviar
texts.Message_401201218: Still haven't settled on a destination yet?
texts.Message_401201219: Well, there's this place I like to go after work when I want to relax
texts.Message_401201220: If work has been wearing you out recently, why not come take a stroll with me?
texts.Option02_401201221: I'm worn out every single day
texts.Message_401201222: It's over at Lumina Square. There's a viewing platform beside the river
texts.Message_401201224: Why don't you pick a time and we can meet over at the riverside trail
texts.Message_401201225: It's rare for you to be the first one to reach out, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} Proxy
texts.Message_401201226: As always, I'm surrounded by ledgers and reports

texts.Message_401201130: Let me just check the weather forecast and my meeting schedule

texts.Message_401201305: I was left with the distinct impression... that niche movies are niche for a reason
