texts.Message_401201309: I'll head out once I finish the last of my caviar
texts.Message_401201312: Still haven't settled on a destination yet?
texts.Message_401201313: There's a place where I often go to take a break whenever I finish up fieldwork near Lumina Square
texts.Message_401201314: If work has been wearing you out recently, why not come take a stroll with me?
texts.Option02_401201315: I'm worn out every single day
texts.Message_401201316: It's over at Lumina Square. There's a viewing platform beside the river
texts.Message_401201318: Why don't you pick a time and we can meet over at the riverside trail

texts.Option01_401400101: Dear attendant, do you have time for me today?
texts.Message_401400102: Please call me Lycaon. Allow me to check today's schedule...
texts.Message_401400103: I had some light work planned for today, but I can take care of it tomorrow.
texts.Message_401400104: For you, I always have time.
texts.Message_401400106: Of course. Have you got any places that you would recommend?
texts.Option01_401400107: How about the open space on the corner of Lumina Square?
texts.Message_401400108: Okay. I have been there before and it's very child-friendly. They have lots of equipment to play with there.
texts.Message_401400109: However, I have heard about an infestation of small mammals over there recently... Mostly stray cats and dogs, things like that.
texts.Message_401400110: We may need to bear this in mind.
texts.Option02_401400111: Do small mammals scare you, Lycaon?
texts.Message_401400112: So long as you like them, I'm happy.
texts.Message_401400113: So, let us meet at the open space on the corner of Lumina Square.
texts.Message_401400116: Of course not. I was just a little worried... But if it's okay with you, then that's fine.
texts.Message_401400118: It seems as though there are a few new movies out at the cinema... Would you like me to pre-book the tickets?
texts.Option01_401400119: Let's just pick once we get there!
texts.Option02_401400119: I'm not sure what I want to watch
texts.Message_401400121: Well then, I shall prepare in advance the refreshments necessary for your viewing pleasure.
texts.Message_401400122: You don't need to bring anything. Just bring yourself.
texts.Option01_401400123: I'll leave it to you, then
texts.Option02_401400123: I can always count on you, Lycaon!
texts.Message_401400124: We should meet up at Gravity Cinema. You can decide the time.
texts.Message_401400125: I'm here. What's the matter? Anything I can do for you?
texts.Option01_401400126: It's cool. I just wanted to hang out with you
texts.Option02_401400126: I just wanna hang out with you.
texts.Message_401400127: I see. I am free all day today
texts.Message_401400128: Is there anywhere you would like to go? Or anything you would like to do?

texts.Message_401400203: Feels like such a waste to stay in on a day like today, so I plan on going out.
texts.Option02_401400204: I'm getting ready to go out, too
texts.Message_401400205: In that case, let us take a stroll together.
texts.Message_401400206: Is there anywhere you want to go?
texts.Option01_401400207: How about the open space on the corner of Lumina Square?
texts.Message_401400208: Very well. I have been there before and it's got a certain childhood charm to it. There's also a lot of equipment there.
texts.Message_401400209: However, I have heard there are a lot of small mammals... Mostly stray cats and dogs, things like that.
texts.Message_401400210: We may need to bear this in mind.
texts.Option02_401400211: Are you afraid of small mammals, Lycaon?
texts.Message_401400212: So long as you like them, I'm happy.
texts.Message_401400213: So, let us meet at the open space on the corner of Lumina Square.
texts.Message_401400216: Of course not. I was just a little worried... But if it's okay with you, then that's fine.
texts.Message_401400218: It seems as though there are a few new movies out at the cinema... Would you like me to pre-book the tickets?
texts.Option01_401400219: Let's just pick once we get there!
texts.Option02_401400219: I'm not sure what I want to watch
texts.Message_401400221: Well then, I shall prepare the refreshments necessary for your viewing pleasure in advance.
texts.Message_401400222: You don't need to bring anything. Just bring yourself.
texts.Option01_401400223: I'll leave it to you, then
texts.Option02_401400223: I can always count on you, Lycaon!
texts.Message_401400224: We should meet up at Gravity Cinema. You can decide the time.
texts.Message_401400225: Hello. I am making a pot of coffee. I'm about to relax for a while and find something to read.
texts.Option01_401400227: Don't read. Come hang out instead
texts.Option02_401400227: Something has to have gone wrong for me to contact you?
texts.Message_401400228: It would be a pleasure. Is there anywhere you would prefer to go?
texts.Message_401400230: If you have some free time, we could do something together. Is there any place you would like to go?

texts.Option01_401400301: Dear attendant, do you have time for me today?
texts.Message_401400302: Please call me Lycaon. Allow me to check today's schedule...
texts.Message_401400303: I had some light work planned for today, but I can take care of it tomorrow.
texts.Message_401400304: For you, I always have time.
texts.Message_401400306: Of course. Have you got any places that you would recommend?
texts.Option01_401400307: How about going to the riverside trail near Lumina Square?
texts.Option02_401400307: {M#Come hang out at my place}{F#Come over here, then}!
texts.Message_401400308: The riverside trail at Lumina Square? There are usually a lot of tourists.
texts.Message_401400309: It is a popular scenic spot with beautiful views and is a perfect place for walking.
texts.Option02_401400310: Do you like walking there, too?
texts.Message_401400311: Mhm... Actually, I very much enjoy taking walks there.
texts.Message_401400312: So let's meet up at the riverside trail at Lumina Square.
texts.Message_401400313: If you could please settle on a specific time for us.
texts.Message_401400315: Yes, I sometimes walk along the riverside trail. The breeze feels very pleasant.
texts.Message_401400316: Do you mean the video store? Of course.
texts.Option01_401400317: It's not just the video store, it's my home
texts.Option02_401400317: I mean my room on the second floor of the video store
texts.Message_401400318: I see. I would be delighted to visit if you wouldn't mind.
texts.Message_401400319: Then I shall see you at the video store.
texts.Message_401400320: Please pick a time that is convenient for you
texts.Message_401400321: I'm here. What's the matter? Anything I can do for you?
texts.Option01_401400322: It's cool. I just wanted to hang out with you
texts.Option02_401400322: It's nothing. I just wanna meet up with you
texts.Message_401400323: I see. I am free all day today.
texts.Message_401400324: Is there anywhere you would like to go? Or anything you would like to do?

texts.Message_401400403: Feels like such a waste to stay in on a day like today, so I plan on going out.
texts.Option02_401400404: I'm getting ready to go out, too
texts.Message_401400405: In that case, let us take a stroll together.
texts.Message_401400406: Is there anywhere you want to go in particular?
texts.Option01_401400407: How about going to the riverside trail near Lumina Square?
texts.Option02_401400407: {M#Come hang out at my place}{F#Come over here, then}!
texts.Message_401400408: The riverside trail at Lumina Square? There are usually a lot of tourists.
texts.Message_401400409: It is a popular scenic spot with beautiful views and is a perfect place for walking.
texts.Option02_401400410: Do you like walking there, too?
texts.Message_401400411: Mhm... Actually, I very much enjoy taking walks there.
texts.Message_401400412: So let's meet up at the riverside trail at Lumina Square.
texts.Message_401400413: Let me know what time works best for you.
texts.Message_401400415: Yes, I sometimes walk along the riverside trail. The breeze is very pleasant.
texts.Message_401400416: Do you mean the video store? Of course.
texts.Option01_401400417: It's not just a video store
texts.Option02_401400417: It's the video store but upstairs on the 2nd floor
texts.Message_401400418: I see. I would be delighted to visit if you wouldn't mind.
texts.Message_401400419: Then I shall see you at the video store.
texts.Message_401400420: Please pick a time that is convenient for you.
texts.Message_401400421: Hello. I am making a pot of coffee. I'm about to relax for a while and find something to read.
texts.Option01_401400423: Don't read. Come hang out instead
texts.Option02_401400423: Something has to have gone wrong for me to contact you?
texts.Message_401400424: It would be a pleasure. Is there anywhere you would prefer to go?
texts.Message_401400426: If you have some free time, we could do something together. Is there any place you would like to go?

texts.Message_401400501: Forgive me, but I'd like to ask you a somewhat bizarre question...
texts.Message_401400502: Do you think the pocket watch I'm carrying... looks like a pocket watch?
texts.Option01_401400503: You bet. That's exactly what it looks like.
texts.Message_401400504: I'm relieved to hear you say so.
texts.Message_401400505: I was once stopped by a lady on the street who asked to borrow my pocket watch.
texts.Message_401400506: I thought she wanted to check the time, so I opened my pocket watch, and she was surprised by what she saw.
texts.Message_401400507: "Huh? I thought it was a compact makeup mirror," she said.
texts.Option01_401400508: Oh, so that's what you're actually carrying — a compact makeup mirror.
texts.Option02_401400508: It does look like a compact makeup mirror to me now...
texts.Message_401400509: I'm certain you know it isn't a compact makeup mirror. It is a pocket watch.
texts.Message_401400510: Though the interior of the pocket watch can sometimes reflect light so well that it can be used as a mirror...
texts.Message_401400511: Occasionally, I'll use it when combing my fur. Just occasionally.
texts.Message_401400512: Please rest assured, should you wish to know the time, I'm carrying a pocket watch, and not a compact makeup mirror.
texts.Message_401400513: Next time we meet, I'll show it to you in detail.
texts.Message_401400514: I see... You think so too.

texts.Message_401400602: I just helped a client locate his Bangboo that got lost in the Hollow.
texts.Message_401400603: The little Bangboo was the spitting image of your Bangboo, Eous. So I immediately thought of you.
texts.Message_401400604: Its legs were faulty, so it was unable to move.
texts.Message_401400605: I carried it in my arms while fending off the surrounding Ethereals as we exited the Hollow.
texts.Option02_401400606: Try carrying me next time there's a fight
texts.Message_401400608: I mainly use my legs to attack in combat, so using my free hands to carry a Bangboo isn't much of an issue.
texts.Message_401400609: Going back to that Bangboo. Once reunited, the client shed tears of joy.
texts.Message_401400610: It was a housekeeper Bangboo, but my client had long treated it like a member of the family.
texts.Message_401400611: That Bangboo is most lucky, to have such an owner.
texts.Message_401400613: In that way, I too, am lucky to have met you.
texts.Message_401400614: Do you mean when you enter the Hollow as Eous?
texts.Message_401400615: Very well. I presume as a Proxy, being carried around would make your job somewhat easier.
texts.Message_401400616: If it helps, I am happy to do so.

texts.Message_401400702: Sorry if I'm interrupting anything, but I need your help with something...
texts.Option01_401400703: Is it something personal or work-related?
texts.Message_401400704: It's a personal affair. I apologize if you're disappointed.
texts.Message_401400705: As you already know, my legs are completely mechanical.
texts.Option02_401400706: Are you thinking of getting more mechanical modifications done?
texts.Message_401400707: My apologies, it slipped my mind and I failed to inform you... Though, this isn't the crux of my issue today.
texts.Message_401400708: You see, I'm looking for the videotape of a film named "Final Punch." I heard that the protagonist of the story also has mechanical legs, so my curiosity was piqued.
texts.Message_401400709: When it comes to films, you're the first one that comes to mind. Do you have time to look for the videotape of "Final Punch" for me?
texts.Message_401400711: You have my most sincere gratitude. I'll wait for your call then.
texts.Message_401400712: That sounds like a great idea, but I have no such plans at the moment.

texts.Message_401400802: Sorry if I'm interrupting anything, but I just wanted to check if there are any updates on the search for the "Final Punch" videotape.
texts.Message_401400804: You really live up to your name as the best video store manager in New Eridu.
texts.Message_401400805: Thank you. I'll visit the store later to collect it.

texts.Message_401400902: Yesterday, I waited for quite some time at the open space on the corner of Lumina Square, but I did not see you.
texts.Message_401400903: If convenient, would you mind replying to my message?
texts.Message_401400907: So long as you are safe and well.
texts.Message_401400908: We can meet up another time when you are free.

texts.Message_401401001: I didn't see you at Gravity Cinema yesterday.
texts.Message_401401004: I am glad you merely forgot.
texts.Message_401401005: We can reschedule for another time.
texts.Message_401401006: Should you need, I can send you a reminder in advance the next time we meet.
texts.Message_401401007: It's okay. No need to apologize.

texts.Message_401401101: I waited a long time yesterday at Lumina Square riverside trail.
texts.Message_401401104: That's fine. It's just a bit of a shame that we couldn't meet.
texts.Message_401401105: We still have plenty of time to reschedule.
texts.Message_401401106: I see... That is a shame. How about I come and meet you next time?

texts.Message_401401202: Yesterday something urgent came up. I couldn't make it.
texts.Message_401401203: I hope you did not wait too long?
texts.Option01_401401204: It's fine. I wasn't home anyway
texts.Option02_401401204: Make it up to me next time
texts.Message_401401206: When you are free next time, we can reschedule.

texts.Message_401800101: There's something I'd like to ask you, it's about a videotape.
texts.Message_401800102: There's a movie called "Rookie's Guide to the Hollow," have you heard of it?
texts.Message_401800103: It's about a researcher from the old civilization who gets thrown into the era of the Hollow disaster due to a sudden research accident.
texts.Message_401800104: Back in the old days, it's called a movie about "time travel!"
texts.Option02_401800105: Didn't know you were into time travel movies, Grace.
texts.Message_401800106: No wonder Koleda said you were the best video store owners in all of New Eridu. Looks like the compliments were true.
texts.Message_401800107: So, can you help me find the "Rookie's Guide to the Hollow" tape? I'm itching to watch it.
texts.Message_401800110: Hmm? Do you think I only care about mechanical stuff?
texts.Message_401800111: Well, if you think that way then you're right — I only know this because Koleda told me.

texts.Message_401800201: Did you find the movie I mentioned earlier?
texts.Message_401800203: Thanks, your video store is really top-notch.
texts.Message_401800204: But I've been swamped at the site. Can I come pick it up later?
texts.Message_401800206: Okay, I try to come as soon as I can.

texts.Message_401800306: Hmm? Anything I can help you with?
texts.Option01_401800307: I just wanted to see you.
texts.Option02_401800307: I was going to ask you out.
texts.Message_401800308: If you had told me that earlier, I'd still be over the moon. Where to?
texts.Option01_401800309: How about I come to Brant Street Construction Site to find you?
texts.Option02_401800309: How about meeting at Bardic Needle?
texts.Message_401800314: Anyway, no backing out. See you at the site.
texts.Message_401800315: I'll let you pick a time.
texts.Message_401800319: The staff there is a beautiful android.
texts.Message_401800320: How do they create that distinctive lazy voice?
texts.Option01_401800322: What are you trying to do...?
texts.Option02_401800322: Are you thinking of taking her apart?
texts.Message_401800325: Would be kind of rude, wouldn't it?
texts.Message_401800327: Let's meet at Bardic Needle. When are you free?
texts.Message_401800328: It's me. Didn't you set a nickname for me?
texts.Option01_401800329: No, no, just wanted to hang out.
texts.Option02_401800329: No, I just wanted to ask you to hang out.
texts.Message_401800331: Sure. I'm running some experiment data right now. I can check out the results when I get back.

texts.Message_401800406: Hmm? Anything I can help you with?
texts.Option01_401800407: I just wanted to see you.
texts.Option02_401800407: I was going to ask you out.
texts.Message_401800408: If you had told me that earlier, I'd still be over the moon. Where to?
texts.Option01_401800409: Meet by the truck at Brant Street Construction Site.
texts.Option02_401800409: Come find me at the video store?
texts.Message_401800411: Don't worry. This time I won't make you do hard labor!
texts.Option02_401800412: I'll believe you one last time.
texts.Message_401800413: Really. Let's just do something relaxing.
texts.Message_401800414: So, meet by the Belobog truck? Pick a time.
texts.Message_401800417: You're not going to hide Eous away, are you?
texts.Message_401800420: When do you want me to come find you?
texts.Message_401800421: Don't worry. I'm here to see you, and I won't look at any other Bangboo.
texts.Message_401800422: It's me. Didn't you set a nickname for me?
texts.Option01_401800423: No, no, just wanted to hang out.
texts.Option02_401800423: No, I just wanted to ask you to hang out.
texts.Message_401800425: Sure. I'm running some experiment data right now. I can check out the results when I get back.

texts.Message_401800504: I'm fine. It's just that my experiment has hit a bottleneck.
texts.Message_401800505: I probably made them worry again... sigh.
texts.Message_401800508: Is there anywhere you wanna go?
texts.Option01_401800509: How about I come to Brant Street Construction Site to find you?
texts.Option02_401800509: How about meeting at Bardic Needle?
texts.Message_401800514: Anyway, no backing out. See you at the site.
texts.Message_401800515: I'll let you pick a time.
texts.Message_401800519: The staff there is a beautiful android.
texts.Message_401800520: How do they create that distinctive lazy voice?
texts.Option01_401800522: What are you trying to do...?
texts.Option02_401800522: Are you thinking of taking her apart?
texts.Message_401800525: Would be kind of rude, wouldn't it?
texts.Message_401800527: Let's meet at Bardic Needle. When are you free?
texts.Message_401800529: I just can't stand meetings. Why do I have to sit here when Ben could just email me the minutes?
texts.Message_401800530: Although I wouldn't read them either.
texts.Option01_401800531: Skip the meeting. Let's hang out.
texts.Option02_401800531: Finish the meeting and let's hang out.

texts.Message_401800604: I'm fine. It's just that my experiment has hit a bottleneck.
texts.Message_401800605: I probably made them worry again... sigh.
texts.Message_401800608: Is there anywhere you wanna go?
texts.Option01_401800609: Meet by the truck at Brant Street Construction Site.
texts.Option02_401800609: Come find me at the video store?
texts.Message_401800611: Don't worry. This time I won't make you do hard labor!
texts.Option02_401800612: I'll believe you one last time.
texts.Message_401800613: Really. Let's just do something relaxing.
texts.Message_401800614: So, meet by the Belobog truck? Pick a time.
texts.Message_401800617: You're not going to hide Eous away, are you?
texts.Message_401800620: When do you want me to come find you?
texts.Message_401800621: Don't worry. I'm here to see you, and I won't look at any other Bangboo.
texts.Message_401800623: I just can't stand meetings. Why do I have to sit here when they could just email me the minutes?
texts.Message_401800624: Although I wouldn't read them either.
texts.Option01_401800625: Skip the meeting. Let's hang out.
texts.Option02_401800625: Finish the meeting and let's hang out.

texts.Message_401800701: We had an appointment to help at the construction site yesterday.
texts.Message_401800704: We have a lot going on too.
texts.Message_401800705: It's taking up a lot of my experiment time...
texts.Message_401800706: If I don't get results because of this, I'll hold you accountable
texts.Message_401800707: ...Just kidding. I'm a researcher with pride.
texts.Message_401800708: Because you didn't come, I did double the workload.

texts.Message_401800802: Some mechanical research also needs a human control group.
texts.Message_401800803: I think you'd make a good test subject.
texts.Message_401800805: Even mu children wouldn't make such a basic mistake.
texts.Message_401800807: Apologies won't always solve everything for you.
texts.Message_401800808: This time I'll let it slide.
texts.Message_401800810: I'll consider studying your brain. Thoroughly.
texts.Message_401800811: You didn't forget... Then you must've skipped on purpose?

texts.Message_401800901: You didn't come to the site yesterday.
texts.Option02_401800903: I made it in my dream.
texts.Message_401800905: That's no good. Looks like you need a tune-up.
texts.Message_401800906: If it happens again, I'll help and give you some tweaks.

texts.Message_401801002: I waited for ages outside the video store.
texts.Message_401801003: If my children made such a mistake...
texts.Message_401801004: I'd dismantle them piece by piece and replace the faulty parts.
texts.Message_401801006: Good attitude. I'll forgive you this time.
texts.Message_401801007: This time I'll let it slide. Next time, keep your promise.
texts.Message_401801009: I'm not interested in dismantling humans.

texts.Message_401801101: Finally done with work on the site.
texts.Message_401801102: Oh, about the complaint call yesterday.
texts.Option02_401801105: Isn't it easier to just call on a cell phone?
texts.Message_401801106: But if I use my own cell, they would get my number.
texts.Message_401801107: Only family, friends, and colleagues have my number.
texts.Message_401801108: Suppliers don't fall under any of the three.
texts.Message_401801109: Cool, I'll see you then by the payphone!

texts.Message_401801205: I was busy at the site all day.
texts.Message_401801206: And totally forgot about the phone booth.
texts.Message_401801208: And hopefully we both show up this time.

texts.Message_402100101: Good evening, dear guide. This is Rina, chilling at the top of the mountain.
texts.Option01_402100102: At the top of the mountain?
texts.Option02_402100102: What are you doing up there at night?
texts.Message_402100103: Because I'm working now. My employer and I are heading to the summit.
texts.Option02_402100104: Aren't you together with your employer?
texts.Message_402100105: Well, my employer... is probably halfway up the mountain.
texts.Message_402100106: After all, it takes a while to climb those 500 steps.
texts.OptionLong01_402100107: 500 steps? How did you manage to outpace your employer by so much? Wait... how could you leave your employer behind and go to the top alone?
texts.Option02_402100107: How could you leave your employer behind like that?
texts.OptionLong02_402100107: 500 steps? How did you manage to outpace your employer by so much? Wait... how could you leave your employer behind and go to the top alone?
texts.Message_402100108: Well, technically, I didn't leave him behind. It was his order.
texts.Message_402100109: He actually challenged me to a race to the top, thinking he could beat me physically.
texts.Message_402100110: After I turned him down a few times, he got mad and changed the plan from "climbing together" to "racing to the top."
texts.Message_402100111: Well, I had to do what he ordered, so I went all out and flew to the summit.
texts.Option01_402100112: I kinda feel bad for your employer.
texts.OptionLong01_402100112: Somehow, I kinda feel bad for your employer.
texts.OptionLong02_402100112:
I'm so jealous. If only Eous could fly in the Hollows it would make pathfinding a breeze...
Perhaps you can carry Eous and fly around, Rina?
texts.Message_402100113: That can be arranged, if that's what you want, dear guide. Maybe I'll ask Drusilla and Anastella to carry Eous flying around or something...
texts.Message_402100114: Oh, I think I hear my employer yelling for me. Now please excuse me, dear guide. Wish you all the best.

texts.Message_402100201: Good evening, dear guide. Mind if I throw a random question at you?
texts.Message_402100202: Would you ever skip watching a movie just because there's an actor you dislike?
texts.OptionLong01_402100203: Oh, absolutely! I wouldn't even stock that movie in my store!
texts.OptionLong02_402100203: No, I'd consider whether the movie itself is worth watching.
texts.OptionLong01_402100205: As expected? What do you mean by that?
texts.Option02_402100205: What do you mean by that?
texts.OptionLong02_402100205: As expected? What do you mean by that?
texts.Message_402100206: You know, it's interesting that {M#Belle}{F#Wise} said the same thing when I asked {M#her}{F#him} earlier.
texts.Message_402100207: {M#She}{F#He} predicted your answer exactly as what you said.
texts.Option01_402100208: It's not a big deal at all.
texts.OptionLong01_402100208: It's not a big deal at all. I could have guessed that too!
texts.Option02_402100208: I could have guessed that too...
texts.OptionLong02_402100208: It's not a big deal at all. I could have guessed that too!
texts.Message_402100210: Your tacit understanding is amazing. Guess this only happens between close peers.
texts.OptionLong01_402100211: I admit that... {M#Belle}{F#Wise} knows me inside out. We're totally in sync.
texts.OptionLong02_402100211: I admit that... {M#Belle}{F#Wise} knows me inside out. We're totally in sync.
texts.Message_402100212: So, does that mean you admit to all the embarrassing things {M#she}{F#he} said about you?
texts.Message_402100214: Oops, sorry! I promised not to spill the beans.
texts.Option01_402100215: Hold on! Tell me more about it!
texts.Option02_402100215: Hold on! What do you even mean by that?
texts.Message_402100216: Alas, it's almost bedtime for me. Have to go tuck myself in! Good night!

texts.Message_402100302: Perfect timing. I just finished my work for the day, so I'm free now. How can I help you, dear guide?
texts.Message_402100304: Oh, I'd be happy to help. Where would you like to go?
texts.Option01_402100305: How about the hot pot restaurant, Simmer?
texts.Message_402100306: A splendid idea! Actually, I was thinking about that place too. They have a lot of dishes I haven't tried yet, so I'm down to explore their menu.
texts.Message_402100307: Then let's meet up at the hot pot restaurant. By the way, can you handle spicy food, dear guide?
texts.Option01_402100308: Yeah, I'm a total spice warrior!
texts.Option02_402100308: No, spicy stuff is not my thing.
texts.Message_402100309: I see. We'll decide on the spiciness level when we meet up. Feel free to pick the time that works for you.
texts.Message_402100311: Oh, you don't have to go to a coffee shop if you want coffee. I can make a cup for you myself.
texts.Option01_402100312: Well, it's more about the vibe.
texts.Option02_402100312: Well, the main idea is to hang out and have a good time.
texts.Message_402100313: I get what you mean. While coffee can be enjoyed anywhere, a coffee shop has that unique atmosphere for a nice chat.
texts.Message_402100314: I see. There are many Coff Cafe branches here. Which one should we go?
texts.Option01_402100315: Let's go to the one at Lumina Square.
texts.Message_402100316: Perfect! Just let me know the time that works for you.

texts.Message_402100402: I'm busy with something now. What's up, dear guide?
texts.Option01_402100403: No worries if you're busy now. We can catch up another time.
texts.Option02_402100403: No worries if you're busy now. I'll ask you out next time.
texts.Message_402100404: Don't worry. I've got a flexible schedule. I believe your matters are more important than mine. So, please feel free to spill the beans.
texts.Option01_402100405: Yeah, it's very important! I wanted to ask you out and have a blast!
texts.Option02_402100405: Well, it's not important at all. I just wanted to ask you out and have some fun.
texts.Message_402100406: Sure thing! I've got plenty of time today. Any particular place you have in mind?
texts.Option01_402100407: How about the hot pot restaurant, Simmer?
texts.Message_402100408: A splendid idea! Actually, I was thinking about that place too. They have a lot of dishes I haven't tried yet, so I'm down to explore their menu.
texts.Message_402100409: Then let's meet up at the hot pot restaurant. By the way, can you handle spicy food, dear Guide?
texts.Option01_402100410: Yeah, I'm a total spice warrior!
texts.Option02_402100410: No, spicy stuff is not my thing.
texts.Message_402100411: I see. We'll decide on the spiciness level when we meet up. Feel free to pick the time that works for you.

texts.Option01_402100417: Let's go to the one at Lumina Square.
texts.Message_402100418: Perfect! Just let me know the time that works for you.

texts.Message_402100502: Perfect timing. I just finished my work for the day, so I'm free now. How can I help you, dear guide?
texts.Message_402100504: Oh, I'd be happy to help. Where would you like to go?
texts.OptionLong01_402100505: How about another round with Asha at the arcade?
texts.Option02_402100505: Where do you feel like going?
texts.OptionLong02_402100505: I don't have any specific plans. Where do you feel like going?
texts.Message_402100506: Well, you've got me hyped about winning now. I remember I made a promise to beat her once, fair and square.
texts.Message_402100507: So, when should we meet up? I'm not sure about the arcade's opening hours, so I'll leave that to you, dear guide.
texts.Message_402100509: If I were to choose... I'd go for Random Play!
texts.Option01_402100510: Our store? What's the fun in that...
texts.Option02_402100510: Why would you want to hang out at our store?
texts.Message_402100511: Well, to be honest, I've always wanted to visit your store.
texts.Message_402100514: Hmm? Is that a weird idea?
texts.Option01_402100515: No, I'm just a bit surprised.
texts.OptionLong01_402100515: No, I'm just a bit surprised that something so awesome is happening... the head maid of Victoria Housekeeping Co. offering to clean our store!
texts.Option02_402100515: It sounds too good to be true.
texts.OptionLong02_402100515: No, I'm just a bit surprised that something so awesome is happening... the head maid of Victoria Housekeeping Co. offering to clean our store!
texts.Message_402100516: Well, typically, Victoria Housekeeping Co. only caters to high-end clients for housekeeping services.
texts.Message_402100517: So, this is a totally personal offer. I, Alexandrina Sebastiane, am excited to help you improve your living space.
texts.Message_402100518: How about you pick a time? I'll swing by your store armed with all the cleaning gear!

texts.Option02_402100601: Hey, Rina! Do you have any plans for today?
texts.Message_402100602: I'm busy with something now. What's up, dear guide?
texts.Option01_402100603: No worries if you're busy now. We can catch up another time.

texts.Message_402100701: Morning, dear guide. There's a small matter that I'd like your assistance with~
texts.Message_402100702: My client this time is looking for this song that she remembers from her childhood. She can't remember what it is called, all she can do is hum the part of the melody
texts.Message_402100703: I asked around at a lot of music stores. In the end, it was Miss Elfy over the road from you guys who gave me a lead
texts.Message_402100704: She mentioned that it might not be a song from an album, but instead could be an advert jingle
texts.OptionLong01_402100705: Understood. So you're interested in videotapes with adverts, right?
texts.Option02_402100705: So you want to know about videotapes with adverts, right?
texts.OptionLong02_402100705: Understood. So you're interested in videotapes with adverts, right?
texts.Message_402100706: Yes! I knew you'd be able to help. So do they even make those kinds of videotapes? A collection of advert jingles
texts.OptionLong01_402100707: I've got a videotape called Black LP Player that should meet your needs
texts.Option02_402100707: Black LP Player should be the one
texts.OptionLong02_402100707: I've got a videotape called Black LP Player that should meet your needs
texts.Message_402100708: Fantastic. Could you please let me know if you have a copy of Black LP Player at your store?
texts.Message_402100709: If you do, I'd like to rent it out and listen to every single jingle~
texts.Message_402100711: Thanks! Hope to hear back from you soon

texts.Message_402100801: Morning, dear guide. I'll be passing through Sixth Street today
texts.Option02_402100802: We've got that videotape that you were looking for
texts.Message_402100803: Ah, I didn't even have to say anything. Took the words right out of my mouth.
texts.Message_402100804: I feel like we understand each other almost as well as Drusilla and Anastella~
texts.Option01_402100805: The pleasure is all mine! Are you coming over?
texts.Option02_402100805: Are you going to come grab it now?
texts.Message_402100806: Mhm, I'll be there soon. Thanks a lot

texts.OptionLong01_402100902: Rats! I forgot about the medicine!
texts.Option02_402100902: Sorry, I forgot about the medicine!
texts.OptionLong02_402100902: Sorry, I forgot about the medicine!
texts.Message_402100903: That's alright. When you didn't come over yesterday, I thought you must be busy with other things, so I went over to the pharmacy myself. It's no big deal. Don't worry about it~
texts.Message_402100904: I wanted to talk about that teamilk shop and their event. I was careless yesterday, and Corin didn't only want to take a selfie with me. She actually also wanted one together with you~
texts.Option01_402100905: If she wants to take a selfie with me...
texts.OptionLong01_402100905: If it's a selfie she wants, I'm free anytime!
texts.OptionLong02_402100905: If it's a selfie she wants, I'm free anytime!
texts.Message_402100906: Sure, I'll pass that on. I'm sure there'll be lots more chances in the future
texts.Message_402100907: Next time we bump into each other, you must take a lot of photos, dear guide~

texts.Message_402101001: Morning, dear guide. I was looking for you all night last night. Don't tell me you were captured by "Ahriman of the Ballet Twins"~
texts.Option02_402101002: Sorry, I got sidetracked by something else
texts.Message_402101003: I see. That's the way it is. This doesn't seem like the kind of thing that can be gotten to the bottom of any time soon. I'll keep going there and investigating. Don't worry about this one, dear guide~

texts.Message_402101101: Morning, dear guide. How about that hot pot?
texts.Message_402101103: If you can't make it next time, please at least try to DM me about it. That way I'll know not to order the Mandarin Duck soup base~

texts.Message_402101201: Dear guide, I hung around until the coffee shop closed but I didn't see you there.
texts.Option02_402101202: Did you really wait until it closed?
texts.Message_402101203: Just kidding~ But I really did wait for a very long time. Did you get caught up with something else, Manager?
texts.Option02_402101204: Actually I did get caught up with something...
texts.Message_402101205: It's ok. Let's meet up somewhere that's a little more convenient for you next time, like... the coffee shop on Sixth Street?

texts.Message_402101301: Dear guide, you didn't come by the arcade yesterday
texts.Message_402101303: Lucky for me, Asha was free, so we fought tooth and nail for ages
texts.Message_402101305: Utter defeat. Without you there cheering me on, I felt overwhelmed just by her aura. They don't call her Queen Soul Hounds III for nothing~
texts.Option02_402101306: I'll definitely be there to cheer you on next time!

texts.Message_402101401: Morning, dear guide. I came by the store yesterday but you seemed pretty busy.
texts.Option02_402101402: Sorry! I couldn't give you my full attention
texts.Message_402101403: That's fine. The whole point in coming by was to help you tidy up, so seeing as you didn't have time to spare, I went ahead and took it upon myself~
texts.Message_402101404: I inspected your working environment. You've done a great job at keeping it clean and tidy
texts.Message_402101406: While there weren't many customers about, I tidied up some of the places I thought needed a cleaning. As for everywhere else, I'll come back and give it a proper go again when I have the chance~

texts.Message_402400101: Hello, I'm Zhu Yuan from Public Security. Are you the manager of the Random Play video store?
texts.Option02_402400102: It has nothing to do with me I didn't do anything
texts.Message_402400103: ? Please don't lie to an officer. I just verified that this is your Knock Knock ID.
texts.Message_402400104: This is my personal account, and it's not an official inquiry. Please stay calm.
texts.Option01_402400105: Um... I'm just a bit shocked.
texts.OptionLong01_402400105: It's nothing, just a bit surprised that a PubSec officer would take the time to care for small folks like us...
texts.Option02_402400105: It was just kind of scary...
texts.OptionLong02_402400105: It just felt kind of scary. You know, in most cases, getting a message from a PubSec officer isn't good news...
texts.Message_402400106: Please don't say that. I just hope to keep in touch with you...
texts.Message_402400107: You make it sound like PubSec officers are harbingers of door.

texts.Message_402400201: Is there a way to make all the red dots on the app icons disappear at once? Opening the apps one by one is a real hassle.
texts.Option01_402400202: You can turn off the notifications in settings.
texts.Option02_402400202: You can turn them off. Don't you know that?
texts.Message_402400203: I know, but then I wouldn't get notifications at all, and you wouldn't be able to know when something truly amazing happens.
texts.Message_402400204: Last time, I missed registration for a class I really wanted to take, because I turned off the notifications... So I turned it back on.
texts.Option01_402400205: You could also try ignoring the red dots...
texts.Option02_402400205: You might just have to get used to it...
texts.Message_402400206: Easier said than done. You know me.
texts.Option02_402400207: Nope.          I've known you for        aaaaaaages!
texts.Message_402400208: Please speak properly, or I'll block you.

texts.Message_402400302: Are you on duty right now?
texts.Message_402400303: I'm free. And please, just call me Zhu Yuan. "Officer" sounds a little...
texts.Message_402400304: I just got off work. Is something wrong?
texts.Message_402400305: Would you like me to join you in inspecting New Eridu?
texts.Message_402400306: As an officer, you have to get to know the public more. Want to tag along?
texts.Message_402400307: You just want to hang out, don't you? There's no need to beat around the bush...
texts.Message_402400308: You just want to hang out, don't you? Just say so, no need for "community engagement" excuses
texts.Message_402400309: You're sharp as a tack, ma'am
texts.Message_402400312: Call me by my name properly; there's no need for all this back-and-forth formal addressing. I can go with you
texts.Message_402400316: The hotpot restaurant at Lumina Square?
texts.Message_402400317: Is there an event going on over there lately?
texts.Message_402400320: Is it the kind with cosplay? Sounds packed...
texts.Message_402400322: Probably, do you not like events like that?
texts.Message_402400323: I do, I'd actually like to go. By the way, what kind of person do you think I am?
texts.Message_402400324: Pick a time that works for you
texts.Message_402400326: Oh, I saw online that place is really popular
texts.Message_402400328: They say it's really good, the real deal
texts.Message_402400329: When I patrolled, the line stretched for blocks. Not sure how long we'd wait. I saw the line extending to the next block. I wonder how long the wait will be
texts.Message_402400330: Let's try our luck. If not, we can eat somewhere else
texts.Message_402400331: There's plenty of good hotpot places around there
texts.Message_402400333: So you can pick a time?

texts.Message_402400403: Yeah, I'm just wrapping up a big bust
texts.Message_402400404: I won't go into details, but you'll see it on the news soon. Hmm...
texts.Message_402400407: Ugh... I just feel bad for the victims
texts.Message_402400408: That's why I've been in a bad mood lately
texts.Message_402400411: Thanks, Manager. Why don't you pick a place?
texts.Message_402400316: The hotpot restaurant at Lumina Square?
texts.Message_402400414: You want to watch a movie? Ah...
texts.Message_402400416: Hmm? What's wrong with a movie?
texts.Message_402400417: No, let's watch one. I don't mind
texts.Message_402400419: Why do I feel like I'm forcing you?
texts.Message_402400420: I said I don't mind. Let's watch one!
texts.Message_402400421: You pick the movie. You're the expert
texts.Message_402400326: Oh, I saw online that place is really popular
texts.Message_402400328: They say it's really good, the real deal
texts.Message_402400329: When I patrolled, the line stretched for blocks. Not sure how long we'd wait. I saw the line extending to the next block. I wonder how long the wait will be
texts.Message_402400330: Let's try our luck. If not, we can eat somewhere else
texts.Message_402400331: There's plenty of good hotpot places around there
texts.Message_402400333: So you can pick a time?

texts.Message_402400501: You didn't show up yesterday. Was our appointment not important to you?
texts.Option02_402400502: It's important! Let me make it up to you.
texts.Message_402400503: Just kidding. The line was long, so I didn't wait long and left.
texts.Message_402400504: We can do this again when you have time.

texts.Message_402400601: Since you didn't come, I watched a movie alone.
texts.Message_402400603: It's not that serious. I'll only give you a demerit.
texts.Message_402400604: How could I refuse that? Plus I also agree you owe me one.
texts.Message_402400605: But honestly, that movie wasn't great.
texts.Message_402400606: Next time, I'll go with your recommendation. Let's hang out next time.

texts.Message_402400701: Manager? Are you okay? You didn't show up yesterday. I was worried something happened or you were sick...
texts.Option02_402400702: Sorry, something came up last minute!
texts.Message_402400703: I see. As long as you're okay. Now I can be mad. Wasting an officer's time is a punishable offense, you know?
texts.Message_402400705: Just kidding, everyone's busy. But if you're sincerely apologizing, don't stand me up next time.

texts.Message_402400801: That was the perfect opportunity to catch Mewmew, Manager!
texts.Message_402400802: That spot was ideal. Don't know when we'll get another chance.
texts.Option01_402400803: Sorry, something came up that day.
texts.Message_402400804: Still, it's a pity. We were so close to the truth. But there will be more chances to catch Mewmew when it's on duty.
texts.Message_402400805: Let's check back in a few days.

texts.Message_402400901: I knew it. Those who hide their true nature with their cute appearances can't be trusted!
texts.Message_402400903: Yesterday, I was going to report that I won't be participating in this year's Suspect Mewmew. They asked how far along I was?
texts.Message_402400904: So I said, after learning Mewmew's rules of inheritance, I had to give up.
texts.Message_402400905: My boss looked at me like, "Rules of inheritance? What's that?"
texts.Option01_402400906: So Mewmew pulled a fast one on you!
texts.Message_402400907: "I never thought our elite, the pride of our Criminal Investigation Special Response Team, would also fall to Mewmew~--"
texts.Message_402400908: I got roasted by every department...
texts.Message_402400909: Darn it. Next year, I'll show everyone that cat's true colors.

texts.Message_402401001: Your Mission Imperfect failed again, Manager...
texts.Message_402401003: Yeah. Got points deducted by the consultant again. Reason being —
texts.Message_402401004: "Perfectionist tendencies are somewhat controlled, but clearly corrected out of perfectionist tendencies."
texts.Message_402401006: I feel like you, Qingyi and the consultant are all in this together.
texts.Message_402401007: Are there any truly trustworthy companions left in this world...?

texts.Message_402401101: Someone recommended a comedy detective movie to me. Sound familiar to you by any chance?
texts.Option02_402401102: Can you give me more keywords?
texts.Message_402401103: Hmm, it's about a down-and-out detective who starts experiencing strange consciousness gaps, and suddenly his case-solving rate skyrockets?
texts.Message_402401104: Oh, and there's a kid! Strange things start happening after the detective adopts a child.
texts.Message_402401105: Is it really a comedy? Putting it like that makes it sound pretty scary.
texts.Option01_402401106: I think I know what it is. Let me check what we have.

texts.Message_402401201: How about the videotape we talked about earlier?
texts.Option02_402401202: It's called "More Than One Truth," right?
texts.Message_402401203: I'm not sure. I only remember the cover... a man with an extravagant hairstyle?
texts.Option02_402401204: This movie is known for its bizarre hairstyles.
texts.Message_402401205: You're truly reliable, Manager. When can I come to get the tape?
texts.Option02_402401206: I've put it aside for you. Come by anytime.
texts.Message_402401207: Why are you being so polite all of a sudden? Alright, thank you.

texts.Message_4024013_01: Manager, I'm guessing you forgot about the concert yesterday?
texts.Message_4024013_02: Something more important came up... so...
texts.Message_4024013_04: It's fine if something else came up, but please could you DM me next time if it happens again?
texts.Message_4024013_05: Did you really forget? Alright, I'll send you a reminder in advance next time
texts.Message_4024013_06: That concert's running for a while, let's arrange to go again when we're free

texts.Option01_402500101: Qingyi, could you please help me run a probability?
texts.Option02_402500101: There's something I'm unsure about... could you please calculate the success rate for me?
texts.Option01_402500103: What's the chance you will agree to hang out with me?
texts.Option02_402500103: How likely is it that you will come out and hang with me?
texts.Message_402500106: Well thats just leaving a little space to keep things professional and authentic
texts.Message_402500107: You cant have a madeup number thats a perfect round number its common sense
texts.Message_402500108: Since the chance is so high why dont you pick a spot manager Im good with anywhere
texts.Option01_402500109: How about Box Galaxy for some gadgets?
texts.Option02_402500109: The hotpot restaurant at Lumina Square?
texts.Message_402500110: Interesting choice not really my style
texts.Option01_402500111: If you don't like it, we can think of somewhere else
texts.Message_402500112: Oh no dont get me wrong I meant I like trying new things its fun
texts.Message_402500113: Ive always wanted to check that place out but it seemed too trendy and cool for me
texts.Message_402500114: If youd go with me that would be great
texts.Option02_402500115: Sounds good, I'll meet you there
texts.Message_402500118: I heard the hot pot restaurant is running a promotion and its really popular
texts.Option01_402500119: It's the "Very Very Very Spicy Challenge"!
texts.Option02_402500119: It's a level of spiciness no human can survive...
texts.Message_402500120: Oh I saw that if you can eat ten bites of the very very very spicy meat slices its on the house
texts.Message_402500121: Manager you are not actually going to make me help you win that challenge right
texts.Message_402500122: You are just a little cheater arent you
texts.Message_402500124: Dont try to win me over with your emojis
texts.Message_402500125: Alright alright Ill do it when are you free

texts.Option01_402500201: Qingyi, Qingyi, guess what I'm thinking about?
texts.Option02_402500201: I'm curious, Qingyi. Can you guess what I'm thinking right now?
texts.Message_402500202: Oh this is fun based on the data from our previous interactions
texts.Message_402500203: You want me to come hang out right
texts.Message_402500206: Surprised huh I did think about playing dumb for a second there
texts.Message_402500207: But I think you are the type who always wants me to speak my mind so I didnt
texts.Option02_402500208: You can be direct with me, always!
texts.Message_402500209: I knew it so where do you want to go
texts.Option01_402500210: How about Box Galaxy for some gadgets?
texts.Option02_402500210: The hotpot restaurant at Lumina Square?
texts.Message_402500211: Interesting choice not really my style
texts.Option01_402500212: If you don't like it, we can think of somewhere else
texts.Message_402500213: Oh no dont get me wrong I meant I like trying new things its fun
texts.Message_402500214: Ive always wanted to check that place out but it seemed too trendy and cool for me
texts.Message_402500215: If youd go with me that would be great
texts.Option02_402500216: Sounds good, I'll meet you there
texts.Message_402500219: I heard the hot pot restaurant is running a promotion and its really popular
texts.Option01_402500220: It's the "Very Very Very Spicy Challenge!"
texts.Option02_402500220: It's a level of spiciness no human can survive...
texts.Message_402500221: Oh I saw that if you can eat ten bites of the very very very spicy meat slices its on the house
texts.Message_402500222: Manager you are not actually going to make me help you win that challenge right
texts.Message_402500223: You are just a little cheater arent you
texts.Message_402500225: Dont try to win me over with your emojis
texts.Message_402500226: Alright alright Ill do it when are you free

texts.Option01_402500301: Qingyi, could you please help me run a probability?
texts.Option02_402500301: There's something I'm unsure about... could you please calculate the success rate for me?
texts.Option01_402500303: What's the chance you will agree to hang out with me?
texts.Option02_402500303: How likely is it that you will come out and hang with me?
texts.Message_402500306: Well thats just leaving a little space to keep things professional and authentic
texts.Message_402500307: You cant have a madeup number thats a perfect round number its common sense
texts.Message_402500308: Since the chance is so high why dont you pick a spot manager Im good with anywhere
texts.Option02_402500309: There's an antique store at Lumina Square called Buyan
texts.Message_402500310: Oh the record store on Sixth Street
texts.Message_402500311: Perfect theres this record Ive been looking for but I just cant find it online
texts.Message_402500312: Maybe they will have it there
texts.Option01_402500313: Elfy has all kinds of rare stuff!
texts.Option02_402500313: If Elfy doesn't have it, then it doesn't exist!
texts.Message_402500314: Very well lets go check it out then
texts.Message_402500315: Just let me know when Im flexible
texts.Message_402500317: Do you like antiques manager you really dont have to go out of your way for me
texts.Option01_402500318: I'm curious, plus if there's something I don't understand, you can explain it to me
texts.Option02_402500318: I think going with you would make it extra special
texts.Message_402500319: Okay but Im not really much of a teacher so dont give me too much credit
texts.Message_402500320: Okay but you make me sound like Im some kind of immortal vampire thats been around for centuries
texts.Option01_402500321: My bad! You're clearly a beautiful young lady!
texts.Option02_402500321: My apologies, beautiful young lady officer!
texts.Message_402500322: Thats a bit much but fine I will let it slide
texts.Message_402500323: Alright then lets pick a time and go check it out

texts.Option01_402500401: Qingyi, Qingyi, guess what I'm thinking about?
texts.Option02_402500401: I'm curious, Qingyi. Can you guess what I'm thinking right now?
texts.Message_402500402: Oh this is fun based on the data from our previous interactions
texts.Message_402500403: You want me to come hang out right
texts.Message_402500406: Surprised huh I did think about playing dumb for a second there
texts.Message_402500407: But I think you are the type who always wants me to speak my mind so I didnt
texts.Option02_402500408: You can be direct with me, always!
texts.Message_402500409: I knew it so where do you want to go
texts.Option02_402500410: There's an antique store at Lumina Square called Buyan
texts.Message_402500411: Oh the record store on Sixth Street
texts.Message_402500412: Perfect theres this record Ive been looking for but I just cant find it online
texts.Message_402500413: Maybe they will have it there

texts.Option02_402500414: If Elfy doesn't have it, then it doesn't exist!
texts.Message_402500415: Very well lets go check it out then
texts.Message_402500416: Just let me know when Im flexible
