texts.Option01_402500419: I'm curious, plus if there's something I don't understand, you can explain it to me
texts.Option02_402500419: I think going with you would make it extra special
texts.Message_402500420: Okay but Im not really much of a teacher so dont give me too much credit
texts.Message_402500421: Okay but you make me sound like Im some kind of immortal vampire thats been around for centuries
texts.Option01_402500422: My bad! You're clearly a beautiful young lady!
texts.Option02_402500422: My apologies, beautiful young lady officer!
texts.Message_402500423: Thats a bit much but fine I will let it slide
texts.Message_402500424: Alright then lets pick a time and go check it out

texts.Message_402500501: Whats it like to feel itchy
texts.Option02_402500503: You're better off not knowing that feeling
texts.Message_402500505: I dont have this sensory module apparently the scientist who designed my neural reflex system had strong feelings about it
texts.Message_402500506: They say that after weeks of overtime she finally got a day off but was driven mad by a few mosquitoes
texts.Message_402500507: So naturally she made it so I cant feel itchiness and gave me advanced mosquito targeting capabilities
texts.Message_402500508: Despite the fact that mosquitoes cant even bite me what a silly little gimmick
texts.Option01_402500509: Yeah, that's really gimmicky. I don't attract mosquitoes much either.
texts.Option02_402500509: It's not gimmicky! Please help me kill mosquitoes in the summer! I'm begging you!!!
texts.Message_402500510: Right but Zhu Yuan seems to attract them so she bugs me all summer to help her kill them
texts.Message_402500511: Sure I might not always be around but when I am you dont have to worry about mosquitoes
texts.Message_402500512: Really so you feel the same way too

texts.Option02_402500602: Qingyi, you figured out how to use punctuation marks!
texts.Message_402500603: Spaces are usually enough plus my training data set was in ancient texts which dont have punctuation
texts.Option01_402500604: So what does "knock knock knock" mean?
texts.Option02_402500604: What's the secret code "knock knock knock?"
texts.Message_402500605: Not "knock knock knock" its "knock— knock knock"
texts.Option01_402500606: Knock-knock jokes are usually just two knocks, you know...
texts.Option02_402500606: I know this one! It's "D" in Morse Code!
texts.Message_402500607: A midnight knock knock is more of a horror story than a joke isnt it
texts.Message_402500608: Its the night watchs signal while on duty it makes me feel like an oldtimey watchman
texts.Message_402500610: I guess kids nowadays just wouldnt understand
texts.Message_402500611: Ah anyway dry weather so be careful with fire
texts.Message_402500612: Not bad you are pretty quick at searching answers online but unfortunately thats not it
texts.Message_402500613: Uh Ive always known how but ancient textx dont use punctuation so Im used to it besides spaces work just fine

texts.Message_402500701: Yesterday since you didnt come I didnt go into the store either
texts.Option01_402500702: I'm so sorry! I didn't mean to!
texts.Message_402500704: I just stood outside that shop and felt really awkward
texts.Option01_402500705: Let me make it up to you!
texts.Message_402500706: Without you there I really couldnt bring myself to go into that store lets go together next time

texts.Option01_402500802: Ahhhh! We were supposed to hang out yesterday!
texts.Option02_402500802: I didn't forget. Something else came up...
texts.Message_402500803: Well I saw a long line and didnt stick around
texts.Message_402500804: Its okay we can go next time

texts.Message_402500901: Since you didnt come I went to the music store by myself
texts.Option01_402500902: Did you find what you were looking for?
texts.Option02_402500902: Did you get the record you wanted?
texts.Message_402500903: Elfy is a real pro but I still couldnt find it
texts.Message_402500904: Im starting to worry it doesnt exist just like you said
texts.Option01_402500905: No way! We'll find it together next time!
texts.Option02_402500905: My bad. Let's go look for it together next time?

texts.Message_402501001: So what should your punishment be for standing me up
texts.Option02_402501002: Ah, I was really busy yesterday, I forgot to text you to cancel our plan
texts.Option02_402501004: Please forgive me! I know you have sympathy in your heart!
texts.Message_402501005: Just kidding we can just reschedule
texts.Message_402501006: My language module suggests I should be angry now

texts.Message_402501101: No leads here how about you
texts.Message_402501103: Looks like the cat likes you I knew it

texts.Message_402501203: It seems to think Im a cushion and has been sleeping on me for a while
texts.Message_402501204: I dont want to wake her I cant move can you help Im at the same place where we split
texts.Option02_402501205: Don't move, I'll be right there!

texts.Message_402501301: That case we were working on went smoothly
texts.Message_402501302: With undeniable evidence the suspect confessed quickly
texts.Message_402501304: I kind of want to recruit her and went back to see her a few times but unfortunately she seems to love her freedom
texts.Message_402501305: Plus a lot of people in that area take good care of the cats so I dont want to force it
texts.Option01_402501306: Let's go visit her together next time
texts.Option02_402501306: It can be nice to have a little distance too
texts.Message_402501307: Mhm Zhu Yuan doesnt like cats so I will need your company manager
texts.Message_402501308: True a noble friendship is as calm as water

texts.Message_402501401: About the vending machine do you think Im being too petty
texts.Option01_402501402: Nah, we did kick him first...
texts.Option02_402501402: I know you feel the vending machine's pain
texts.Message_402501403: Mister vending machine wanted me to tell you that he forgives you
texts.Message_402501404: Though I doubt the kicking will stop
texts.Message_402501405: But as long as Im here I can do something for them

texts.Message_402501501: I need your help manager do you have The Ridu Tour in your store
texts.Option01_402501502: Isn't that on TV...? It's not really worth collecting...
texts.Option02_402501502: My videotapes are mostly high-quality films...
texts.Message_402501503: I see but I need the whole series every single episode thats been released
texts.Message_402501504: They are hard to find if I could buy them easily I wouldnt be coming to you manager
texts.Option01_402501505: Well if you put it like that, I'll get them for sure!
texts.Option02_402501505: Mhm, you have impeccable taste, Qingyi. Leave it to me!
texts.Message_402501506: Great I will be waiting then

texts.Message_402501601: Hows it going did you find the videotapes
texts.Option02_402501602: I had them in my storage all along!
texts.Message_402501603: Great I will come by after my shift is that okay

texts.Message_402600101: Hey Manager. Is my membership about to expire?
texts.Message_402600104: {M#Oh my, you asked me my name, and yet... you still can't remember it. Looks like your business is booming, huh? I guess it's a good problem to have so many customers that it's hard to keep track of names.}{F#You called me the "rat Thiren lady" last time. If you've forgotten me already, I might just be a little heartbroken.}
texts.Message_402600106: I coincidentally learned about your Knock Knock from a friend a few days ago
texts.Message_402600108: New Eridu is full of coincidences and surprises, isn't it? I have a few friends who are regulars at your store
texts.Message_402600109: Anyways. Just wanted to say hi. I'll swing by later to renew my membership at the store, Manager.
texts.Message_402600110: Ah! I was thinking that if you forgot me, I could use it to get a discount.
texts.Message_402600111: But honestly, I'm just happy you remembered me.
texts.Message_402600112: {M#Although you asked my name back then just for the membership registration, I'm surprised you still remember me, given how many customers you deal with every day. It's quite a pleasant surprise.}{F#Especially since you called me "rat Thiren lady" last time, so I always remember that there's a cute Manager here.}

texts.Message_402600201: If a cat fell into a river and you saved it, what would be the first thing it'd say?
texts.Option02_402600202: I'm sure your joke would do well in a retirement home...
texts.Message_402600203: I just read this in a magazine, but it said the answer will be revealed in the next issue
texts.Message_402600204: I thought you're really smart and must know the answer, so I figured I'd ask you
texts.Message_402600205: I didn't expect you to get it right away
texts.Message_402600206: By the way, I took a screenshot of your "Meow" to make sure I don't forget it if someone asks me the same question later
texts.Option01_402600207: You just wanted to get me to say "Meow" didn't you!
texts.Option02_402600207: You already knew the answer, didn't you!
texts.Message_402600208: Hmm? No way. I really was just worried that I'd forget
texts.Message_402600210: Hmm? Is it supposed to be a dad joke?
texts.Message_402600211: I just read this in a magazine, but it said the answer will be revealed in the next issue
texts.Message_402600212: I thought you're really smart and must know the answer, so I figured I'd ask you
texts.Message_402600215: Ah, I see. You're as smart as they say!

texts.Message_402600301: Young manager~ Do you have The Port Peak in the store?
texts.Option01_402600302: Didn't you rent it once already?
texts.Option02_402600302: I'd have to look for it
texts.Message_402600303: I was borrowing it for a friend, so I didn't watch it myself
texts.Message_402600304: But I suddenly feel like watching it
texts.Message_402600305: If you find it, please save it for me~
texts.Message_402600306: When I was renting it for a friend, I didn't have time to watch it
texts.Message_402600307: But I just read a movie review and it sounded interesting

texts.Message_402600401: Did you find The Port Peak?
texts.Message_402600404: Do you mind if I swing by to pick it up, young manager?

texts.Option01_402600501: Do you have any free time today?
texts.Message_402600502: I didn't expect you to DM me first
texts.Message_402600503: As for whether I have time...
texts.Message_402600504: That depends on what you want to do, young manager~
texts.Option01_402600505: It's a secret, come to the store and we can talk!
texts.Option02_402600505: I wanted to go to Public Security and ask about a few things...
texts.Message_402600506: Young manager, I can read you like an open book
texts.Message_402600507: Still thinking about my membership card?
texts.Message_402600508: Sure, why not. I don't have anything special planned today
texts.Message_402600509: If you can recommend a cool videotape for me, I'll think about recharging~
texts.Message_402600510: Just let me know when you're not busy at the store and I'll stop by
texts.Message_402600512: PubSec...? What did you do this time, young manager?
texts.Option02_402600513: It's a consultation, not a confession!
texts.Message_402600516: I'll go with you. What's a good time?
texts.Message_402600518: If it's a service where the manager personally keeps me company on my day off, I'll consider it
texts.Message_402600519: But I don't have anything specific in mind. Any ideas, young manager?

texts.Option01_402600601: Do you have any free time today?
texts.Message_402600602: I didn't expect you to DM me first
texts.Message_402600603: As for whether I have time...
texts.Message_402600604: That depends on what you want to do, young manager~
texts.Option01_402600605: Maybe you feel like having noodles too...
texts.Message_402600606: Good thing you suggested eating together, otherwise I would've spent my day off snacking on energy bars again
texts.Message_402600607: If I leave from home... taking the metro to Lumina Square is more convenient
texts.Message_402600608: What time were you thinking? We can meet at Waterfall Soup at Lumina Square
texts.Message_402600612: Aw, look at you, being all serious
texts.Message_402600613: Looks like you're researching the latest movies to update your inventory, right?
texts.Message_402600614: I don't have anything special planned today, let's go to the movies
texts.Message_402600615: What time should we meet at the cinema?
texts.Message_402600616: Although I know you're researching the latest movies to update your inventory
texts.Message_402600617: I'm still happy you asked me out for a date~
texts.Message_402600619: If it's a service where the manager personally keeps me company on my day off, I'll consider it
texts.Message_402600620: But I don't have anything specific in mind. Any ideas, young manager?

texts.Message_402600701: You weren't there when I went to the store
texts.Message_402600702: I waited for a while but you didn't come back...
texts.Message_402600703: I'll just come by next time when you're there~

texts.Message_402600801: Young manager, do you not know how to get to the Public Security service lobby?
texts.Message_402600802: It's a good thing you didn't come
texts.Message_402600803: There were too many people there. We should pick another time when it's less busy~

texts.Message_402600902: If I knew you weren't coming, I would've just had instant noodles at home
texts.Message_402600903: Make sure you give me a heads up next time something urgent comes up~

texts.Message_402601002: I hope you didn't wait too long for me, young manager
texts.Option01_402601003: Actually... I had something to do yesterday too...
texts.Option02_402601003: Make it up to me next time!
texts.Message_402601004: You're quite the honest one, young manager
texts.Message_402601005: When the new movie comes out, let's make plans again~
texts.Message_402601006: I trust you wouldn't ask for anything too crazy, young manager

texts.Message_600400101: {M#Wise, there's a new commission up on the Inter-Knot!}{F#Belle, there's a new commission up on the Inter-Knot}
texts.Message_600400103: The commission is fine in and of itself, and just involves grabbing a small VCR out of the Hollows
texts.Message_600400104: But the handover location and the bonus that's promised both seem a little...
texts.Option01_600400105: Let's start with the handover spot first. Is it too far?
texts.Option02_600400105: Let's start with the handover spot first. Is it dangerous?
texts.Message_600400107: The client asked to meet at "the designated spot on Sixth Street"
texts.Message_600400108: {M#The "designated spot" is probably... the door to our parking lot}{F#I think this "designated spot" is the door to our parking lot}
texts.Message_600400112: {M#Ah, also — the client said they'd have a bonus reward that's an "offer a Proxy can't refuse"}{F#Then the client also said... they'd have a bonus reward that's an "offer a Proxy can't refuse"}
texts.Message_600400113: {M#Plus the commission fee is already super high...}{F#Plus the commission fee by itself is already quite considerable}
texts.Message_600400114: {M#Are you gonna take it, Wise?}{F#Should we take it and see?}
texts.Option01_600400115: Of course! Let's go right now!
texts.Option02_600400115: A business opportunity delivered right to us! Let's take it!

texts.Message_600400203: Eous just said, "We need to talk..."
texts.Message_600400204: Nothing good ever came from "we need to talk," right?
texts.Message_600400205: But Eous rarely asks for anything, so I think we should respect whatever it has to say.
texts.Message_600400206: We need to keep a close eye on its development.
texts.Option02_600400207: Like taking care of a rebellious teen?
texts.Message_600400208: It really does feel like that
texts.Message_600400209: I'm starting to worry about why Eous is looking for you

texts.Message_600400301: Did Eous go looking for you again?
texts.Message_600400304: If you two aren't colluding, then... Then that means Eous has its own agenda.
texts.Message_600400305: Maybe it's connected to those friends of it?
texts.Message_600400306: 18 said it went off toward the gadget store. Let's go check it out

texts.Message_600400401: Recently Amillion has been going on and on about visiting the video store, even saying something about a missed... "Platinum Bangboo"?
texts.Message_600400402: It's been depressed for days now... I even inserted a couple of Dennies into its little turret but it didn't help
texts.Option01_600400404: A good parent has to arrive at their own answers
texts.Option02_600400404: Do you need to send it to a Bangboo psychiatrist?
texts.Message_600400405: What parent? We're simply partners on the road to earning Dennies!
texts.Message_600400406: ...Hey! It came back from the video store unhappy, so you should give the Cunning Hares some compensation
texts.Message_600400407: Oh yeah! And let me tell you — there's no way I'm paying the bill if it gets into any trouble out somewhere
texts.Message_600400408: But you better remember to help me get it back
texts.Option01_600400411: But what about the commission it sent out...
texts.Message_600400413: How can a Bangboo put out a commission?
texts.Message_600400414: I don't have time to chat! We have to get going! We've got an urgent job!

texts.Message_600500101: Hey, old friend. About that commission last time...
texts.Message_600500103: The Hollow Zero one! You remember, right?
texts.Message_600500104: Come on. I've always offered after-sales service.
texts.Message_600500105: I wanted to ask you about the commission in Hollow Zero.
texts.Message_600500106: You didn't lose that HIA license with the super long name, did you?
texts.Option01_600500107: Why are you asking me that all of a sudden?
texts.Option02_600500107: The "Independent Investigation License for Hollow Zero"?
texts.Message_600500108: Yeah, I've got a new job for you! With that license, we can make some serious cash this time.
texts.Message_600500109: Yeah! With that license, we can make some serious cash this time.
texts.Option01_600500110: Just as I feared, you've dipped into some shady stuff...
texts.Message_600500111: ...Are you, of all the people, lecturing me about being legit?
texts.Message_600500112: Well, actually, the HIA has issued a new commission.
texts.Message_600500113: Not long ago, they discovered a couple of special Companion Hollows... Let's call them "Icedrift Hollows" for now.
texts.Message_600500114: The HIA needs data on those Hollows ASAP, but they're short on manpower. That's where independent investigators like you come in.
texts.Option01_600500115: What does that have to do with the license?
texts.Option02_600500115: What do I need if I want to accept that commission?
texts.Message_600500116: You'll need an investigator license... and I'm guessing you don't have one, right?
texts.Message_600500117: But a license for Hollow Zero works! High-level access means you're good to go.
texts.Message_600500118: So, what do you say? Ready to make some quick cash?
texts.Message_600500120: Great! I'll swing by your store later so we can go over the details.
texts.Message_600500121: Come on. I'm right here on Sixth Street! Let's meet up so I can fill you in on the details.
texts.Option01_600500122: Alright. Let's meet at my place.

texts.Message_600500201: Proxy! The public commission is nearly done. How are things over there with you?
texts.Message_600500203: Why do you have to be so cryptic, we're friends... Fine. I'll respect the cryptic style that you Proxies love
texts.Message_600500204: By the way! I found a post with a great walkthrough for Proxies. I've shared it with Grace and the others.
texts.Message_600500205: We've had some great results thanks to this walkthrough!
texts.Message_600500206: I remember the post was titled... "Paid Content: Zero to Hero! The Ultimate Icedrift Hollows Walkthrough"
texts.Message_600500209: Of course! You have to believe me!
texts.Message_600500210: A walkthrough so good that it has even earned the recognition of Phaethon?
texts.Message_600500211: Speaking of which, the way that post was written... does seem oddly familiar
texts.Option02_600500212: Walkthroughs can have a discernible style?
texts.Message_600500213: Yeah, maybe... Just get the feeling that it's someone I've worked with before
texts.Message_600500214: That fluid sense of planning, clear-cut decision-making, pin-point positioning... Oh, and the high price-tag
texts.Message_600500215: Doesn't matter. Anyway, things turned out great this time! I hope that Proxy will keep sharing their experience
texts.Message_600500216: I just wanted to remind you to get your data in before the window closes.
texts.Message_600500217: But judging by that post of yours, seems like you're already making bank on this commission.
texts.Message_600500219: By the way... I can help promote your paid post if you want.
texts.Message_600500220: All after-sales issues are always covered in my bonus services!
texts.Message_600500221: So, next time you come up with a genius idea, don't forget about your old friend here, okay?

texts.Message_601100101: Colleagues at Lumina Square say with the streamlining of the General Affairs department procedures citizens rarely need to visit multiple times
texts.Message_601100102: But recently {M#a gray-haired boy}{F#a dark blue-purple haired girl} has been coming to the Public Security precinct for several consecutive days should we pay special attention to this
texts.Option01_601100103: I was busy a few days ago...
texts.Option02_601100103: It was for my citizen card!
texts.Message_601100105: Though Zhu Yuan and I dont share a deep bond with you we do feel a mutual appreciation and respect
texts.Message_601100106: We just wanted to make sure
texts.Message_601100108: Please confirm if you will file a complaint alleging inefficiency in the General Affairs department
texts.Message_601100109: However most people dont seem to be as calm as you are when the Criminal Investigation Special Response Team asks for confirmation
texts.Message_601100110: My colleagues in the General Affairs department are concerned that you might file a complaint alleging their inefficiency
texts.Message_601100111: But if you have no other intentions Ill be sure to remember your promise
texts.Option01_601100112: ...I'm in no way intending to complain
texts.Message_601100113: Understood just confirming have a nice day manager
texts.Message_601100114: Also we are honored citizens are concerned about Public Security affairs we look forward to seeing you at the precinct again soon

texts.Option02_700000102: Here to hand out new flyers?
texts.Message_700000103: Wait... did you seriously forget about me? Or are you one of those who can't remember people's names?
texts.Message_700000105: ...That's not the point! What really matters is: the client said you were the fastest of the bunch in that Rally Commission last time, way beyond what they expected! And I totally see why!
texts.Message_700000106: It's been a while since I met such a talented rookie Proxy. Who knows, maybe you'll become the next legendary Proxy!
texts.Option02_700000107: I still have a lot to learn.
texts.Message_700000108: Well said! Now if this is the case...
texts.Message_700000109: I've got another rally commission lined up for you!
texts.Message_700000110: If you want to become a Legendary Proxy, handling a simple rally commission shouldn't be a problem, right?
texts.Message_700000111: Keep it up! I'll be so proud of you when you truly become a legendary Proxy! ^^

texts.Message_700000201:
Dear Inter-Knot User, Commissions are booming lately, and we hope your business is experiencing the same!
Tired of fighting alone in the Hollow? Want to play to your strengths? Looking to avoid Ethereals and focus on exploration?
If you seek to fully utilize your abilities, our "Rally Commission: Old Town District" is the perfect choice for you!
Check out more in our Inter-Knot Rally Commission section.
Inter-Knot Recommendation, your daily inspiration!

texts.Message_700000301: Hey, {NICKNAME}! I heard you nailed the rally commission in the Metro Terminal area!
texts.Message_700000303: Looks like a new Proxy star is rising under the light of "Venus."
texts.Message_700000304: I'm planning to give you this Metro Terminal "Area Purge" periodic commission. Sounds good to you?
texts.Message_700000306: Yep, by eliminating enemies and clearing paths in the rally commissions, you've created a relatively safe environment for our operations in the Hollow, temporarily.
texts.Message_700000307: The Hollow isn't gonna stay safe forever. Once a Rally Commission has finished, the area also needs regular clean-ups.
texts.Message_700000308: It's like housekeeping — you have to do it every now and then. You get what I mean, right?
texts.Message_700000309: Fab! I'm an eyewitness to your smarts and skills!
texts.Message_700000310: Keep shining in more commissions, my rising star!

texts.Message_700010101: Manager! You free? I got some massive news for ya!
texts.Option01_700010102: Did Nicole give you a raise?
texts.Option02_700010102: Did you land a role on the Starlight Knights?
texts.Message_700010103: I wish... It's Godfinger. They got a new game in called "Bizarre Brigade," and they're running a promo event for it!
texts.Message_700010105: Come check it out and you'll see. It's the Godfinger right next to your store!
texts.Message_700010106: It's at the Godfinger on Sixth Street. Come check it out when you're free. I'll be waiting outside for you!

texts.Message_700010202: Manager! What do you think about me wearing this to go claim the prize at Godfinger?
texts.Option02_700010203: Is Monica also a Starlight Knight?
texts.Message_700010204: No, I changed my mind. After watching the Starlight Knights' final battle collection last night, my pistons were poppin' so hard I thought they'd bust right out!
texts.Message_700010205: I mean I still like Monica, but now I love the Starlight Knights even more!
texts.Message_700010206: So I was planning on dressing up as a Starlight Knight to claim the prize. The righteous Starlight Knights are the ones who'd make the best companions!
texts.Message_700010208: Oh yeah... I forgot to ask Asha about copyright stuff... Manager, would you mind asking for me? Please!

texts.Option01_700010301: Where are you? Come get your prize!
texts.Option02_700010301: Finished dressing up yet, Starlight Knight?
texts.OptionLong02_700010301: Finished dressing up yet, Starlight Knight? Come claim the prize!
texts.Message_700010302: I was just looking for you, Manager! You see, something urgent came up...
texts.Option01_700010303: You can't just waive your right!
texts.Option02_700010303: You can't just stand me up!
texts.Message_700010304: No no no, don't worry about that, Manager. It's an emergency. Listen to me, cos this is urgent!
texts.Message_700010305: Nicole just took on an emergency rescue commission and we're already in the car on the way to the Hollow. I asked if we could stop off to claim the prize, seeing as I'd spent so much on the costume already
texts.Message_700010306: But Nicole just chewed me out saying that human lives were at stake and that the commission was paid out based on performance... So in a nutshell, I can't go claim the prize. But don't worry. I've got a backup plan!
texts.Message_700010308: Before we left, I cracked open the far left window on the second floor and placed the costume right by the window. With your skills, Manager... I'm sure you could reach the second floor! Could you do me a favor, get that from the office and wear it to the prize ceremony?
texts.Message_700010309: Please! I spent three months' salary on that costume for the Starlight Knights. It's the real deal! You can even smell the actor's sweat still on it!
texts.Option01_700010310: You want me to climb through a second-floor window?!
texts.OptionLong01_700010310: Would you think about what you're saying here? How could I climb up there — no, why would I climb into someone else's window?!
texts.Option02_700010310: You want me to wear a sweaty costume?!
texts.OptionLong02_700010310: You want me to wear a sweaty costume?! No way! That's non-negotiable!
texts.Message_700010311: I see... I thought my backup plan was bulletproof. All that money I spent on that costume... I'll have to find a chance to wear it another time. Ah, Nicole said we're almost there. Time for action
texts.Message_700010312: Hang on! If I don't pick up the prize, then who's gonna get added in to the "Bizarre Brigade" game? It gonna be Manager? That's $&%#* awesome...!
texts.Message_700010313: Nicole's trying to grab my phone, so this is my last message! I don't mind if it's not the Starlight Knights, and going on an adventure with Manager as my Companion is pretty cool too!

texts.Message_800100101:
Dear Citizen:
This is an automated message from the Private Business Licensing Office at N.E.P.S.
Our records show that you have recently submitted a new business asset verification statement. We are pleased to inform you that your credentials have been verified. Please bring your citizen ID to the nearest precinct to complete the renewal process. Thank you for your cooperation!
texts.Message_800100102:
To confirm you've received this notification, please reply: YES
To find the nearest N.E.P.S. office, please reply: FIND
texts.Message_800100104: Confirmation received. Please complete your credentials update within three business days. Thank you again for your cooperation!
texts.Option02_800100105: I don't have any time right now
texts.Message_800100106:
Query received. Your nearest N.E.P.S. office is located at:
Lumina Square

texts.Message_800100201:
Dear Citizen:
This is an automated message from the Private Business Licensing Office at N.E.P.S.
Our records show that you have recently submitted a new business asset verification statement. We are pleased to inform you that your credentials have been verified. Please bring your citizen ID to the nearest precinct to complete the renewal process. Thank you for your cooperation!
texts.Message_800100202:
To confirm you've received this notification, please reply: YES
To find the nearest N.E.P.S. office, please reply: FIND
texts.Message_800100204: Confirmation received. Please complete your credentials update within three business days. Thank you again for your cooperation!
texts.Option02_800100205: I don't have any time right now
texts.Message_800100206:
Query received. Your nearest N.E.P.S. office is located at:
Lumina Square

texts.Message_1990500103: Manager, I'm here to tell you that the coffee shop is back to its normal routine starting today and that I would like to invite you to come over and try out our new drink. However, something just happened, and it's giving me a headache...
texts.Message_1990500104: Yes. I'm here to inform you as promised.
texts.Message_1990500105: I was planning on inviting you in to try out our new drink, but I didn't plan on something as annoying as this happening.
texts.Message_1990500107: I want to ask you for a favor. I'm sure you've heard of the Hollow Investigative Association, right?
texts.Message_1990500123: I'm afraid I do... In fact, the cause of this incident is related to the Hollow Investigative Association.
texts.Message_1990500108: They reached out to me earlier, saying they wanted to rent out Coff Cafe for a VR game promotion campaign...
texts.Message_1990500109: I agreed, and the timing for the reopening was just right, but little did I know it was a conspiracy from the start...
texts.Option01_1990500110: Are there commercial spies messing with you?
texts.Option01long_1990500110: Hold on! Is there an undercover coffee spy pretending to be the Investigative Association?
texts.Option02_1990500110: Is there a most wanted criminal over there?
texts.Option02long_1990500110: Hold on! Is there a wanted criminal among the participants?
texts.Message_1990500112: It's just that I found out today they chose this coffee shop as the venue because those VR players share some sort of... superstition? Or urban legend?
texts.Message_1990500113: In short, they believe that drinking coffee before playing a VR game improves their skills...!
texts.Option01_1990500114: Sounds like a good thing to me.
texts.Option01long_1990500114: Isn't that a good thing? You'll sell more coffee.
texts.Option02long_1990500114: That's great. I wonder if there're any urban legends that'd attract customers to my video store...
texts.Message_1990500115: That's true... The problem is all these players want coffee before they start playing...
texts.Message_1990500116: We just opened, and I can't keep up with the sudden surge in customers.
texts.Message_1990500117: So, would you mind working here for a while?
texts.Option01_1990500118: No worries. I'm on my way.
texts.Option02_1990500118: Actually, I'm waiting for someone at the moment...
texts.Message_1990500119: You'll help? Wonderful! I'll be waiting at the entrance.
texts.Message_1990500120: Don't worry, the campaign won't last long, and if you need to leave in the middle, it's totally fine... Just lend me a hand for a bit...
texts.Option01_1990500121: I guess it's okay... as long as it won't take up too much time.
texts.Option02_1990500121: I guess it's okay... as long as I can leave whenever I need to.

texts.Message_2002010102: And I really can't pretend I didn't hear that call
texts.Message_2002010103: What if there really are victims... I'd feel so terrible
texts.Message_2002010104: So I'm going back to check out that payphone again tonight
texts.Message_2002010105: You can come with me if you'd like?
texts.Option02_2002010106: I can't let you go off on your own
texts.Message_2002010108: I sure know how to pick my friends. You're so loyal!
texts.Message_2002010109: So let's meet up late tonight next to the payphone.

texts.Message_2002010201: How come you didn't come by yesterday?
texts.Message_2002010204: I knew it! I waited for ages
texts.Message_2002010205: You should've told me! Making me wait so long like that...
texts.Message_2002010206: But nothing special happened last night. I didn't see a soul besides a Public Security patrol
texts.Message_2002010207: But something still doesn't feel right...
texts.Message_2002010208: If you've got the time, why don't we meet up there another night and take a look? We can meet by the payphone!
